40001001	Hawe Daawita zariyaanne Abraahaame zare gideedda Yesuusi Kiristtoosa yeletaa odiyaa maxaafaa.
40001002	Abraahaame, Yisaaqa yeleedda; Yisaaqi, Yayiqooba yeleedda; Yayiqoobi, Yihudaanne A ishatuwaa yeleedda.
40001003	Yihuday Ti7imaarippe Paareesanne Zaraahaa yeleedda; Paareese, Hexiroona yeleedda; Hexiroone, Raama yeleedda.
40001004	Raame Aminadaaba yeleedda; Aminadaabe, Na7asoona yeleedda; Na7asoone, Selimoona yeleedda.
40001005	Selimoone, Ra7aabo geetettiyaa mishirattippe Boo7eeza yeleedda; Boo7eezi, Uruuto geetettiyaa mishirattippe Iyyoobeeda yeleedda; Iyyoobeede, Issey yeleedda.
40001006	Issey Kaatiyaa Daawita yeleedda. Kaatiyaa Daawite, Ooriyaa machchattippe Solomona yeleedda.
40001007	Solomone, Robi7aama yeleedda; Robi7aame, Aabiyaa yeleedda; Aabiyay, Aasaafa yeleedda.
40001008	Aasaafe, Yoosaafeexa yeleedda; Yoosaafeexe, Iyyooraama yeleedda; Iyyooraame, Ooziyaana yeleedda.
40001009	Ooziyaane, Iyyoo7aataama yeleedda; Iyyoo7aataame, Akaaza yeleedda; Akaaze, Hizqqiyaasa yeleedda.
40001010	Hizqqiyaase Minaasa yeleedda; Minaase, Amooxa yeleedda; Amooxe, Iyyoosiyaasa yeleedda.
40001011	Isra7eeliya asay omodettiide, Baabiloone gadiya beedda wode, Iyyoosiyaase Ikkoniyaananne A ishatuwaa yeleedda.
40001012	Baabiloone omodduwaappe guyyiyan, Ikkoniyaananne Salaatiyaala yeleedda; Salaatiyaale, Zerubaabeela yeleedda.
40001013	Zerubaabeeli, Abiyuuda yeleedda; Abiyuude, Eeliyaaqeema yeleedda; Eeliyaaqeemi, Azoora yeleedda.
40001014	Azoore Saadooqa yeleedda; Saadooqe, Akiima yeleedda; Akiime Eliyuuda yeleedda.
40001015	Eliyuude, Ali7aazara yeleedda; Ali7aazare, Maataana yeleedda; Maataane, Yayiqooba yeleedda.
40001016	Yayiqoobe, Kiristtoosa geetettiyaa Yesuusa yeleedda Mayraamo oochcheedda Yooseefa yeleedda.
40001017	Simmi yeletay ubbay Abraahaamoppe Daawita gakkanaw tammanne oyddu yeleta; Daawiteppe doommiide, asay Baabiloone gadiya omodettiide beedda wodiyaa gakkanaw tammanne oyddu yeleta; asay Baabiloone gadiya omodettiide beedda wodiyaappe Kiristtoosi yeletteedda wodiya gakkanaw tammanne oyddu yeleta.
40001018	Yesuusi Kiristtoosa yeletay hawaa mala; A daaya Mayraama Yooseefoo ooshetta qashetta uttaaddu. He wode Yooseefonna gakettennaan de7aadde, Geeshsha Ayyaanan shahaaraaddu.
40001019	Izo giigissi wotheedda Yooseefo xillo asa gideedda diraw, izo kawushshanaw koyyibeenna; iibaa qonccissennaan izo agganaw qoppeedda.
40001020	Shin I hewaa qoppishshin, Godaa kiitanchchay akumuwan aananna gakettiide, “Daawite na7aa Yooseefoo, Mayraama Geeshsha Ayyaanan shahaareedda diraw izo akkanaw yayyoppa.
40001021	Iza attuma na7aa yelanawunnu; neenikka, I asaa nagaraappe ashshiyaa diraw A sunthaa Yesuusa gaade xeesanaassa” yaageedda.
40001022	-
40001023	Qassi Goday nabiyaa bagganna, “Wodoratta shahaaranawunnu; na7aakka yelanawunnu; A sunthaykka Ammaneela geetettanawaa” yaageeddawe polettana mala, hawe ubbay haaneedda; “Ammaneela” yaagiyaawe, “Xoossay nuunanna de7ee” yaagiyaawaa.
40001024	Yooseefo gemi77ishuwaappe beegottiide, Godaa kiitanchchay barena azazowaadan, Mayraamo bare golle afeedda.
40001025	Shin na7ay yelettana gakkanaw Yooseefo izikko shiiqibeenna; qassi na7aakka Yesuusa giide suntheedda.
40002001	Yesuusi Yihudaa gadiyan Beeteliheeme geetettiyaa katamaan Heroodise kawutiide de7iyaa wode yeletteedda; hewaappe guyyiyan, xoolinttiyaa paydiyaa asay awayfi doliyaa baggappe Yeerusalaame yiide,
40002002	“Ayihuda kaatiyaa gidanaw yeletteedda na7ay haqan de7ii? Nuuni awayfi doliyaa bagganna keseedda A xoolinttiyaa be7iide, aw goyinnanaw yeeddo” yaagiide oochcheeddino.
40002003	Kaatiyaa Heroodise, hewaa sisiide dagammeedda; Yeerusalaamen de7iyaa asay ubbaykka wozanaa bayeeddino.
40002004	Heroodise qeesatuwaa kaappatuwaa ubbatuwaanne Muse higgiyaa tamaarissiyaawantta xeesiide, “Kiristtoosi haqan yelettanddeeshsha?” yaagiide oochcheedda.
40002005	-
40002006	Unttunttu zaariide, “Yihudaa gadiyan Beeteliheeme katamaan yelettanawaa. Nabii, ‘Yihudaa gadiyan de7iyaa Beeteliheeme, neeni Yihudaa gadiyan de7iyaa woliqqaama katamatuwaappe laafakka. Isra7eeliya mooddiyaawe neeppe kesanawaa’ giide xaafeedda” yaageeddino.
40002007	Hewaappe kaalla, Heroodise awayfi doliyaa baggappe yeedda asatuwaa geeman xeesiide, xoolinttii unttunttoo beetteedda wodiyaa unttunttuppe geeshshiide ereedda.
40002008	Yaatiide Beeteliheeme unttuntta yeddiidde, “Biide na7aa loythi koyyite; A demmeedda wode taanikka baade aw goyinnanaadan, taanakka erissite” yaageedda.
40002009	Unttunttu kaatii geeddawaa sisi biidde ogiyaan awayfi doliyaa bagganna unttunttu kase be7eedda xoolinttiyaa be7eeddino; na7ay de7iyaasaa gakkiide eqqana gakkanaw, xoolinttii unttuntta kaaletheedda.
40002010	Unttunttu he xoolinttiyaa be7eedda wode, zaway baynna daro nashechchaa nashetteeddino.
40002011	Golle geliide, na7ay bare daayi Mayraaminna de7iyaawaa be7eeddino; gulbbatiide aw goyinneeddino; hewaappe kaalla, barenttu saaxiniyaa dooyyiide, worqqaa, ixaanaanne kawaraa aw imotaa shiishsheeddino.
40002012	Unttunttu Heroodisakko simmenna mala, Xoossay akumuwan unttuntta, “Hinttena erite” giina hara ogiyaanna barenttu gade simmeeddino.
40002013	Unttunttu beeddawaappe guyyiyan, Godaa kiitanchchay akumuwan Yooseefoo beettiide, “Heroodise na7aa wodhanaw koyyiyaa diraw, denddaade na7aanne A daayo akkaade Gibxe gadiyaa beta; taani new odana gakkanaw, yaani de7ashsha” yaageedda.
40002014	-
40002015	Yooseefo qamma denddiide, na7aanne A daayo akkiide, Gibxe gadiyaa beedda; Goday nabiyaa bagganna, “Taani ta na7aa Gibxe gadiyaappe xeesaaddi” yaageeddawe polettana mala, Heroodise hayqqana gakkanaw I yaani de7eedda.
40002016	Hewaappe guyyiyan, Heroodise awayfi doliyaa baggappe yeeddawanttu barena cimmeeddawaa ereedda wode, daro hanqqettiide, xoolinttii kase beetteedda wodiyaa unttunttuppe siseeddawaadan, wottaaddaratuwaa yeddiide, Beeteliheemeninne yuushshuwaan de7iya laa77u laythaa attuma naanaanne laa77u laythaappe garssanna de7iyaa attuma naanaa ubbaa wodhisseedda.
40002017	-
40002018	Nabiyaa Ermiyaasi, “Yeekuunne zilassay Raama geetettiyaa katamaan sisetteedda; Raaheela bare naanaw yeekkaw. Unttunttu hayqqidiggo diraw, agga giina, aggennaan ixxaaddu” giide odeeddawe poletteedda.
40002019	Heroodise hayqqeeddawaappe guyyiyan, Godaa kiitanchchay Gibxen Yooseefoo akumuwan beettiide
40002020	A, “Dendda; na7aanne A daayo akkaade, Isra7eeliya gadiya simma. Na7aa wodhanaw koyyiyawanttu hayqqidiggeeddino” yaageedda.
40002021	Yooseefo denddiide, na7aanne A daayo akkiide, Isra7eeliya simmeedda.
40002022	Shin Yooseefo Arkkelawoosi bare aawuwaa Heroodisa oydiyaan Yihudaa gadiyan kawuteeddawaa siseedda wode, yaa baanaw yayyeedda; Xoossay aw akumuwan hinttena erite giina, Galiilaa gadiya beedda.
40002023	Nabatuu, “Asay A, ‘Naazireetiyaa asa’ giide xeesana” yaageeddawe polettana mala, Naazireete geetettiyaa katamaa biide de7eedda.
40003001	-
40003002	He wode Xammaqiyaa Yohaannisi asaa, “Saluwaa kawutethay matatteedda diraw, hintte nagaraappe simmite” yaagiidde, Yihudaa mela biittaan odiidde yeedda.
40003003	Ayissi gooppe, nabiyaa Iisiyaase, Yohaannisabaa odiidde, “Ittuu mela biittaan bare qaalaa dhoqqu udiide, ‘Godaa ogiyaa giigissite. I hemettana loossuwaakka aw sitti udite’ geedda” yaageedda.
40003004	Yohaannisaw gaaluwaa iskiyan dadetteedda mayuu de7ee; qassi bare xeessan dafuwaa dancceedda; I miyaa qumaykka booliyaanne bazzuwaa eessaa.
40003005	Asay he wode Yeerusalaameppe, Yihudaa gadiyaa ubba saappenne Yorddaanoosa Shaafaa heeran de7iyaa gadiya ubbaappe aakko yiino.
40003006	Barenttu nagaraa paaxina, Yorddaanoosa Shaafan asaa xammaqeedda.
40003007	Shin Yohaannisi daro Parisaawatuunne Saduqaawanatuu xammaqettanaw barekko yiyaawantta be7iide, “Ha shooshshatoo, Xoossaa hanqquu yaana haniyawaappe attana mala, hinttew oone odeeddawe?
40003008	Simmi hintte, hinttenttu nagaraappe simmeeddawaa erissiyaa oosuwaa, oothite.
40003009	Hintte hinttenttu wozanaan, ‘Abraahaame nu aabba’ giide qoppiyaawaa hinttew malatoppo. Ayissi gooppe, taani hinttenttussi oday; Xoossay ha shuchchatuwaappe Abraahaamossi naanaa udi denthanaw danddayee.
40003010	Beexi mithaa xaphuwan qanxxanaw giigi utteedda; lo77o ayfiyaa ayfenna mithaa ubbay qanxxettiide, tamaan yegettana.
40003011	“Hintte hinttenttu nagaraappe simmiyaawaa bessanaw, taani hinttena haathaan xammaqay; shin taappe guyyenna yiyaawe, hinttentta Geeshsha Ayyaanaaninne tamaan xammaqana. I taappe daro minnee; A caammaa tookkanawukka taani bessiyaa asa gidikke.
40003012	A kushiyan kathaa sexxiyaa layday de7ee. Uddummaan de7iyaa kaathaa loythi geeshshee; bare zarggaa diyyiyan qolana; shin dalaa to7enna tamaan guuddana” yaageedda.
40003013	Yesuusi he wode Yohaannisan xammaqettanaw, Galiilaappe Yorddaanoosa geetettiyaa shaafaa aakko beedda.
40003014	Shin Yohaannisi, “Taani neenan xammaqettanaw bessiyaa wode, neeni taakko yay?” yaagiide, A digganaw koyyeedda.
40003015	Shin Yesuusi zaariide A, “Nuuni xillotethaa oosuwaa ubbaa hawaadan polanaw bessiyaa diraw, ha77i taw eeno ga” yaageedda. Yohaannisikka aw eeno geedda.
40003016	Yesuusi xammaqettowaappe guyyiyan, ellekka haathaappe keseedda; saluu dooyettina, Xoossaa Ayyaanay haraphphiyaadan saluwaappe wodhdhiide bare bolla yiyaa wode be7eedda;
40003017	qassi saluwaappe, “Taani siiqiyaa, taana nashechchiyaa, ta Na7ay hawaa” yaagiyaa qaalay yeedda.
40004001	Hewaappe guyyiyan, xalahiyaan paacettana mala, Geeshsha Ayyaanay asay de7enna sa7aa Yesuusa afeedda.
40004002	Yesuusi oytamu gallassaanne oytamu qammaa xoomowaappe guyyiyan koshatteedda.
40004003	Xalahii yiide A, “Neeni Xoossaa Na7aa gidooppe, ane ha shuchchatuwaa ukithaa gidana mala ga” yaageedda.
40004004	Shin Yesuusi zaariide, “Xoossaa maxaafaan, ‘Asay Xoossay haasayiyaa qaalaa ubbaan de7anaappe attin, ukithaa xalalaan de7enna’ yaagetti xaafetteedda” yaageedda.
40004005	Hewaappe guyyiyan, xalahii Yesuusa geeshsha katamaa afi Geeshsha Golliyaa xeeraan essiide,
40004006	“Neeni Xoossaa Na7aa gidooppe, ane duge kundda. Ayissi gooppe, Xoossaa maxaafaan, ‘Xoossay bare kiitanchchatuwaa new azazanawaa’ qassi ‘Unttunttu ne gedi shuchchaan dhubettenna mala, barenttu kushiyan neena denthanawantta’ yaagetti xaafetteedda” yaageedda.
40004007	Yesuusi zaariide A, “Qassikka Xoossaa maxaafaan, ‘Godaa ne Xoossaa paaccoppa’ yaagetti xaafetteedda” yaageedda.
40004008	Qassi xalahii Yesuusa itti daro wolqqaama deriyaa xeeraa kessiide, ha alamiyaan de7iyaa kawutethaa ubbaanne unttunttu bonchchuwaa
40004009	bessiide A, “Neeni taw gulbbataade goyinnooppe, taani hawaa ubbaa new immana” yaageedda.
40004010	He wode Yesuusi zaariide A, “Laa ha Seexaanaw haakka; ayissi gooppe, Xoossaa maxaafaan, ‘Godaw, ne Xoossaw goyinna; A xalalaa gosheta’ geetetti xaafetteedda” yaageedda.
40004011	Hewaappe guyyiyan, xalahii Yesuusa aggina, kiitanchchatuu yiide, aw ootheeddino.
40004012	Yohaannisi qashetteeddawaa Yesuusi siseedda wode, Galiilaa geetettiyaa gadiyaa beedda.
40004013	Naazireeteppe kesiide, Qifirinaahooma katamaa biide, yaani de7eedda; Qifirinaahoomi Zaabiloonaninne Nifttaaleeme gadiyan de7iyaa Galiilaa abbaa mataan de7ee.
40004014	Hawe haneeddawe nabiyaa Iisiyaasi,
40004015	“Zaabiloone gadiyaninne Nifttaaleeme gadiyan, abbaa ogiyaan Yorddaanoosa Shaafaappe hefintha baggan, Ayihuda gidenna asay de7iyaa Galiilaan,
40004016	dhumaani de7iyaa asay wolqqaama poo7uwaa be7eedda. Qassi hayquwaa kuway de7iyaa gadiyan utteeddawanttoo poo7uu keseedda” yaageeddawe polettana malaassa.
40004017	He wodiyaappe doommiide Yesuusi, “Hintte nagaraa paaxite; ayissi gooppe, saluwaa kawutethay matatteedda diraassa” giide qaalaa oduwaa doommeedda.
40004018	Yesuusi Galiilaa Abbaa mataanna aadhdhiidde, laa77u ishatuu Phexiroosa geetettiyaa Simooninne A ishaa Inddiraasi, moliyaa oyqqiyaawantta gido diraw, dabbaa abbaan yeggiyaawantta be7eedda.
40004019	Unttuntta, “Taana kaallite; taani hinttena moliyaa oyqqiyaawaadan asaa taakko ahiyaa ogiyaa tamaarissana” yaageedda.
40004020	Unttunttu ellekka barenttu dabbaa aggiide, Yesuusa kaalleeddino.
40004021	Yesuusi hewaappe sinthakko biidde, hara laa77u ishatuwaa, Zabiddiyoosa naanaa Yayiqoobanne A ishaa Yohaannisa be7eedda; unttunttu barenttu aawuwaa Zabiddiyoosanna haathaa bollan biyaa wonggiriyaa giddon barenttu dabbaa giigissiyaawantta be7iide, xeeseedda.
40004022	Unttunttu ellekka haathaan biyaa wonggiriyaanne barenttu aawuwaa aggiide, Yesuusa kaalleeddino.
40004023	Yesuusi Ayihuda woosa golletuwan tamaarissiidde, kawutethaa mishiraachchuwaa qaalaa odiiddinne qassi harggiyaa ubbaappenne sakuwaa ubbaappe asaa pathiidde, Galiilaa gadiyaa ubbaan yuuyyeedda.
40004024	A waarii Sooriyaa gadiyaa ubbaa gakkeedda; dumma dumma harggiyaan oyqettiide harggeedda asaa ubbaa, xalahatuwaan oyqetteeddawantta, yiicuwaa sakuu de7iyaawantta, qassi gunddeedddawantta asay Yesuusakko aheedda; I unttuntta patheedda.
40004025	Cora asay Galiilaappe, tammu katamatuwappe, Yeerusalaameppe, Yihudaappenne Yorddaanoosappe hefinthan de7iyaa gadiyaappe Yesuusa kaalleeddino.
40005001	Yesuusi cora asaa be7iide, pude deriyaa kesiide utteedda. A kaalliyaawanttu aakko shiiqeeddino.
40005002	Unttuntta hawaadan yaagi tamaarissuwaa doommeedda.
40005003	“Barenttu ayyaanaa de7uwaan hiyyeesaa gideeddawaa eriyaawanttu anjjetteeddawantta; ayissi gooppe, saluwaa kawutethay unttunttussa.
40005004	Kayyottiyaawanttu anjjetteeddawantta; ayissi gooppe, Xoossay unttuntta minissana.
40005005	Ashikke gideeddawanttu anjjetteeddawantta; ayissi gooppe, unttunttu sa7aa laattana.
40005006	Xillotethaa koshattiyaawanttunne saamettiyaawanttu anjjetteeddawantta; ayissi gooppe, Xoossay unttuntta kalissana.
40005007	Maariyaawanttu anjjetteeddawantta; ayissi gooppe, Xoossay unttuntta maarana.
40005008	Wozanaa geeshshatuu anjjetteeddawantta; ayissi gooppe, unttunttu Xoossaa be7ana.
40005009	Asaa sigethiyaawanttu anjjetteeddawantta; ayissi gooppe, Xoossay unttuntta, bare naanaa giide xeesana.
40005010	Xillotethaa diraw yedersettiyaawanttu anjjetteeddawantta; ayissi gooppe, saluwaa kawutethay unttunttussa.
40005011	“Hintte taana kaalliyaa diraw, asay hinttena boriyaa wodenne waayissiyaa wode, qassi hintte bolla iitabaa ubbaa wordduwan haasayiyaa wode, hintte anjjetteeddawantta.
40005012	Hinttew saluwan wolqqaama woytay de7iyaa diraw, nashettite; hashshu giite; ayissi gooppe, asay hintteppe kase de7eedda nabatuwaa hewaadan yedersseeddino.
40005013	“Asaa ubbaassi hintte maxine mala; shin maxinii mal77ana dhayooppe, zaariide A wooti mal77ethanee? Kare olina, asay A yedhdhi hamettanaappe attin, sinthaw aynne maaddenna.
40005014	“Ha alamew hintte poo7o; deriyaa huuphiyan keexetteedda katamay geemmana danddayenna.
40005015	Xomppiyaa xomppiide, soyin de7iyaa asaa ubbaw poo7ana mala, dhoqqiyaa saan wotheeppe attin, kammiyaa miishshaa giddon qum77i wothiyaa asay ooninne baawa.
40005016	Hewaadankka, asay hintte oothiyaa lo77o oosuwaa be7iide, saluwan de7iya hintte Aawuwaa bonchchana mala, hintte poo7uu asaa sinthaan poo7o.
40005017	“Taani Muse higgiyaanne nabatuu tamaarissiyaawaa dhayissanaw yeeddawaa hinttew malatoppo; taani polanaw yeeddawaappe attin, dhayissanaw yabeykke.
40005018	Ayissi gooppe, taani hinttew tumuwaa oday; saluunne sa7ay aadhdhana gakkanaw, qassi ubbabaykka polettana gakkanaw, higgiyaappe itti cachchaykka woy qeeri pidoliikka aadhdhenna.
40005019	Hewaa diraw, ha azazuwaa ubbaappe guuxxiyaa itti azazuwaa menthiyaa uray ooninne, qassi haratuukka barewaadan hananaadan tamaarissiyaa uray ooninne, saluwaa kawutethaan ubbaappe guutha gidana; shin azazuwaa oothiyaawenne haranttukka oothanaadan tamarissiyaawe ooninne saluwaa kawutethaan dhoqqa gidana.
40005020	Ayissi gooppe, hintte xillotethay Muse higgiyaa tamaarissiyaawanttu xillotethaappenne Parisaawatuwaa xillotethaappe darana dhayooppe, saluwaa kawutethaa hintte mule gelennawaa taani oday.
40005021	“Beni asaw, ‘Asaa wodhoppa; asaa wodheedda ooninne pirddettana’ geeddawaa siseeddita.
40005022	Shin taani hinttew oday; bare ishaa hanqqettiyaa ubbay pirddettana; bare ishaa boriyaa ubbay shangguwaa pirddaw shiiqana; qassi bare ishaa, ‘Dhullowe’ giyaa ubbay Gaannamiyaa tamaa pirddaw shiiqana.
40005023	Hewaa diraw, neeni yarshshiyaasaan yarshshishshin, ne ishaa naaqqeeddabay new hewaan hassayettooppe,
40005024	ne yarshshuwaa hewaan aggaade ba; kasetaade ne ishaanna sigetta digga; hewaappe kaalla yaade, ne yarshshuwaa yarshsha.
40005025	“Neena mootiyaawaanna wodii de7ishshin elle aananna sigetta digga; hewe dhayooppe, I neena daannaa sintha aathana; qassi daannay neena polisew aathi immina, polisii neena qasho gollen yeggana.
40005026	Taani new tumuwaa oday; neeni itti santtimii attennaan, ne maggaccuwaa wurssaade ciggana gakkanaw, mulekka qasho golleppe kesakka.
40005027	“ ‘Woshummoppa’ geeddawaa siseeddita.
40005028	Shin taani hinttew yaagay; ‘Maccawunno xeelliide amottiyaa ubbay, bare wozanaa giddon he wode iinanna woshummeedda.’
40005029	Ne ushechcha ayfii neena nagaraa oosisooppe, neeppe woocaade olaa agga; ayissi gooppe, ne bollay mulekka Gaannamiyaa tamaan olettiyaawaappe, aappe ittuu paccintto new lo77a.
40005030	Qassi ne ushechcha kushii neena nagaraa oosisooppe, neeppe qanxxaade olaa agga; ayissi gooppe, ne bollay mulekka Gaannamiyaa tamaan olettiyaawaappe, aappe ittuu paccintto new lo77a.
40005031	“ ‘Qassi bare machchatto yeddiyaa ooninne izo yeddiyaa paramaa immo’ geetetteedda.
40005032	Shin taani hinttew yaagay; ‘Bare machchatta woshummennaan de7ishshin yeddiyaa ooninne izo woshumma kessee; qassi asinay yeddeedda mishiratto akkiyawe ooninne woshummee.’
40005033	“Qassi beni asaw, ‘Wordduwan caaqqoppa; shin ne Godaw caaqqeeddawaa pola’ geeddawaa siseeddita.
40005034	Shin taani hinttew yaagay; ‘Ubbakka caaqqoppite’; saluu Xoossaa kawutethaa oydiyaa gidiyaa diraw, ‘Saluwan caaqqoppite’
40005035	qassi sa7ay A gedi yedhdhiyaasaa gidiyaa diraw, ‘Sa7aan caaqqoppite’; qassikka, Yeerusalaame wolqqaama kaatiyaa katamaa gidiyaa diraw, ‘Yeerusalaamenikka caaqqoppite’
40005036	Neeni itti binnanaakka bootha woy karethaa kessanaw danddayenna diraw, ‘Ne huuphiyankka caaqqoppa.’
40005037	Shin hintte, ‘E’ woy, ‘Gidenna’ giite; hawanttuppe haray Seexaanaappe yee.
40005038	“ ‘Ayifiyaa diraw ayifiyaa; achchaa diraw achchaa’ geeddawaa siseeddita.
40005039	Shin taani hinttew yaagay; ‘Hinttew iitabaa oothiyaa uraw iitan zaaroppite; ooninne ne ushechcha bagga shayyiyaa baqqooppe, ne haddirssa bagga shayyiyaakka A bessa;
40005040	ne shaamiciyaa akkanaw itti uray neena mootooppe, he uraw ne kootiyaakka gujja imma.
40005041	Ooninne neena itti saatiyaa ogiyaa barenanna baanaadan wolqqanthooppe, aananna laa77u saatiyaa ogiyaa ba.
40005042	Neena woossiyaa uraw imma; qassi neeppe tal77ana koyyiyaa urawukka diggoppa.’
40005043	“ ‘Ne laggethatuwaa siiqa; ne morkkiyaa morkka’ geeddawaa siseeddita.
40005044	-
40005045	Shin taani hinttew yaagay; saluwan de7iyaa hintte Aawuwassi naanaa gidana mala, hintte morkketuwaa siiqite; hinttena sheqqiyaawantta anjjite; hinttena ixxiyaawanttoo lo77obaa udite; hinttena yederssiyaawanttoo, Xoossaa woossite; ayissi gooppe, iita asawukka lo77o asawukka Xoossay bare awaa awaxxissee; qassi xillatuwassikka nagaranchchatuwaassikka bare iraa bukissee.
40005046	Hintte hinttena siiqiyaawanttu xalalaa siiqooppe, hinttew ay woytay de7ii? Haray atto, nagaranchchatuukka hewaadan udiino.
40005047	Hintte hinttenttu ishatuwaa xalalaa sarotooppe, haratuu udiyaawaappe aadhdhiyaabaa ayaa udeedditee? Haray atto, Ayihude gidenna asaykka hewaadan udee.
40005048	Hewaa diraw, saluwan de7iyaa hintte Aawuu polo gidowaadan, hinttekka polo gidite.
40006001	“Hintte lo77o oosuwaa asaa bessanaw asaa sinthaan oothenna mala naagettite; hewe dhayooppe, saluwan de7iya hintte Aawuu hinttew gatiyaa immenna.
40006002	“Hewaa diraw, hintte awudenne hiyyeesaw immiyaa wode, lo77a malatiyaa iitatuu barentta bonchchissanaw, Ayihuda woosa golleninne ogiyaan haraani be7ettanaw udiyaawaadan udoppite; taani hinttew tumuwaa oday; unttunttu barenttu gatiyaa akkidiggeeddino.
40006003	-
40006004	Shin neeni hiyyeesaw immiya wode, geeman immanaadan, ne ushechcha kushii oothiyaawaa haddirssa kushii eroppo. Geeman ootheeddawaa be7iyaa ne Aabbu, ne lo77o oosuwaa gatiyaa zaaranawaa.
40006005	“Xoossaa woossiidde, lo77a malatiyaa iitatuwadan hanoppite; ayissi gooppe, barentta asay be7ana mala, Ayihuda woosa golleninne ogiyaa doonan eqqiide, Xoossaa woossiyaawaa dosiino; taani hinttew tumuwaa oday; unttunttu barenttu gatiyaa ubbaakka akkeeddino.
40006006	Shin neeni Xoossaa woossiyaa wode, ne golle gela; ipithaa qachchaade, beettenna ne Aawuuwaa woossa; geeman oosettowaa be7iyaa ne Aabbu new immanawaa.
40006007	“Xoossaa hintte woossiyaa wode, Xoossaa ammanenna asaadan, coo mela zaarethuwaa darissoppite; unttunttu haasayaa daruwan sisettee giide qoppiino.
40006008	Hewaa diraw, he asaadan hanoppite; ayissi gooppe, hintte Aabbu hinttena koshshiyaawaa hinttenttu woossanaappe kasetiide eree.
40006009	Simmi hinttenttu hawaa mala woosaa woossite; ‘Saluwan de7iyaa nu Aabboo, ne geeshsha sunthay anjjetto.
40006010	Ne Kawutethay yo; ne shenii saluwan haneeddawaadan, sa7ankka hano.
40006011	Gallassaan gallassan koshshiyaa qumaa nuussi hachche imma.
40006012	Nuuni nuuna naaqqowanttussi atto yaagiyaawaadan, neenikka nu naaquwaa atto ga.
40006013	Nuuna iitabaappe ashshappe attin, paaciyaan gelissoppa. Kawutethay, wolqqaynne bonchchuu medhinawukka neessa. Amen77i’
40006014	“Hinttenttu hinttena naaqqeedda hara asaa naaquwaa atto gooppe, saluwan de7iyaa hinttenttu Aawuukka hinttew atto gaana.
40006015	“Shin hinttenttu hinttena naaqqeedda hara asaa naaquwaa atto gaana dhayooppe, hinttenttu Aawuukka hintte naaquwaa atto geenna.
40006016	“Qassi hinttenttu xoomiyaa wode, lo77a malatiyaa iitatuwaadan, kayyottiyaawaa malatoppite; ayissi gooppe, unttunttu xoomiyaawaa asay be7ana mala, barenttu som77iyaa bullaalissiino; taani hinttenttoo tumuwaa oday; unttunttu barenttu gatiyaa akkeeddino.
40006017	-
40006018	“Shin hinttenttu xoomiyaa wode, hinttenttu Aabbu hintte xoomiyaawaa erooppe attin, asay erenna mala, hintte som77iyaa meecettite; hintte huuphiyaakka okettite; yaatooppe, beettenna hintte Aawuu hinttenttu oothiyaawaa geeman be7iide, hintte gatiyaa immanawaa.
40006019	“Miishshaa bil77ay miyasaaninne biratay shi7iide bayizziyaasan, kayisuukka bookkiide wuu77iyaasan, ha sa7aan hinttenttu huuphiyaassi dagayoppite.
40006020	Shin bil77ay meennasaaninne shi7enna saan, kayisuukka bookkiide wuu77enna saan hinttenttu huuphiyaassi saluwan miishshaa dagayite.
40006021	Ayissi gooppe, ne wozanay ne miishshay de7iyaasaan de7ana.
40006022	“Bollaa poo7uu ayfiyaa; hewaa diraw, ne ayfii paxa gidooppe, ne bollaa ubbay poo7o gidana.
40006023	Shin ne ayfii paxa gidana dhayooppe, ne bollaa ubbay dhumana; simmi neenan de7iyaa poo7uu dhumooppe, dhumay ay keenaa daranee!
40006024	“Laa77u godatuwaassi moodettanaw danddayiyaawe ooninne baawa; ayissi gooppe, ittuwaa ixxiide, yokkuwaa siiqee; woy ittuwaa bonchchiide, yokkuwaa kadhee; itti asay Xoossaassinne shaluwaassi moodettanaw danddayenna.
40006025	“Hewaa diraw, taani hinttenttoo oday; hintte de7oo maanabawunne ushanabaw, woy hintte bollaw mayyanabaw hirggoppite; shemppuu qumaappe aadhdhennee? Qassi bollay mayuwaappe aadhdhennee?
40006026	Paalliyaa kafatuwaa xeellite; unttunttu zerikkino; cakkikkino; diyyiyankka qolikkino; shin saluwan de7iyaa hinttenttu Aawuu unttuntta mizee; hinttenttu unttunttuppe loythi darkkitee?
40006027	Hinttenttu giddon darissi hirggiide, bare geesaa bolla itti wadhaa gujjanaw danddayiyaawe oonee?
40006028	“Ayissi mayuwassi hirggiitee? Dembban de7iya ciishshatuu wooti dicciinontto, akeeki xeellite; unttunttu daaburikkino woy puuttuwaa suqqikkino.
40006029	Shin taani hinttenttoo oday; haray atto, Solomone hewaa keena bonchchetteeddawaa gidiidde, he ciishshatuwaappe ittuwaa malaakka mayyibeenna.
40006030	Shin laafa ammanuu de7iyaawanttoo, Xoossay, hachche de7iide, wontti tamaan eexxiyaa dembbaa maataa mayizziyawe, hinttena unttuwaappe aathiide wooti mayizzennee?
40006031	Simmi, ‘Nuuni ayaa maanee? Woy ayaa ushanee? Woy ayaa mayyanee?’ yaagiide hirggoppite.
40006032	Ayissi gooppe, he ubbabaa Xoossaa ammanennawanttu darissiide koyyiino; he ubbay hinttena koshshiyaawaa saluwan de7iyaa hinttenttu Aawuu eree.
40006033	Shin kasetiide, Xoossaa kawutethaanne A xillotethaa koyyite; I hinttenttoo he ubbabaa immana.
40006034	Hewaa diraw, wonttibaassi hirggoppite; ayissi gooppe, wontti gallassay barew hirggana; gallassaa ubbawukka A huuphew gidiyaa waayyii de7ee.
40007001	“Xoossay hinttenttu bolla pirddenna mala, hinttekka haratuwaa bolla pirddoppite.
40007002	Ayissi gooppe, hinttenttu haratuwaa bolla pirddiyaawaadan, Xoossay hinttenttu bolla pirddana; qassi hinttenttu haratuwaassi immanaw makkiyaabaan I hinttew makkana.
40007003	Ne ayfiyan de7iyaa tuussaa be7akka; shin ne ishaa ayfiyan de7iyaa suullaa ayissi xeellay?
40007004	Woy ne ayfiyan tuussay de7ishshin, neeni ne ishaa, ‘Taani ne ayfiyaappe suullaa kessoo’ waanaade gaanaw danddayay?
40007005	Laa ha lo77uwaa malatiyaa iitaw! Kasetaade ne ayfiyaappe tuussaa kessadigga; hewaappe guyyiyan, ne ishaa ayfiyaappe suullaa kessanaw geeshshaade xeellanaw danddayaa.
40007006	“Geeshshabaa kanatuwassi immoppite; unttunttu guyye simmiide, hinttena sa77ana. Qassi inqquwaa geetettiyaa hinttenttu al77o shuchchaa gudunthatuwaa sinthan oloppite; unttunttu barenttu gediyan yedhdhana.
40007007	“Woossite; hintte akkana. Koyyite; hintte demmana. Kariyaakko yiide xeesite; hinttew penggi dooyettana.
40007008	Ayissi gooppe, woossiyaa ubbay akkana; koyyiyaa uray demmana; qassi kariyaakko yiide xeesiyaa uraw penggi dooyettana.
40007009	Woy hinttenttu giddon bare na7ay, ‘Ukithaa imma’ gooppe, shuchchaa immiyaa aawuu de7ii?
40007010	Qassi, ‘Moliyaa imma’ gooppe, aw shooshshaa immanawee?
40007011	Hinttenttu iita gidiidde, hinttenttu naanatuwassi lo77obaa immiyaawaa erooppe, yaatina, saluwan de7iyaa hinttenttu Aawuu barena woossiyaawanttussi lo77obaa wooti darissi immennee!
40007012	“Hewaa diraw, hara asay hinttew oothanaw koyyiyaa ubbabaa hinttekka asaw oothite; ayissi gooppe, Muse higgiyaa bilethaynne nabatuu tamaarissiyaawe hawaa.
40007013	“Un77a penggiyaanna gelite. Ayissi gooppe, bayethaw afiyaa penggi aakuwaa; ogiikka woggaa. Hewaanna geliyaa asaykka cora.
40007014	“Shin, de7oo afiyaa penggi un77a; ogiikka xunthaa. Qassi hewaa demmiyaawanttukka guutha.
40007015	“Bolla bagganna dorssaa malatiide, hinttekko yiyaa worddo nabatuwaappe naagettite; shin unttunttu garssa bagganna wallatuwaa mala.
40007016	Unttunttu ayfiya ayfiyaawaan hintte unttuntta erana; agunthay woddenthaa ayfiyaa ayfenna; gomi77oriikka kookiyaa ayfiyaa ayfenna.
40007017	Hewaadankka, lo77o mithaa ubbay lo77o ayfiya ayfee; shin iita mithay iita ayfiyaa ayfee.
40007018	Lo77o mithay iita ayfiyaa ayfanaw danddayenna; qassi iita mithaykka lo77o ayfiyaa ayfanaw danddayenna.
40007019	Lo77o ayfiyaa ayfenna mithaa ubbay qanxxettiide, tamaan yegettana.
40007020	Hewaa diraw, hintte unttunttu ayfiyaa ayfiyaawaan unttuntta eranita.
40007021	“Saluwan de7iyaa Ta Aabbu geeddawaa oothiyaa uray saluwaa kawutethaa gelanaappe attin, ‘Godaw, Godaw’ giyaa ubbay gelenna.
40007022	Pirdda gallassi daro asay taana, ‘Godaw, Godaw, nuuni ne sunthan Xoossay kiittowaa odibeykkoo? Ne sunthan xalahatuwaa kessibeykkoo? Qassi nuuni Xoossay oothiyaa maalalissiyaabaa ne sunthaan oothibeykkoo?’ yaaganawantta.
40007023	Taani he wode unttuntta, ‘Taani hinttena ubbakka erikke; iitabaa oothiyaawanttu hintte ta matappe haakkite’ yaagana.
40007024	“Hewaa diraw, hawaa ta qaalaa sisiide oothiyaa ubbay mino zaallaa bolla bare golliya keexxeedda wozanaama asaa mala.
40007025	Iray bukkiide, di7uu di77eedda; carkkuukka carkkiide, he golliya sugeedda. Shin golli mino zaallaa bolla keexetteedda diraw, kunddibeenna.
40007026	“Hawaa ta qaalaa sisiide oothenna asay ubbay, bare golliya shafiyaa bolla keexxeedda booza asaa mala.
40007027	Iray bukkiide, di7uu di77eedda; carkkuukka carkkiide, he golliya sugina, golli ellekka kunddeedda. He golli wolqqaama kunddethaa kunddeedda.”
40007028	Yesuusi bare haasayiyawaa wursseedda wode, asay I tamaarissiyawaan maalaletteeddino.
40007029	Ayissi gooppe, I unttuntta tamaarissiidde, Muse higgiya tamaarissiyaawanttudaan gidennaan, maatay de7iyaa asaadan tamaarisso diraassa.
40008001	Yesuusi deriyaappe wodhdheedda wode, cora asay A kaalleedda.
40008002	He wode oolluu oyqqeedda itti bitani Yesuusakko yi A sinthaan gulbbatiide, “Godaw, ne shene gidooppe, taana pathaade geeshshanaw danddayaa” yaageedda.
40008003	Yesuusi bare kushiyaa yeddi A bochchiide, “Taani koyyay; paxaade geeyya!” yaageedda. Ellekka oolluu bitaniyaa yeddi aggeedda.
40008004	Yesuusi A, “Simmi hawaa oossinne odoppa; shin qeesaakko baade ne paxaade geeyyeeddawaa A bessa; ne paxaade geeyyeeddawaa asaa erissanaw Muse azazeedda yarshshuwaa Xoossaw yarshsha” yaageedda.
40008005	-
40008006	Yesuusi Qifirinaahooma katamaa geleedda wode, itti Roomaa gade Xeetuwaa Kaappuu aakko yiide, “Ta Godaw, ta qoomaa bollay gunddina, daro sakettiidde, soyin giseedda; hayyagodo taw pathaarikki” yaagi woosseedda.
40008007	Yesuusi, “Taani baade A pathana” yaageedda.
40008008	Shin xeetuwaa kaappuu zaariide, “Ta Godaw, neena ta soy gelissanaw taw bessenna; shin neeni qaalaa xalalaa haasaya; ta qoomay paxanawaa.
40008009	Ayissi gooppe, taani taappe bollanna de7iyaawanttoo eeno giyaa asa; qassi taappe garssaanna wottaaddaratuu de7iino. Taani ittuwaa, ‘Ba!’ gooppe bee; qassi yokkuwaa, ‘Haaya!’ gooppe yee; ta qoomaa, ‘Hawaa ootha!’ gooppe oothee” yaageedda.
40008010	Yesuusi hewaa siseedda wode maalalettiide, barena kaalliyaa asaa, “Taani hinttew tumuwaa oday; taani hawaa mala ammanuwaa haray atto, Isra7eeliya gadiyankka be7abeykke.
40008011	Cora asay awayfi doliyaa baggappenne wulliyaa baggappe yiide, Abraahaamonna, Yisaaqannanne Yayiqoobanna saluwaa kawutethaa gayitaan ittippe uttanawantta yaagay.
40008012	Shin kawutethaan de7anaw bessiyaa asay wolqqaama dhumaa garssa kare olettana; hewaan unttunttu yeekkananne barenttu achchaa dhaqanawantta” yaageedda.
40008013	Hewaappe kaalla Yesuusi xeetuwaa kaappuwaa, “Ne soy ba; neeni ammaneeddawaadan new hano” yaageedda; xeetuwaa kaappuwaa qoomay he saatiyankka paxi aggeedda.
40008014	Yesuusi Phexiroosa soy biide, A bollotatta qoxuwaa harggaade giseeddawunno be7eedda.
40008015	Izi kushiyaa Yesuusi bochchina, qoxuu izo bashi aggeedda; izakka denddaade aw miyaabaa giigissaaddu.
40008016	-
40008017	Sa7ay omarsseedda wode, asay iita ayyaanatu oyqqeedda cora asaa Yesuusakko aheedda; nabiyaa Iisiyaasi, “I nu daaburaa barew akkeedda; qassi nu harggiyaakka tookkeedda” yaageeddawe polettana mala, Yesuusi iita ayyaanatuwaa bare qaalaan kessiide, harggeedda asaa ubbaakka patheedda.
40008018	Yesuusi cora asay bare yuushshuwaan de7iyaawantta be7iide, abbaappe hefintha pinnana mala, barena kaalliyaawantta azazeedda.
40008019	Hewaappe guyyiyaan Muse higgiyaa tamaarissiyaa ittuu aakko yiide, “Tamaarissiyaawoo, neeni biyaasaa ubbaa taani neena kaallana” yaageedda.
40008020	Yesuusi A, “Worakanatuwassi ollay de7ee; kafatuwaassikka keethay de7ee; shin Taw, Asaa Na7aw, shemppa akkiyaasaykka baawa” yaageedda.
40008021	Qassi kaalliyaawanttuppe ittuu Yesuusa, “Godaw, taani sinthata baade ta aabba mooganaw ba yaagaarikkii” yaageedda.
40008022	Shin Yesuusi A, “Neeni taana kaalla; hayqqeeddawanttu barenttu anhaa moogino” yaageedda.
40008023	Yesuusi wonggiriyaan geloode, A kaalliyaawanttu aananna beeddino.
40008024	Beetay wonggiriyaa mittana gakkanaw, abbaan wolqqaama hobbii denddeedda; shin Yesuusi gemi77isheedda.
40008025	A kaalliyaawanttu aakko biide, gemi77ishuwaappe dentheeddino; hewaappe simmiide A, “Godaw, nuuni dhayeetto; nuuna ashshaarikkii” yaageeddino.
40008026	Yesuusi unttuntta, “Ha ammanuu pacceeddawanttoo, ayissi yayyiitee?” yaageedda. Hewaappe guyyiyan denddiide, gotuwanne beetaa aggite giina, gotuunne beetay co77u geedda.
40008027	Asay maalalettiide, “Hawe laa haray atto, gotuunne beetay azazettiyaawe ayba asee?” yaageeddino.
40008028	Yesuusi Galiilaa abbaappe hefinthan de7iyaa Gerggesenoona geetettiyaa gadiyaa pinneedda; iita ayyaanatuu oyqqeedda laa77u asatuu he gadiyaan de7iyaawanttu duufuwaappe kesiide, aananna gaketteeddino. Unttunttu daro iita gidiyaa diraw, ooninne he ogiyaanna aadhdhanaw danddayibeenna.
40008029	Unttunttu barenttu qaalaa dhoqqu oothiide, “Xoossaa Na7aw, nuunanna new ayi allaalli de7ii? Wodii gakkennaan nuuna muranaw yaaddii?” yaageeddino.
40008030	Unttunttuppe laafaa haakkiyaasan gudunthaa wudii heemettee.
40008031	Iita ayyanatuu Yesuusa, “Neeni nuuna kessiyawaa gidooppe, hini gudunthaa wudiyaa giddo yeddaarkkii” yaagiide woosseeddino.
40008032	Yesuusi unttuntta, “Biite!” giina unttunttu bitanatuwaappe kesi biide, gudunthatuwan geleeddino. Gudunthaa wudii ubbay kakaa lanqqiyanna kajjottiidde, abbaan geliide, mitetti aggeeddino.
40008033	Gudunthaa wudiyaa heemmiyaawanttu baqatiide katamaa bi aggeeddino; beeddasaan iita ayyanatuu oyqqeedda asatuu haneeddabaa ubbaa odeeddino.
40008034	Hewaa siseedda katamaan de7iyaa asay ubbay Yesuusanna gakettanaw keseeddino; A be7eedda wode, barenttu gadiyaappe baana mala woosseeddino.
40009001	Hawaappe kaalla Yesuusi wonggiriyaan geliide, abbaa pinniide, bare katamaa yeedda.
40009002	Amareedda asay bollay gunddeeddda itti bitaniyaa shanchchamaan tookkiide, Yesuusakko aheeddino; Yesuusi unttunttu ammanuwaa be7iide, bollay gunddeeddda bitaniyaa, “Ta na7aw, yayyoppa; ne nagaray atto geetetteedda” yaageedda.
40009003	Higgiyaa tamaarissiyaawanttuppe ittu ittu barenttu wozanaan, “Laa ha bitani Xoossaa bolla iitabaa haasayeettee!” yaagi qoppeeddino.
40009004	Yesuusi unttunttu qofaa eriide, unttuntta hawadaan yaageedda; “Hinttenttu hintte wozanaan hawa mala iitabaa ayissi qoppiitee?
40009005	‘Ne nagaray atto geetetteedda’ yaagiyaawe mateeyee? Woy, ‘Dendda eqqaade hametta’ yaagiyaawe matee?
40009006	Shin sa7aa bollan nagaraa atto gaanaw taw, Asaa Na7aw, maatay de7iyaawaa taani hinttena erissana” yaagiide, hewaappe guyye I he bollay gunddeedda bitaniyaa, “Dendda eqqa; yaataade ne shanchchamaa tookkaade, ne golle ba” yaageedda.
40009007	Gunddeedda bitaniikka denddi eqqiide, bare golle beedda.
40009008	Shin daro asay hewaa be7iide yayyeeddino; asaw hawaa mala maataa immeedda Xoossaa galateeddino.
40009009	Yesuusi hewaanna aadhdhiidde, Maatoossa yaagiyaawe qaraxaa qanxxiyaa saan utteeddawaa demmiide A, “Taana kaalla” yaageedda. Maatoossikka denddi eqqiide, A kaalleedda.
40009010	Yesuusi Maatoossa gollen qumaa maanaw utti de7ishshin, qaraxaa akkiya cora asaynne nagaranchchatuu yiide, aanannanne A kaalliyaawanttunna ittippe gayitaan utteeddino.
40009011	Itti itti Parisaawatuu hewaa be7iide, Yesuusa kaalliyawantta, “Hinttena tamaarissiyaawe qaraxaa qanxxiyaawanttunnanne nagaranchchatuwanna qumaa ayissi ittippe mii?” yaageeddino.
40009012	Shin Yesuusi unttunttu yaagiyaawaa sisiide, “Hargganchchatuwaassappe attin, paxatuwaassi aakimii koshshenna.
40009013	Shin hinttenttu biide, Xoossaa Maxaafay, ‘Taani maarotethaa koyyayppe attin, yarshshuwaa koyyikke’ yaagiyaawe waagiyaawentto erite; ayissi gooppe, taani nagaranchchatuwaa xeesanaw yeeddawaappe attin, xillatuwaa xeesanaw yabeykke” yaageedda.
40009014	He wode Yohaannisa kaalliyawanttu Yesuusakko yiide, “Nuuninne Parisaawatuu ubba wode xoomeetto; shin neena kaalliyawanttu ayissi xoomikkinoo?” yaagiide A oochcheeddino.
40009015	Yesuusi unttuntta, “Bullachchaa yeedda asay machchatto akkiyawe barenttunna de7ishshin, kayyottanaw danddayiinoo? Danddayikkino; shin machchatto akkiyawaa unttunttu matappe afana wodii yaana; unttunttu he wode xoomanawantta” yaageedda.
40009016	“Eca mayuwaa bolla ooratha dhefiyaa wothiide sikkiyaa asay baawa; ayissi gooppe, ooratha dhefii eca mayuwaa peedhereethana; peedhethaykka kasewaappe daranawaa.
40009017	Ho77o woyiniyaa eessaa eca ogoruwan naa77iyaa asay baawa. Shin naa77ooppe, he woyiniyaa eessay ogoruwaa daakkana; barewukka woofettana; ogoruukka bayanawaa. Shin, ho77o woyiniyaa eessaa ooratha ogoruwaan naa77anaw bessee; laa77uukka baykkino” yaageedda.
40009018	Yesuusi unttunttoo hewaa odishshin, Ayihude Woosa Golle kaappatuwaappe ittuu aakko yi A sinthaan gulbbatiide, “Ta naatta ha77i hayqqaaddu; shin neeni yaade ne kushiyaa izi bolla wothaarikkii; iza de7uwaan de7anawunnu” yaageedda.
40009019	Yesuusi denddiide, barena kaalliyawanttunna ittippe bitaniyaa kaalliide beedda.
40009020	He wode tammanne laa77u laythaa kumenthaa, izi bollaappe suuthay goggiyaa itti mishiratta guyyenna shiiqaade, Yesuusa mayuwaa macaraa bochchaaddu.
40009021	Hawaa iza udowe, iza bare wozanaan, “Taani A mayuwaa xalalaa bochchantto paxana” yaagaade qoppaaddu.
40009022	Shin Yesuusi yuuyyi izo xeelliide, “Ta naattee, yayyoppa; neena ne ammanuu patheedda” yaageedda. He man77iyankka mishiratta paxaa aggaaddu.
40009023	Yesuusi Ayihuda Woosa Golle kaappuwaa soy gakkeedda wode, yeekuwan dinkkaa punniyaa asaanne yeekkiyaa asaa be7iide,
40009024	“Kare kesite; guutha naatta gemi77ishaadduppe attin, hayqqabeykku” yaageedda. Hewaappe guyyiyan asay A bolla darii miicceedda.
40009025	Shin cora asaa kare I kesseeddawaappe guyyiyan, golle geliide, naatti kushiyaa oyqqeedda; naattakka dendda aggaaddu.
40009026	He waarii, he man77iyankka he gadiyan ubbaan sisetteedda.
40009027	Yesuusi hewaanna aadhdhiide biyaa wode, laa77u qooqatuu barenttu qaalaa dhoqqu udiide, “Daawite na7aw, nuuna maaraarikki” yaagiidde A kaalleeddino.
40009028	Yesuusi golle geleeddda wode, qooqatuu aakko yeeddino; Yesuusi unttuntta, “Taani hawaa oothanaw danddayiyaawaa ammaniitee?” yaageedda. Unttunttu, “E Godaw” yaagi zaareeddino.
40009029	Hewaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi unttunttu ayfiyaa bare kushiyaan bochchiide unttuntta, “Hinttew hinttenttu ammanuwaadan hano” yaageedda.
40009030	Unttunttu ayfii dooyetti aggeedda; Yesuusi unttunttoo, “Hawaa oossinne odoppite” yaagiide minissiide odeedda.
40009031	Shin unttunttu biide, he gadiyaa ubbaan Yesuusabaa odeeddino.
40009032	Unttunttu kesiide biya wode, amareedda asay iita ayyanay oyqqina duudeedda bitaniyaa Yesuusakko aheeddino.
40009033	Yesuusi iita ayyaanaa kesseeddawaappe guyyiyan, duude bitani haasayeedda. Asay, “Hawe oorathabaa; hawaa malabay Isra7eeliyaa gadiyaan ubbakka hanibeenna” yaagi maalaletteeddino.
40009034	Shin Parisaawatuu, “I iita ayyaanatuwaa kaappuwaa wolqqaan xalahatuwaa kessee” yaageeddino.
40009035	Yesuusi unttuntta Ayihuda woosa golletuwan tamaarissiiddenne kawutethaa wonggalaa mishiraachchuwaa odiidde, qassi harggiyaa ubbaappenne sakuwaa ubbaappe asaa pathiidde, wogga katamatuwaninne qeeri katamatuwaa ubbaan yuuyyeedda.
40009036	Cora asaa be7iide, heemmiyaa asay baynna dorssaadan asay hirggettiyaa dirawunne asaa maaddiyaabay baynna diraw, asaw qaretteedda.
40009037	Yaatiide barena kaalliyaawantta, “Qoychchaw gakka kathay dara; shin cakkiyaa asay guutha.
40009038	Simmi kathaa Goday kathaa cakkanaw oosanchchatuwaa yeddana mala, A woossite” yaageedda.
40010001	Yesuusi bare tammanne laa77u kaalliyawantta xeesiide, unttunttu iita ayyaanaa kessana mala, qassi harggiyaa ubbaanne sakuwaa ubbaa pathana mala, unttunttoo maataa immeedda.
40010002	Yesuusi kiitteedda tammanne laa77atuwaa sunthay, koyrowe Phexiroosa geetettiyaa Simoonanne A ishaa Inddiraasa, Zabiddiyoosa naanaa, Yayiqoobanne Yohaannisa,
40010003	Piliphphoosa, Barttalamoosa, Toomaasa, qaraxaa akkiya Maatoossa, Ilppiyoosa na7aa Yayiqoobanne Taadoosa;
40010004	bare gadew qarettiyaa Simoonanne Yesuusa aathi immeedda Asqqorootu Yihudaa.
40010005	Yesuusi ha tammanne laa77atuwaa hawaadan yaagiide kiitteedda; “Ayihuda gidenna asaa gadiyaa booppite; qassi Samaaretuwaa katamaakka geloppite;
40010006	hewaa diraa bayeedda dorssaakko, Isra7eeliya asaakko
40010007	biide, ‘Saluwaa kawutethay mateedda’ yaagiide odite.
40010008	Hargganchchatuwaa pathite; anhaa hayquwaappe denthite; oolluu oyqqeeddawantta pathite; iita ayyanatuwakka kessite. Hinttenttu coo akkeeddita; coo immite.
40010009	Worqqaa woy biraa woy santtimiyaa hinttenttu kiisiyan oyqqoppite;
40010010	woy ogew qarcciitiyaa, woy laa7ethiyaa mayuwaa, woy caammaa woy xam77aa oyqqoppite. Ayissi gooppe, oosanchchaw koshshiyaabay qumaa.
40010011	“Hinttenttu geliyaa katamaan woy qeeri katamaa ubbaan hinttena mokkanaw nashettiyaawe oonentto akeekan xomoosite; hinttenttu hewaappe kesana gakkanaw, hewaan uttite.
40010012	Qassi golle geliidde sarotite.
40010013	He gollen de7iyaa asay hinttena mokkooppe, hinttenttu saroteedda sarotay unttuntta gakko. Shin unttunttu hinttena mokkennaan ixxooppe, hinttenttu saroteedda sarotay hinttew guyye simmo.
40010014	Qassi itti itti golli woy katamay hinttena mokkennaan woy hinttenttu odiyaawaa sisennaan ixxooppe, he golleppe woy he katamaappe kesiidde, hinttenttu gediyaappe baanaa shocite.
40010015	Taani hinttew tumuwaa oday; Xoossay pirddiyaa gallassi he katamaa asaappe, Sodoomaa katamaa asawunne Gamooraa katamaa asaw pirddaa kawushissana.
40010016	“Be7ite! Taani hinttena dorssaa wallatuwaa giddo yeddiyaawaadan yedday. Hewaa diraw, shooshshaadan cincca gidite; qassi haraphphiyaadan, ashikke gidite.
40010017	Shin asaappe naagettite. Ayissi gooppe, asay hinttena pirdda gollew aathiide immana; qassi bare Ayihuda woosa golletuwaanikka hinttena lissuwan peeddana.
40010018	Gadiyaa ayissiyaawanttu sinthaaninne kaatatuwaa sinthaan ta diraw hinttenttu eqqiide, unttunttussinne Ayihuda gidenna asaa sinthaan taw markka gidanita.
40010019	Shin unttunttu hinttena pirddaw aathiyaa wode, hinttenttu haasayanabaa he saatiyaan Xoossay hinttew immiya diraw, hinttenttu gaanabawunne woy waagiide haasayanenttonne hirggoppite.
40010020	Ayissi gooppe, hinttenttun aqiide haasayiyaawe hinttenttu Aawuuwaa Geeshsha Ayyaanaappe attin, haasayiyaawanttu hinttentta gidikkita.
40010021	“Ishay bare ishaa, aawuu bare na7aa bolla denddana; naanay barenttu aattinne aawuwaa bolla denddiide, unttuntta wodhissana.
40010022	Qassi asay ubbay hinttentta ta sunthaa diraw ixxana; shin wursethay gakkanaw gencciyaawe attanawaa.
40010023	Unttunttu hinttena itti katamaappe yederssooppe, hara katamaa biite. Ayissi gooppe, taani hinttew tumuwaa gay; taani, Asaa Na7ay, yaana gakkanaw, hinttenttu hintte oosuwaa Isra7eeliyaa katamaa ubbaan oothiide wurssikkita.
40010024	“Tamaariyaawe barena tamaarissiyaawaappe darenna; qoomaykka bare godaappe darenna.
40010025	Tamaariyaawe barena tamaarissiyaawaa keena gidiyaawe, qoomaykka bare godaa keena gidiyaawe aw gidana; unttunttu golle godaa Bi7eel-Zeebula giide xeesooppe, A golle asaa waagi xeesaneeshsha!
40010026	“Simmi asaassi yayyoppite; ayissi gooppe, genthi wotheeddabay qoncciyaa kesennaan attenna; qoseeddabaykka erettennaan attenna.
40010027	Taani hinttenttoo dhumaani odiyaabaa poo7uwan haasayite; hinttew haythaan saasukkiide odeeddawaa, dhoqqa saan awaayyite.
40010028	Ashuwaa wodhiyaawanttoo yayyoppite; unttunttu, shemppuwaa wodhanaw danddaykkino. Shin shemppuwaanne ashuwaa Gaannamiyan dhayissanaw danddayiyaa Xoossaassi yayyite.
40010029	Laa77u suunniyaa kafatuu santtimiyaan zali77ettikkinoo? Hinttenttu Aawuuwaa sheniyaa gidana dhayooppe, he suunniyaa kafatuwaappe ittinnakka sa7aan wodhdhaade bayukku.
40010030	Shin haray atto, hinttenttu huuphiyan de7iyaa binnanay ubbaykka payduwaan de7ee.
40010031	Simmi yayyoppite; daro suunniyaa kafatuwaappe hinttenttu aadhdhiita.
40010032	“Hewaa diraw, asaa sinthaan tabaa markkattiyaa oossi gidooppenne, taanikka saluwan de7iya ta Aabbu sinthan markkattana;
40010033	shin asaa sinthaan taana kaddiyaa oonanne taanikka qassi saluwan de7iya ta Aabbu sinthaan A kaddana.
40010034	“Taani sa7aassi sarotethaa ahanaw yeeddawaa hinttessi malatoppo; taani tooraa ahanaw yeeddawaappe attin, sarotethaa ahanaw yabeykke.
40010035	Ayissi gooppe, taani na7aa A aabbuppe, naatto izi daayippe, na7aa machchattokka izi bollotattippe shaakkanaw yaaddi;
40010036	asaassi morkketuu A golle asatuwaa gidanawantta.
40010037	“Bare aabba woy bare daayo taappe aathiide siiqiyaawe tawaa gidanaw bessenna; bare attuma na7aa woy bare macca naatto taappe aathiide siiqiyaawe tawaa gidanaw bessenna.
40010038	Bare masqqaliyaa tookkiide, ta geeduwaa kaallennawe tawaa gidanaw bessenna.
40010039	Bare shemppuwaa ashshiyaawe bayizzanawaa; shin ta diraw bare shemppuwaa bayizziyaawe ashshanawaa.
40010040	“Hinttentta mokkiyaawe taana mokkee; qassi taana mokkiyaawe taana kiitteeddawaa mokkee.
40010041	Nabiyaa, nabiyaa sunthaan mokkiyaawe, nabiyaa gatiyaa aananna gishettanawaa; qassi xilluwaa, xilluwaa sunthaan mokkiyaawe, xilluwaa gatiyaa aananna gishettanawaa.
40010042	Ooninne ha taana kaalliyaawanttuppe guuxxiyaa ittoo, haray atto buliyaa haathaa xalalaa ushanaw immooppekka, taani hinttenttoo tumuwaa gay; I bare gatiyaa akkana” yaageedda.
40011001	Yesuusi bare tammanne laa77u kaalliyawantta azaziyaawaa poleedda wode, hewaappe denddiide, katamatuwaan tamaarissanawunne odanaw beedda.
40011002	Xammaqiyaa Yohaannisi qasho gollen de7iidde, Yesuusi ootheeddawaa sisiide, barena kaalliyawantta aakko kiittiide,
40011003	“Yaanawe neeneeyee? Woy haraa naaganee?” yaagi oochchanaadan udeedda.
40011004	Yesuusi zaariide, unttunttoo hawadaan yaageedda; “Biide hinttenttu be7iyaawaanne sisiyaawaa Yohaannisaw odite;
40011005	qooqatuu xeelliino; wobbatuu hamettiino; oolluu oyqqeeddawanttu paxiide geeyyiino; tullatuu sisiino; hayqqeeddawanttu denddiino; hiyyeesatuu wonggalaa mishiraachchuwaa sisiino.
40011006	Tabaa sidhenna uray anjjetteeddaawaa” yaageedda.
40011007	Yohaannisa kaalliyaawanttu simmi beedda wode, Yesuusi Yohaannisabaa shiiqeedda asaassi hawaadan yaagi haasayeedda; “Ayaa be7anaw asay de7enna mela biittaa keseedditee? Carkkuu qaathiyaa maqqaa be7anaw keseedditee?
40011008	Yaatina, ayaa be7anaw keseedditee? Lo77iyaa mayuwaa mayyeedda bitaniyaa be7anaw keseedditee? Lo77iyaa mayuwaa mayyeeddawanttu kaatatuwaa gollen de7iino.
40011009	Yaatina, ayaa be7anaw keseedditee? Nabiyaa be7anaw keseedditee? E, Taani hinttew oday; nabiyaappekka aadhdhiyaawaa be7eeddita.
40011010	Ayissi gooppe, Xoossaa Maxaafan, ‘Xoossay, “Be7a, taani kiittiyaawaa neeppe sinthaw yeddana. I new ogiyaa giigissanawaa” yaageedda geetettiide Yohaannisabay xaafetteedda.
40011011	Taani hinttenttoo tumuwaa oday; aatti uluwaappe yeletteedda asaa ubbaan Xammaqiyaa Yohaannisappe aadhdhiyaawe ooninne denddibeenna; shin saluwaa kawutethaan ubbaappe laafiyaawe aappe aadhdhana.
40011012	Xammaqiyaa Yohaannisa wodiyaappe doommiide, hachche gakkanaw, saluwaa kawutethatta daro naaqettaw; minni baaxetiyaawanttu izo demmiino.
40011013	Ayissi gooppe, nabatuu ubbatuunne Muse higgii Yohaannisa wodii gakkanaw, timbbitiyaa haasayeeddino;
40011014	simmi hinttenttu unttunttu haasayowaa ammananawaa gidooppe, yaanawaa geetetteedda Eelaas ha Yohaannisa.
40011015	Sisiyaa haythay de7iyaawe siso!
40011016	“Shin taani ha wodiyaa asaa ayaanna leemisoo? Unttunttu qocaan uttiyaa naanaa malatiino; unttunttu barenttu laggethatuwaa xeesiide,
40011017	‘Nuuni hinttenttoo hixixiyaa punneeddo; shin duribeykkita; yeekuwaa yethaakka kesseeddo; shin yeekkibeykkita’ yaagiino.
40011018	Ayissi gooppe, Yohaannisi xoomiiddinne woyiniyaa eessaa ushennaan yiina unttunttu, ‘A bolla iita ayyanay de7ee’ yaageeddino.
40011019	Taani, Asaa Na7ay, maaddenne ushaadde yiina, unttunttu taana, ‘Ha nafisaamaanne woyiniyaa eessaa ushiyaawaa be7ite; qaraxaa qanxxiyaawanttunnanne nagaranchchatuwanna siiqettee’ yaagiino; shin Xoossaa aadhdheedda eratethay bare oosuwaan tuma gidiide beettee” yaageedda.
40011020	Hewaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi bare malaataappe dariya baggaa ootheedda katamatuwaan de7iya asay barenttu nagaraappe simmibeenna diraw, unttuntta hawadaan yaagiide, toshiyaa doommeedda;
40011021	“Koraaziine katamaw, new aayyero; Beetesayda katamaw, newukka aayyero; ayissi gooppe, hinttenttu bolla Xoossay ootheedda malaatay Xiiroosa katamaaninne Sidoonaa katamaan oosettowaa gidintto, unttunttu maaqiyaa mayyiide, bidinthaa okettiide, beni barenttu nagaraappe simmanawanttashshin.
40011022	Taani hinttew oday; pirddaa gallassi Xoossay hintteppe Xiiroosa katamawunne Sidoonaa katamaw pirddaa kawushissana.
40011023	Qassi Qifirinaahooma katamaw, neeni saluwaa pude dhoqqu gaanaw koyyaaddii? Neeni Si7ooliyaa duge yegettana; ayissi gooppe, ne bolla Xoossay ootheedda malaatay Sodoomaa katamaan oosettowaa gidintto, Sodoomaa katamay hachche gakkanaassikka de7anawaashshin.
40011024	Taani hinttew oday; pirddaa gallassi Xoossay neeppe Sodoomaw pirddaa kawushissana” yaageedda.
40011025	Yesuusi he wode zaariide, hawadaan yaageedda; “Ta Aabboo, saluwaa sa7aa Godaw, neeni hawaa aadhdheedda eranchchatuwaappenne akeekanchchatuwaappe genthaade, erenna naanatuwassi qonccisseedda diraw, neena galatay;
40011026	E ta Aabboo, ayissi gooppe, hawe ne sheniyaadan oosetteedda.
40011027	“Ta Aabbu taw ubbabaa immeedda; Aawuwaappe haray Na7aa erenna; Na7aappenne Na7ay Aawuuwaa qonccissanaw koyyiyaa asaappe attin, haray Aawuwaa erenna.
40011028	“Daaburanchchatoo, deexuwaa tookkowanttoo ubbatoo, taakko haa yiite; taani hinttentta shemppissana.
40011029	Taani garanne ta wozanaan ashikke gido diraw, ta morgge mithaan waaxettite; taappe tamaarite; hinttenttu sheemppuwassikka hintte shemppuwaa demmana.
40011030	Ayissi gooppe, ta morgge mithay giigaa; qassi taani hinttentta toosseeddawekka kawushsha” yaageedda.
40012001	Yesuusi he wode Sambbata gallassi, tisha banggaa giddonna aadhdhishshin A kaalliyaawanttu koshattiide, tisha banggaa duuthiide, muussaa doommeeddino.
40012002	Shin Parisaawatuu hewaa be7iide Yesuusa, “Be7a, neena kaalliyawanttu Sambbata gallassi oothanaw woga gidennabaa oothiino” yaageeddino.
40012003	Shin Yesuusi unttunttussi hawadaan yaageedda; “Daawitenne aananna de7iyaawanttu koshatteedda wode, Daawite ootheeddawaa nabbabibeykkitee?
40012004	Daawite Xoossaa golle geliide, qeesatuwaa xalalay maanaappe attin, iinne aananna de7iyaawanttu maanaw woga gidenna Xoossaassi yarshsheedda qumaa meedda.
40012005	Woy Sambbataa ubbaan Geeshsha Golliyan de7iya qeesatuu Sambbataa wogaa menthiyaawaa, qassi unttunttussi hewe bayizzo gidennawaa Muse higgiyan nabbabibeykkitee?
40012006	Shin taani hinttew oday; Geeshsha Golliyaappe aadhdhiyaawe hawaan de7ee.
40012007	Xoossaa Maxaafay, ‘Taani maarotethaa koyyayppe attin, yarshshuwaa koyyikke’ yaagiyaawe waagiyaawentto hinttenttu eriitentto, bayizzuu baynna asaa bolla pirddikkita.
40012008	Ayissi gooppe, taani, Asaa Na7ay, Sambbataa Godaa” yaageedda.
40012009	Yesuusi hewaappe denddiide, Ayihuda woosa golle beedda.
40012010	Hewaan kushii gunddeedda itti bitani de7ee; Yesuusa mootanaw gaasuwaa koyyiyaa asatuu, “Sambbataan, hargganchchaa pathiyaawe wogee?” yaagiide A oochcheeddino.
40012011	Yesuusi unttuntta, “Hinttenttu giddon itti dorssay de7iya uray, he dorssay Sambbata gallassi ollaan kunddooppe, oyqqiide kessennawe oone?
40012012	Yaatina, asay dorssaappe wooti loythiide darennee! Hewaa diraw, Sambbata gallassi lo77obaa oothiyaawe woga” yaageedda.
40012013	Hewaappe guyyiyan bitaniyaa, “Ne kushiyaa piddi ootha” yaagina bitani piddi oothowaappe guyyiyan, A kushii yokko kushiyaawadankka paxi aggeedda.
40012014	Shin Parisaawatuu kare kesiide, Yesuusa wooti wodhanentto maqqetteeddino.
40012015	Shin Yesuusi unttunttu zoretaa eriide, hewaappe aggiide biya wode, daro asay A kaalleedda; harggeedda ubbaa patheedda.
40012016	-
40012017	Xoossay nabiyaa Isiyaasa bagganna odeeddawe polettana mala, Yesuusi asatuwassi, “Tabaa hara asaassi odoppite” yaageedda.
40012018	Xoossay Isiyaasa bagganna hawadaan yaageedda; “Taani dooreedda ta ayillii, taani siiqiyaa, taana nashechchiyaawe haweku. Taani ta Ayyaanaa A bolla wothana. I suure pirddaa asaw ubbaw odanawaa.
40012019	I palumettenna; woy waasseenna. Bare qaalaakka ogiyaan sissenna.
40012020	Suure pirdday xooni kesana gakkanaw, tinccetteedda maqqaa menthenna qassi cuwattiyaa muqaaddaa qunccuutiyaakka I toyissenna.
40012021	Ayihuda gidenna asay ubbay aabolla barenttu hidootaa wothana” yaageedda.
40012022	Hewaappe guyyiyan, amareedda asatuu iita ayyanay oyqqina duudeedda itti qooqa bitaniyaa Yesuusakko aheeddino; Yesuusi he duude bitaniyaa patheedda; bitaniikka haasayaanne xeelaa doommeedda.
40012023	Asay ubbay maalalettiide, “Laa hawe Daawite na7aa gidanddeeshsha?” yaageeddino.
40012024	Shin Parisaawatuu hewaa sisiide, “Ha bitani iita ayyaanatuwaa kaappuu ‘Bi7eel-Zeebuli’ barew wolqqaa immina, xalahatuwaa kessee” yaageeddino.
40012025	Shin Yesuusi unttunttu qofaa eriide, unttuntta hawadaan yaageedda; “Bare giddon shaakettiyaa kawutethay ubbay dhayana; qassi bare giddon shaakettiyaa katamay woy gollen de7iyaa asaykka minnenna.
40012026	Qassi Seexaanay Seexaanaa kessiyaawaa gidooppe, bare giddon shaakettee; yaatina, A kawutethay waaniide minni eqqanawee?
40012027	Taw Bi7eel-Zeebuli wolqqaa immina, taani xalahatuwaa kessiyaawaa gidooppe, hinttenttu asaw wolqqaa ooni immina xalahatuwaa kessanee? Hewaa diraw, unttunttu hintte bolla pirddana.
40012028	Shin Xoossaa Geeshsha Ayyaanay taw wolqqaa immina, taani xalahatuwaa kessiyaawaa gidooppe, simmi Xoossaa kawutethay hintte bolla yidiggeedda.
40012029	“Woy asay kasetiide, wolqqaama asaa qachchennaan de7iidde, A golle geliide, A miishshaa bonqqanaw waaniide danddayii? Qachcheeddawaappe guyyiyan, A miishshaa bonqqanaw danddayee.
40012030	“Ta bagga gidenna uray tawaa ixxee; qassi taananna ittippe shiishshennawe laalee.
40012031	Hewaa diraw, taani hinttew oday; Xoossay asaw ay nagaraa gidinakka, qassi ay bore gidinakka atto gaana; shin Geeshsha Ayyaanaa boriyaawaa atto geenna.
40012032	Ta bolla, Asaa Na7aa bolla, iitabaa haasayiyaa O nagaraanne Xoossay atto gaana; shin Geeshsha Ayyaanaa bolla iitabaa haasayiyaa O nagaraanne sa7aan gidina, saluwankka Xoossay atto geenna.
40012033	“Lo77o ayfiyaa demmanaw lo77o mithaa dichchanaw bessee; iita mithaa hinttenttu dichchooppe, iita ayfiyaa demmanita; ayissi gooppe, mithay erettiyaawe bare ayfiyaa ayfiyawaana.
40012034	Shooshshatoo, hinttenttu iita gidiidde, wooti lo77obaa haasayanaw danddayiitee? Ayissi gooppe, doonay wozanaa giddon kumeeddawaa haasayee.
40012035	Lo77o asay bare lo77o minjjuwaappe lo77obaa kessee; qassi iita asay bare iita minjjuwaappe iitabaa kessee.
40012036	Taani hinttenttoo oday; asay bare haasayeedda maaddenna haasayaa ubbaw pirddaa gallassi zaaruwaa immanawaa.
40012037	Ayissi gooppe, ne haasayay neena xillissana; woy ne haasayay ne bolla pirddissana” yaageedda.
40012038	Hewaappe guyyiyan, higgiya tamaarissiyaa itti itti asaynne Parisaawatuu zaariide Yesuusa, “Tamaarissiyaawoo, neeni malaataa oothishshin, nuuni be7anaw koyyeetto” yaageeddino.
40012039	Shin I zaariide, unttunttoo hawadaan yaageedda; “Ha wodiyaa asay iitanne Xoossaa ammanenna diraw, malaataa koyyee; nabiyaa Yoonaasa malaataappe attin, hara malaatay imettenna.
40012040	Yoonaasi wogga moliyaa uluwaan heezzu gallassaanne heezzu qammaa de7eeddawaadan, Asaa Na7aykka, biittaa giddon heezzu gallassaanne heezzu qammaa de7anawaa.
40012041	Nennewe asay Yoonaasi odeeddawaan barenttu nagaraappe simmeedda diraw, pirddaa gallassi denddiide, hinttentta mootanawantta; beyte, Yoonaasappe aadhdhiyaawe hawaan de7ee.
40012042	Duge bagga gadiya kaatatta Solomonew de7iyaa aadho eratethaa sisanaw sa7aa gaxaappe yeedda diraw, pirddaa gallassi denddaade, hinttentta mootanawunnu; beyte, Solomoneppekka aadhdhiyaawe hawaan de7ee.
40012043	“Iita ayyaanay asaappe keseedda wode, barew shemppiyaasaa koyyiide, haathay baynna melasaanna yuuyyee; shin demmenna.
40012044	He wode, ‘Taani aggaade yeedda ta golle simmana’ yaagee; simmiide yiyaa wode, gollii mela de7iyaawaanne pitetti geeyyiide, giigi utteeddawaa demmee.
40012045	Hewaappe guyyiyan, biide bareppe iitiya laappu hara ayyaanatuwa akkiide yee; he ayyaanatuu geliide, hewaan de7iino. He bitaniyaa de7uu kasewaappe darii iitee. Ha wodiyaa iita asawukka qassi hewaadan hanana” yaageedda.
40012046	Yesuusi daro asaw haasayishshin, A daayanne A ishatuu aananna haasayanaw koyyiide, karen eqqeeddino.
40012047	Hewaan de7iyaa asaappe ittuu A, “Ne daayanne ne ishatuu neenanna haasayanaw koyyiide, karen eqqeeddino” yaageedda.
40012048	Shin Yesuusi zaariide, “Ta daaya oone? Ta ishatuu oone?” yaageedda.
40012049	Bare kushiyan barena kaalliyaawanttukko xorssiide, “Beyte, ta daayanne ta ishatuu hawanttushi.
40012050	Ayissi gooppe, saluwan de7iyaa ta Aabbu sheniyaa oothiyaa ubbay, ta ishaa, ta michchattonne ta daayo” yaageedda.
40013001	Yesuusi he gallassi soyippe kesiide, abbaa gaxaan utteedda.
40013002	Daro cora asay bare yuushshuwaan yuuyyi aadhdhiide shiiqina, wonggiriyaa giddo geliide utteedda; asay ubbay abbaa gaxaan eqqeedda.
40013003	Asaassi leemisuwan darobaa hawaadan yaagiide odeedda; “Itti bitani zerethaa zeranaw keseedda.
40013004	I zerishshin, itti itti zerethay ogiyaa doonan wodhdheedda; yaatina kafuu yiide meedda.
40013005	Qassi itti itti zerethay ancco gideedda biittaa bolla wodhdheedda; daro biittay baynna diraw, he zerethay ellekka doleedda.
40013006	Shin away keseedda wode carshshay shulleedda; adussa xaphuwaa yeddibeenna diraw melii aggeedda.
40013007	Itti itti zerethay agunthaa giddon wodhdheedda; hewaan doleeddawaa agunthay dicciide cuulleedda.
40013008	Itti itti zerethay tu7e biittaan wodhdhiide doleedda; ittuu xeetu ayfiyaa, ittuu usuppun tammuwaa, ittuu hattamuwaa ayfeedda.
40013009	Sisiyaa haythay de7iyaa uray siso!” yaageedda.
40013010	Yesuusa kaalliyaawanttu aakko shiiqiide, “Neeni ayissi asaassi leemisuwan oday?” yaageeddino.
40013011	Yesuusi zaariide, unttunttussi hawadaan yaageedda; “Hinttenttussi saluwaa kawutethaa xuuraa erussay imetteedda; shin unttunttussi imettibeenna.
40013012	Ayissi gooppe, de7iyaawoo gujettana; aw daranawaa; shin baynnawaappe haray atto, he de7iyaawekka akettanawaa.
40013013	Taani unttunttu xeelliidde xeellennawaadan, sisiidde sisennawaadan haniyaa diraw, woy qassi akeekenna diraw unttunttoo leemisuwan oday.
40013014	“Isiyaasi unttunttubaa hawaadan odowe polettanawaa; ‘Hinttenttu sissaa sisana; shin hinttenttoo gelenna; hinttenttu xeelaa xeellana; shin be7ikkita.
40013015	Ayissi gooppe, ha asaa wozanay guzumeedda; barenttu haythaa tullisseeddino; barenttu ayifiyaakka ciilummeeddino. Hawe baawentto, unttunttu barenttu ayfiyan be7ana; barenttu haythaan sisana; barenttu wozanankka akeekaanna; unttunttu taakko, Xoossaakko simmana; taanikka unttuntta pathana’ yaagee.
40013016	“Shin hinttenttu ayfii xeelliyaa dirawunne hinttenttu haythaykka sisiyaa diraw, hinttenttu anjjetteeddawantta.
40013017	Taani hinttenttoo tumuwaa oday; daro nabatuunne xillatuu hinttenttu be7iyaawaa be7anaw amotteeddino; shin be7ibeykkino. Hinttenttu sisiyaawaa sisanaw amotteeddino; shin sisibeykkino.
40013018	“Simmi kathaa zeriyaawaa leemisuwaa bilethay giyawaa sisite.
40013019	Kawutethaa qaalaa sisiide, akeekenna ooninne ogiyaa doonan wodhdheedda zerethaa mala; xalahiyaa kaappuu yiide, unttunttu wozanaan zeretteeddawaa maxi diggee.
40013020	Ancco biittaan wodhdheedda zerethay qaalaa sisiide, ellekka nashechchaan akkiyawantta malatee.
40013021	Shin he asatuu ha77issaappe attin, unttunttun xaphuu baawa; qaalaa gaasuwan metuu woy yedesay yiyaa wode, ellekka dhubetti aggiino.
40013022	Qassi agunthaa giddon wodhdheeddawe qaalaa sisiyaawaa bessee; shin ha sa7aa de7uwaassi hirggussaynne duretethaa siiqussay qaalaa cuullee; ha gasuwaan he zerethaykka ayfennaan atti aggee.
40013023	Tu7e biittaan zeretteeddawe, qaalaa sisiide, akeekiyaa asaa bessee; ikka ayfee; ittuu xeetuwaa, ittuu usuppun tammuwaa, ittuu hattamuwaa ayfee” yaageedda.
40013024	Yesuusi unttunttoo hara leemisuwaa hawaadan yaagiide odeedda; “Saluwaa kawutethay bare goshshan lo77o zerethaa zereedda bitaniyaa malatee.
40013025	Shin qamma asay gemi77ishidiggina, A morkkii yiide, zarggaa zereeddawaa bolla zaaringgiyaa zeriide beedda.
40013026	Shin zarggay doli ayfeedda wode, zaaringgi he wode beetteedda.
40013027	“A qoomatuu aakko yiide, ‘Godaw, neeni ne goshshan lo77o zerethaa zerabeykkii? Yaatina, zaaringgi haqappe yeeddee?’ yaageeddino.
40013028	“Hewaappe guyyiyan goday, ‘Hewaa morkkii ootheedda’ yaageedda. “Qoomatuu, ‘Nuuni biide shoddanaadan dosay?’ yaageeddino.
40013029	“Shin I, ‘Aggite, zaaringgiyaa hinttenttu shoddiidde, zarggaanna shoddanita.
40013030	Bochchoppite; qoyciyaa wodii gakkanaw, ittippe diccino. Qoyciyaa wodii gakkoode, taani qoyciyaawantta, kasetiide zaaringgiyaa maxite; tamaan guuddanaw pochchiyan pochchiyan qachchite; shin zarggaa shiishshiide diyyiyan qolite’ gaana” yaageedda.
40013031	Yesuusi unttunttoo hara leemisuwaa yaagiide odeedda; “Saluwaa kawutethay sannaaficiyaa geetettiyaa guutha mithatti ayfiya malatee; he mithatti ayfiya asay akkiide, bare goshshan zereedda.
40013032	He zerethatta hara zerethaa ubbaappe guuxxaw; shin dicceedda wode, hara atakilttiyaa ubbaappe daraw; kafuu yiide, izi qankkaan keexxiyaawaa keena wogga mithaa gidaaddu” yaageedda.
40013033	Qassikka Yesuusi hara leemisuwaa unttunttoo yaagiide odeedda; “Saluwaa kawutethay itti mishiratta heezzu keriyaa dhiilliyaa akkaade, munaqqeedda munaqay ubbay denddana gakkanaw, aani tigeedda irshshuwaa malatee” yaageedda.
40013034	-
40013035	Yesuusi asaw he ubbaa leemisuwan odeedda; leemisuu baynnaan I ittibaakka odenna; nabii, “Taani unttunttoo haasayiyaa wode, leemisuwan haasayay. Alamii medhettoodeppe doommiide geemmeedda yewatuwaa oday” yaageeddawe polettana mala, hewaa I odeedda.
40013036	Hewaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi asaa aggiide, soy geleedda; A kaalliyaawanttu aakko biide, “Goshshan de7iyaa zaaringgiyaa leemisuwaa bilethaa nuussi oda” yaageeddino.
40013037	Yesuusi zaariide, hawaadan yaageedda; “Lo77o zerethaa zeriyaawe Asaa Na7aa;
40013038	goshshay ha alamiyaa; lo77o zerethay Xoossaa kawutethaa asaa; zaaringgi xalahiyaa kaappuwaa naanaa.
40013039	Zaaringgiyaa zereeddawe morkkiyaa xalahiyaa; qoychchaa wodii, wodiyaa wurssethaa; qassi qoyciyaawanttu kiitanchchatuwaa.
40013040	“Hewaa diraw, zaaringgiyaa maxiide, tamaan guuddiyaawaadan, wodiyaa wurssethaan hewaa mala gidanawaa.
40013041	Asaa Na7ay, kiitanchchatuwaa kiittanawaa; unttunttu A kawutethaa giddon nagaraw gaaso gidiyaa ubbatuwaanne iitabaa oothiyaawantta maxiide kessanawantta.
40013042	Yaatiide to7enna tamaan olanawantta; hewaan unttunttu yeekkanawanttanne achchaa dhaqanawantta.
40013043	He wode xillatuu barenttu aabbu kawutethaan awaadan poo7ana. Sisiyaa haythay de7iya uray siso!
40013044	“Saluwaa kawutethay goshshaan moogetteedda miishshaa bessee; itti bitani he miishshaa demmiide, zaariide moogi aggeedda; daro nashettiidde biide, barew de7iyaawaa ubbaa zali77iide, he goshshaa shammeedda.
40013045	“Qassi saluwaa kawutethay inqquwaa geetettiyaa daro al77o shuchchaa shammanaw koyyiyaa zali77anchchaa malatee.
40013046	He zali77anchchay daro al77o inqquwaa demmiide, biide barew de7iyaawaa ubbaa zali77iide, A shammeedda.
40013047	“Qassi saluwaa kawutethay ubba qommo moliyaa oyqqiyaa, abbaan yegetteedda dabbaa malatee.
40013048	Molii dabbaa kumeedda wode, moliyaa oyqqiyaa asatuu abbaappe gaxaa kesiide utteeddino; yaatiide lo77o moliyaa qoriide, yeggiyaa miishshaan yeggeeddino; shin iita moliyaa wora oleeddino.
40013049	Wodiyaa wurssethaan hewaadan hanana; kiitanchchatuu yiide, nagaranchchatuwaa xillatuwaa gidooppe qoriide,
40013050	to7enna tamaan olanawantta; hewaan unttunttu yeekkanawanttanne achchaa dhaqanawantta.
40013051	“Hawe ubbay hinttenttoo geleeddee?” yaagiide unttuntta oochcheedda. Unttunttu, “E,” yaageeddino.
40013052	I, “Hewaa diraw, saluwaa kawutethaa xuuraa loythi eriyaa, higgiyaa tamaarissiyaa ubbay, bare miishshaa shiishshi wotheedda golliyaappe ooratha miishshaanne eca miishshaa shaakki kessiyaa izawa malatee” yaagi zaareedda.
40013053	Yesuusi ha leemisatuwaa odi wurssowaappe guyyiyan, hewaappe denddiide,
40013054	bare katamaa Naazireete beedda. Ayihuda woosa gollen tamaarissiyaawaa siseedda asay maalalettiide, hawaadan yaageedda; “Hawe ha aadho eratethaanne Xoossay oothiyaa malaataa oothanaw wolqqaa haqappe akkeeddee?
40013055	Hawe anaaxiyaa na7aa gidennee? A daaya Mayraamo gidekkee? A ishatuu Yayiqoobaa, Yooseefa, Simoonanne Yihudaa gidikkinoo?
40013056	A michchatuu ubbay nuunanna de7ikkinoo? Yaatina, I ha eraa ubbaa haqappe demmeeddee?” yaageeddino.
40013057	Unttunttu I giyaabaa akkennaan ixxeeddino. Shin Yesuusi he asaassi, “Nabii bare gadiyaninne bare soy asaan bonchchettenna; shin harasaa ubbaan bonchchettee” yaageedda.
40013058	Unttunttu ammanibeenna diraw, Yesuusi daro malaataa he saan oothibeenna.
40014001	He wode Galiilaa gadiyaa ayissiyaa Heroodise Yesuusabaa siseedda;
40014002	yaatiide bare qoomatuwaassi, “Hawe hayquwaappe denddeedda Xammaqiyaa Yohaannisa; Xoossay oothiyaa wolqqaama malaataa I oothiyaawe hewaassa” yaageedda.
40014003	Ayissi gooppe, Heroodisi bare ishaa Piliphphoosa machchatti Heeroodiyaadi gaasotaan Yohaannisa oythi qashissiide, qasho gollen yeggi wotheedda.
40014004	Ayissi gooppe, Yohaannisi Heroodisa, “Neeni Heeroodiyaado, ne ishaa machchatto akkanaw higgii diggee” yaageedda.
40014005	Heroodisi Yohaannisa wodhanaw koyyeedda; shin Yihudaa asay nabiyaadan Yohaannisa xeelleedda diraw, asaw yayyeedda.
40014006	Shin Heroodisi yeletteedda gallassaa baalay gakkina, Heeroodiyaadi naatta asaa sinthaan duraade Heroodisa nashechchaw.
40014007	Heroodisi naatto, “Neena lo77eeddawaa ayaanne gidooppe, taana oochcha; taani new immana” yaagiide iziw caaqqeedda.
40014008	Naatta bare daay zoriyaa akkaade Heroodisa, “Xammaqiyaa Yohaannisa huuphiyaa ha wociitiyaan wothaade taw imma” yaagaaddu.
40014009	Kaatii aw qaretteedda; shin bare caaquwaa dirawunne barenanna maaddaan utteedda imathaa diraw, iziw Yohaannisa huuphii imettana mala azazeedda.
40014010	Kaatii kiittiide, Yohaannisa qoodhiyaa qasho gollen muucisseedda.
40014011	Huuphiyaa wociitiyaan wothi ahiide, naattiw immeeddino; naatta he huuphiyaa bare aattikko afaaddu.
40014012	Yohaannisa kaalliyaawanttu yiide, A anhaa afiide moogeeddino; hewaappe simmiide ha yewuwaa Yesuusaw biide odeeddino.
40014013	Yesuusi hewaa sisiide, wonggiriyaan geliide, hewaappe barekka asay baynnasaa beedda; asay hewaa sisiide, katamaappe denddiide, gediyan A kaalleeddino.
40014014	Yesuusi wonggiriyaappe keseedda wode, daro asaa be7iide, he asaw qaretteedda; yaatiide unttunttunna de7iyaa hargganchchatuwaa patheedda.
40014015	Sa7ay omarssiyaa wode, Yesuusa kaalliyawanttu aakko yiide, “Hawe sa7ay asay baynnasaa; ha77i sa7ay qammidiggeedda; asay ubbay qeeri katamatuwaa biide, barenttoo qumaa shammana mala, asaa moyizza” yaageeddino.
40014016	Shin Yesuusi unttuntta, “Asay baanaw koshshenna; asaw meetettiyaabaa hinttenttu immite” yaageedda.
40014017	Unttunttu zaariide A, “Nuussi hawaan ichcheshu ukithaappenne laa77u moliyaappe attin, haray baawa” yaageeddino.
40014018	Yesuusi unttuntta, “Hewantta, haa taakko ahite” yaageedda.
40014019	Asay maataani uttana mala, Yesuusi azazeedda; ichcheshu ukithaanne laa77u moliyaa oyqqiide, saluwaa pude xeelliide, Xoossaa galateedda; he ukithaa menthiide, barena kaalliyaawanttussi immina, unttunttu cora asaw gisheeddino.
40014020	Asay ubbay miide kalleedda; atteedda suuppa dokkaa tammanne laa77u zambbeeliyaa kumeeddawaa dentheeddino.
40014021	Meedda asay macca asaanne naanaa paydennaan, ichcheshu sha77aa gidiyaawaa keena.
40014022	Yesuusi cora asaa moyizziidde, barena kaalliyawantta wonggiriyaan geliide, bareppe sinthatiide, abbaappe hefintha pinnana mala azazeedda.
40014023	Asaa moyizziide, Xoossaa woossanaw deriyaa huuphiyaa barekka keseedda; sa7ay qammi digginakka hewaan barekka de7ee.
40014024	Shin wonggirii he wode, abbaa bollan de7ishshin, sintha bagganna carkkuu carkkiyaa diraw, beetay wonggiriyaa yaanne haanne sugee.
40014025	Bayra kuttuu waassi simmina, Yesuusi abbaa bolla hamettiidde, unttunttukko yeedda.
40014026	A kaalliyaawanttu abbaa bolla I hamettishshin be7i dagammiide, “Hawe moytilliyaa gidennee!” gi yayyiide waasseeddino.
40014027	Shin Yesuusi ellekka unttuntta, “Aynne baawa; taanattennee; yayyoppite!” yaageedda.
40014028	Phexiroosi zaariide A, “Ta Godaw, hawe neena gidooppe, taani haathaa bollanna neekko baana mala, taana azazaarikkii” yaageedda.
40014029	Yesuusi Phexiroosa, “Haaya!” yaageedda. Phexiroosi wonggiriyaappe wodhdhiide, haathaa bollanna hamettiidde, Yesuusakko buussaa doommeedda.
40014030	Shin carkkuwaa wolqqaa be7iide, yayyeedda; haathay barena mituwaa doommeedda wode, bare kooshshaa dhoqqu oothiide, “Ta Godaw taana ashshaarikkii!” yaagi waasseedda.
40014031	He man77iyankka Yesuusi bare kushiyaa yeddi Phexiroosa oyqqiide, “Laa ha ammanuu laafeeddawoo! Ayissi sidhaaddii?” yaageedda.
40014032	Unttunttu laa77uu wonggiriyaan geleedda wode, carkkuu woppu geedda.
40014033	Wonggiriyaa giddon de7iyaa A kaalliyaawanttu Yesuusa, “Neeni Xoossaa Na7aa gideeddawe tuma” yaagiide aw goyinneeddino.
40014034	Unttunttu abbaa pinniide, Gensaareexa geetettiyaa gadiyaa gakkeeddino.
40014035	He gadiyaa asay Yesuusa gidiyaawaa ereeddino; hewaa heeraa gadiyaa ubbaa kiittiide, harggiyaa asaa ubbaa aakko aheeddino.
40014036	Harggiyaa asay A mayuwaa macaraa xalalaa bochchana mala, A woosseeddino; A mayuwaa macaraa bochcheedda ubbaykka paxeedda.
40015001	Hewaappe guyyiyan, higgiya tamaarissiyaa itti itti asaynne Parisaawatuu Yeerusalaameppe Yesuusakko yiide,
40015002	“Neena kaalliyawanttu ayissi nu aawotuwa wogaa bayzziinoo? Ayissi gooppe, unttunttu qumaa maanaappe kasetiide, barenttu kushiyaa meecettikkino” yaageeddino.
40015003	Yesuusi zaariide, unttuntta hawadaan yaageedda; “Hinttenttu hintte wogaa diraw, Xoossaa azazuwaa poliyaawaa ayissi ixxiitee?
40015004	Ayissi gooppe Xoossay, ‘Ne aabbanne ne daayo bonchcha’ qassi, Bare aabba woy bare daayo boriyaawe hayqqo yaageedda.
40015005	-
40015006	Shin hinttenttu, ‘Itti asay bare aabba woy bare daayo maaddiyaabay barew de7iina, “Hewe Xoossaawaa” gooppe, bare aabba woy bare daayo bonchchanaw bessenna’ yaagiita; yaatiide hinttenttu hinttenttu wogaa polanaw Xoossaa qaalaw azazettikkita.
40015007	Ha lo77a malatiyaa iita asatoo, Isiyaasi balennaan hinttenttubaw timbbitiyaa odiidde,
40015008	‘Xoossay hawadaan yaageedda; “Hawe asay taana bare bolla doonan bonchchee; shin unttunttu wozanay taappe haakuwan de7ee.
40015009	Asay taw mela goyinnee; ayissi gooppe, asay ootheedda azazuwaa Xoossaa higgiya malatissiide tamaarisseeddino” geedda’ ” yaageedda.
40015010	Yesuusi daro asaa barekko xeesiide, “Sisitenne akeekite;
40015011	asaa tunissiyaawe doona giddo geliyaawaa gidenna; shin asaa tunissiyaawe doonaappe kesiyaawaa” yaageedda.
40015012	Hewaappe guyyiyan, A kaalliyawanttu aakko yiide, “Parisaawatuu neeni haasayeeddawaa sisiide, hanqqetteeddawaa akeekay?” yaageeddino.
40015013	Shin Yesuusi zaariide, “Saluwan de7iya ta Aabbu tokkibeenna mithaa ubbay shodettanawaa.
40015014	Unttunttoo hirggoppite; unttunttu qooqaa kaalethiyaa qooqatuwaa; qooqay qooqaa kaalethooppe, laa77uukka ollaan kunddee” yaageedda.
40015015	Phexiroosi zaariide, “Ha leemisuwaa bilethaa nuussi odaarikkii” yaageedda.
40015016	Yesuusi unttuntta hawaadan yaageedda; “Hinttenttoo qassi ha77i gakkanawukka gelibeennee?
40015017	Doonaanna geliyaa ubbay uluwaa giddo biide, qassi uluwaappe kare kesiyaawaa erikkitee?
40015018	Shin doonaappe kesiyaawe wozanaappe kesee; asaa tunissiyaawe hewaa malaa.
40015019	Ayissi gooppe, wozanaa giddoppe iita qofay, wodhiyaawe, woshummiyaawe, qassi woshummanaw kajjeeliyaawe ubbay, wuu77iyaawe, wordduwaan markkattiyaawe, borii kesee.
40015020	Hewaa malatiyaawe asaa tunissiyaawaappe attin, meeccibeenna kushiyaan miyaawe asaa tunissenna” yaageedda.
40015021	Hewaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi hewaappe aggiide, Xiiroosanne Sidoonaa geetettiyaa katamatuu de7iya gadiya beedda.
40015022	Kanaane geetettiyaa gadiya maccawunna ittinna hewaappe Yesuusakko yaade, bare kooshshaa dhoqqu oothaade, “Ta Godaw, Daawita na7aw, taw qarettaarikkii; ta naatto iita ayyanay lo77enna oythaa oyqqeedda” yaagaaddu.
40015023	Shin Yesuusi iziw ay qaalaanne qaattibeenna; A kaalliyawanttu aakko yiide, “Ha mishiratta nu geeduwaa kaalla kaallaade, bare kooshshaa dhoqqu oothaade odaw; hewaa diraw, neeni izo yeddaarkkii” yaagiide woosseeddino.
40015024	Yesuusi zaariide, “Taani bayeedda dorssaw, Isra7eeliya asa xalalaw kiitettaaddi” yaageedda.
40015025	Shin iza yaade, “Ta Godaw, taana maaddaarikkii!” yaagaade aw goyinnaaddu.
40015026	Qassi I zaariide, “Naanaa qumaa akkiide, kana maraw oliyaawe lo77a gidenna” yaageedda.
40015027	Mishiratta, “E ta Godaw, hewe tuma; shin haray atto kana maratuu barenttu godatuu miina, samppaappe laaletteedda suuppaa miinottennee” yaagaaddu.
40015028	Yesuusi zaariide izo, “Ha mishirattee, ne ammanuu wolqqaama; neeni koyyeeddawaadan new hano” yaageedda. Izi naatta ellekka paxa aggaaddu.
40015029	Yesuusi hewaappe denddiide, Galiilaa Abbaa mataa beedda; qassi itti deriyaa bolla kesiide, hewaan utteedda.
40015030	Daro asay wobbatuwaa, qooqatuwaa, quunatuwaanne duudetuwaa, qassi hara coratuwaa aakko ahiide, A mataan wotheedda. Yesuusi unttuntta patheedda.
40015031	Hewaa diraw, asay duudatuu haasayishshin, quunatuu suurishshin wobbatuu hamettishshin, qooqatuu xeellishshin be7i maalalettiide, Isra7eeliyaa Xoossaa galateeddino.
40015032	Yesuusi barena kaalliyawantta barekko xeesiide, “Ha cora asay taananna heezzu gallassay gakkanaw gami77eedda diraw, taani ha asaw qarettay; unttunttoo ha77i miyaawe baawa. Qassi unttunttu ogiyaan daaburiide kunddenna mala, qumaa mizennaan unttuntta mela yeddanawukka koyyikke” yaageedda.
40015033	A kaalliyawanttu zaariide Yesuusa, “Nuuni ha bazzuwan hawaa keena asaa kalissiyaa qumaa haqappe demmanee?” yaageeddino.
40015034	Qassi Yesuusi unttuntta, “Hinttenttoo aappun ukithay de7ii?” yaagiide oochcheedda. Unttunttu, “Laappu ukithaynne moletuwaappe amareeddawanttu de7iino” yaageeddino.
40015035	Yesuusi asaa, “Sa7aan uttite” yaageedda.
40015036	He laappu ukithaanne moliyaa oyqqiide, Xoossaa galateedda; menthereethiide barena kaalliyaawanttussi immeedda; qassi unttunttu cora asaassi immeeddino.
40015037	Asay ubbay miide kalleedda; miina atteedda laappu zambbeeliyaa kumeedda suuppaa A kaalliyawanttu dentheeddino.
40015038	Meedda asay macca asaanne naanaa paydennaan, oyddu sha77a attuma asaa.
40015039	Yesuusi asaa yeddowaappe guyyiyan, wonggiriyaan geliide, Megedoone geetettiyaa gadiya beedda.
40016001	Itti itti Parisaawatuunne Saduqaawanatuu Yesuusakko yiide, A paaccanaw koyyeeddino; yaatiide barentta saluwaappe malaata bessana mala woosseeddino.
40016002	Shin Yesuusi zaariide, unttuntta hawadaan yaageedda; “Sa7ay qammiyaa wode hinttenttu, ‘Saluu zo77eedda diraw, sa7ay shammanawaa’ yaagiita;
40016003	wonttumaathaan qassi, ‘Saluu zo77iide gubbaneedda diraw, hachche iray bukkanawaa’ yaagiita; saluwaa xeelliide, sa7ay hananawaa eranaw danddayiita; shin ta yuussaa wodiyaa malaataa shaakki eranaw danddaykkitee?
40016004	Ha wodiyaa asay iitaynne woshummiyaawe, Xoossaw ammanettennawe, malaataa koyyee; nabiyaa Yoonaasa malaataappe attin, hara malaatay aw imettenna” yaageedda. Hewaappe simmiide, unttuntta aggiide beedda.
40016005	A kaalliyawanttu abbaa pinneedda wode, qumaa afanawaa dogeeddino.
40016006	Yesuusi unttuntta, “Parisaawatuwaa irshshuwaappenne Saduqaawanatuwaa irshshuwaappe hinttentta eriide naagettite” yaageedda.
40016007	Unttunttu barenttu giddon, “I hawaa yaagiyaawe nuuni qumaa ahibeenna diraassa” yaagiide haasayaa doommeeddino.
40016008	Shin unttunttu giyaawaa Yesuusi eriide, “Ha ammanuu pacceeddawanttoo, qumay baynna diraw, ayissi hinttenttu giddon haasayiitee?
40016009	Ha77ikka hinttenttoo gelibeennee? Taani ichcheshu ukithaa ichcheshu sha77a asaa mizaade kalisseeddawaa, qassi hinttenttu aappun zambbeeliyaa kunthiide atteedda suuppaa dentheedditentto wozanaa aathikkitee?
40016010	Woy taani laappu ukithaa oyddu sha77a asaa miza kalisseeddawaa, qassi hinttenttu aappun zambbeeliyaa kunthiide atteedda suuppaa dentheedditentto wozanaa aathikkitee?
40016011	Taani hinttentta Parisaawatuwaa irshshuwaappenne Saduqaawanatuwaa irshshuwaappe naagettite giyawaappe attin, ukithaabaa hinttenttoo haasayabeennaawaa hinttenttu waaniide akeekikkitee?” yaageedda.
40016012	A kaalliyawanttu Yesuusi barenttoo odeeddawaa, Parisaawatuwaa timirttiyaappenne Saduqaawanatuwaa timirttiyaappe unttunttu naagettana mala odettowaappe attin, munaqaan tigiyaa irshshuwaappe naagettana mala gidennaawaa he wode akeekeeddino.
40016013	Yesuusi Qiisaariyaa Piliiphphoosa geetettiyaa gadiya gakkeedda wode, barena kaalliyaawantta, “Asay taana, Asa Na7aa oona gii?” yaagiide oochcheedda.
40016014	A kaalliyawanttu zaariide, “Neena itti itti asay, Xammaqiyaa Yohaannisa yaagee; haranttu qassi Eelaasa yaagiino; qassi haranttu Ermiyaasa woy nabatuwaappe ittuwaa yaagiino” yaageeddino.
40016015	Yesuusi unttuntta, “Yaatina hinttenttu taana oona giitee?” yaageedda.
40016016	Simooni Phexiroosi zaariide, “Neeni de7uwa Xoossaa Na7aa Kiristtoosa” yaageedda.
40016017	Yesuusi zaariide, hawadaan yaageedda; “Yoona na7aa Simoonaa, hawaa new saluwan de7iya ta Aabbu erisseeddawaappe attin, asay ooninne neena erissibeenna diraw, neeni anjjetteeddaawaa.
40016018	Phexiroosaa, taani new oday; neeni shuchchaa; taani ha zaallaa bolla ta woosa golliya keexxana; ta woosa golliya haray atto, Si7ooliyaa wolqqaykka xoonanaw danddayenna.
40016019	Taani new saluwaa kawutethaa qulppiyaa immana; neeni sa7an hano goowe ubbay saluwan Xoossaa sinthan hanana; shin neeni sa7aan hanoppo geeddawe saluwankka hanenna” yaageedda.
40016020	Hewaappe guyyiyan, I Kiristtoosa gideeddawaa A kaalliyawanttu oossinne odenna mala, unttuntta azazeedda.
40016021	He wodiyaappe doommiide Yesuusi, “Taani Yeerusalaame biina, taana cimatuu, qeesatuwaa kaappatuunne higgiya tamaarissiyaawanttu darii waayissanaw bessee; unttunttu taana wodhanawunne taani heezzentho gallassi hayquwaappe denddanaw bessee” yaagiide, barena kaalliyaawanttussi geeshshiide oduwaa doommeedda.
40016022	Phexiroosi A itti bagga zaariide, “Ta Godaw, Xoossay neena hewaappe ashsho; hawe ne bolla ubbakka yeenna” yaagiide A zoranaw doommeedda.
40016023	Shin Yesuusi guyye simmiide Phexiroosa, “Ha Seexaanaw, neeni ta matappe kichcha; neeni asay dosiyaawaa qoppiyaawaappe attin, Xoossay dosiyaawaa qoppenna diraw, taw dhubo gidaadda” yaageedda.
40016024	Hewaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi barena kaalliyawantta hawadaan yaageedda; “Taana kaallanaw koyyiyaa uray de7ooppe, barena kaado; yaatiide bare masqqaliyaa tookkiide, taana kaallo.
40016025	Ayissi gooppe, bare shemppuwaa ashshanaw koyyiyaa uray bayizzanawaa; shin bare shemppuwaa ta diraw bayizziya uray ashshanawaa.
40016026	Itti uray sa7an de7iya ubbabaa barew shiishshiide, bare shemppuwaa bayizzooppe, A ayaa maaddanee? Woy itti uray bare shemppuwaa wozanaw ayaa immana danddayii?
40016027	Ayissi gooppe, taani, Asa Na7ay, ta Aabbu bonchchuwan ta kiitanchchatuwaanna yaana hanay; asaa ubbaw he wode A oosuwaa gatiyaa immana.
40016028	Taani hinttenttoo tumuwaa gay; amareedda asatu, taani, Asa Na7ay, kaatiyaa gidaade yiyaawaa be7ana gakkanaw, hayqqennawanttu hawaan de7iino” yaageedda.
40017001	Yesuusi usuppun gallassaappe guyyiyan, barenanna Phexiroosa, Yayiqoobanne, Yayiqooba ishaa Yohaannisa akkiide, unttunttu xalalaa wogga deriyaa huuphiyaa kesseedda.
40017002	Qassi unttunttu xeellishshin, unttunttu sinthaan laametteedda; A deemuu awayfiyaadaan poo7eedda; A mayuukka poo7uwaadan phooleedda.
40017003	Musenne Eelaas Yesuusanna haasayishshin, ha heezzu A kaalliyawanttu be7eeddino.
40017004	Phexiroosi Yesuusa, “Ta Godaw, nuuni hawaan de7iyaawe nuussi lo77a; neeni dosooppe, nuuni hawaan heezzu daasiyaa ittuwa new, ittuwa Musew, ittuwa Eelaasaw keexxana” yaageedda.
40017005	I haasayishshin, poo7iyaa shaarii yiinne unttuntta kammi aggeedda; shaariyaa giddoppe, “Hawe taani siiqiyaa taana nashechchiyaa ta Na7aa; I giyaawaa sisite” giya qaalay yeedda.
40017006	A kaalliyawanttu he qaalaa siseedda wode, daro yayyiide, guufanni aggeeddino.
40017007	Yesuusi unttunttukko yiide, unttuntta bochchiide, “Denddite; yayyoppite” yaageedda.
40017008	Unttunttu dhoqqu giide xeelliyaa wode, Yesuusa xalalaappe attin, hara asaa oonanne be7ibeykkino.
40017009	Unttunttu deriyaappe wodhdhishshin, Yesuusi unttuntta, “Taani Asa Na7ay, hayquwaappe denddana gakkanaw, ha hinttenttu be77eeddawaa oossinne odoppite” yaagiide azazeedda.
40017010	A kaalliyawanttu Yesuusa, “Yaatina, higgiyaa tamaarissiyaawanttu ayissi, ‘Eelaas kasetiide yaanaw bessee’ giinoo?” yaagiide oochcheeddino.
40017011	I zaariide yaageedda; “Eelaas kaset yiide, ubbabaa giigissanawaa.
40017012	Shin taani hinttenttoo oday; Eelaas hawaappe kase yidiggeedda. Hewode asay A, barenttoo koyyeeddawaadan ubbaa ootheeddawaappe attin A eribeykkino; hewaadankka, qassi taana, Asa Na7aa, asay waayissanawaa” yaageedda.
40017013	A kaalliyawanttu he wode barenttoo Yesuusi Xammaqiyaa Yohaannisabaa odiyaawaa akeekeeddino.
40017014	Unttunttu daro asaakko yeedda wode, itti bitani Yesuusakko yiide, A sinthaan gulbbatiide,
