54004001	Itti itti asay wurssethaa wodiyaan ammanuwaa agganawaa Geeshsha Ayyaanay qoncciyaan odeedda. Unttunttu worddo ayyaanatuwassi azazettana; qassi xalahatuwaa timirttiyaa kaallana.
54004002	Hawaa mala timirttii, tilla wozanaa tamaan bonqqeedda birataan guuddeeddawaadan donccilleedda worddo asatuwaa bagganna yeedda.
54004003	Hawanttu mala asatuu akkiyawaanne geliyaawaa qassi itti itti qommo kathaa miyaawaa diggiino. Shin ammaniyaawanttunne tumatethaa eriyaawanttu Xoossaa galateeddawaappe guyyiyan maana mala, Xoossay kathaa medhdheedda.
54004004	Ayissi gooppe, Xoossay medhdheeddabay ubbabaykka lo77a. Xoossaa galatiide akkooppe, olettiyaawe ayaynne baawa.
54004005	Ayissi gooppe, he ubbabay Xoossaa qaalaaninne woosan anjjetteeddawaa.
54004006	Hewaa diraw, neeni ishatuwaa hewaa hassayissiyaawaa gidooppe, ammanuwaanne neeni kaalleedda lo77o timirttiyaa qaalaan eqooppe neeni Kiristtoosi Yesuusaw lo77o oosanchcha gidanaassa.
54004007	Shin ammaniyaa asaw lo77enna haasayaappenne qassi cima macca asaa tossaappe baqata. Qassi Xoossaa malatiyaawan neena loohissa.
54004008	Ayissi gooppe, asay bare bollaa minissiyaawe laafa go77ee. Shin Xoossaa malatiyaawan loohissiyaawe ha77ikka sinthappekka de7uwaa immana giya diraw, ubbabawukka go77ee.
54004009	Ha haasayay asay ubbay akkanaw bessiyaa tumu haasaya.
54004010	Nuuni hewaa demmanaw daabureettonne loythi ootheetto; hewaassi nuuni hidootaa wotheeddawe asaa ubbaa, ubbaappe aathiide, ammaniyaawantta ashshiya de7uwa Xoossaa.
54004011	Hawaa azazanne tamaarissa.
54004012	Neeni yalaga gidiyaa diraw, neena ooninne kadhoppo. Shin ammaniyaawanttoo ne haasayan, hanotethan, siiquwan, ammanuwaaninne geeshshatethan leemisuwaa gida.
54004013	Taani yaana gakkanaw asaassi Xoossaa maxaafaa nabbabiyaawaani, Xoossaa qaalaa odiyaawaaninne tamaarissiyaawaani minna.
54004014	Timbbitiyaa odiyaawanttu haasayinanne cimatuu barenttu kushiyaa ne bolla wothina, neeni akeedda, neenan de7iyaa Geeshsha Ayyaanaa imuwaa toochchoppa.
54004015	Ne dichchay asaa ubbaw qonccana mala, hewaa minissa qoppa. Hawaa ubba wode ootha.
54004016	Ne huuphiyaanne ne timirttiyaa naaga. Neeni hewaa oothooppe, neenanne neeni giyaawaa sisiyaawantta ashshiya diraw, aggennaan ootha.
54005001	Cima asaa ne aabba bonchchiyawaadan bonchchappe attin, toochchoppa. Yalagatuwaa ne ishaadan,
54005002	qassi cima macca asaa ne aattiidan, yalaga macca asaa ne michchattiidan, kumentha geeshshatethan bonchcha.
54005003	Bare xalalaa gideedda tumu am77etuwaa bonchcha.
54005004	Shin am77attiw naanay woy naanaa naanay de7ooppe, he naanay Xoossaa malatiyaawaa barenttu soy asaa bessiyaawaaninne qassi hewaa oothiyaawan barentta yeleeddawanttu kushiyaa zaariyaawaa tamaarino. Ayissi gooppe, hewe Xoossaa nashechchiyaawaa.
54005005	Ayaa maaduukka baynna bare de7iyaa tumu am77atta Xoossay immana gaade nashechchan naaga uttaaddu. Qassi gallassinne qamma Xoossay izo maaddana mala, woossawunne oochchaw.
54005006	Shin barena ishalissiyaa am77atta paxa de7ooppekka, iza hayqqadiggaaddu.
54005007	Qassi ooninne unttuntta borenna mala, ha azazuwaa imma.
54005008	Shin barenttuwoo qassi ubbaappe aathiide, bare soy asaw qoppenna uray oonanne gidooppe, hewe bare ammanuwaa kaddeeddawaa. Ammanenna asaappekka aadhdhiide aw iita.
54005009	Usuppun tammu laythay kumibeenna am77atti sunthaa maziggobiyaan xaafoppa. Hewaa bollan qassi iza itti asinaappe haraa gelabeennawunno giddanaw koshshee.
54005010	Naanaa dichchiyaawan, imathaa mokkiyaawan, geeshshatuwaa gediya meecciyaawan, waayyetteedda asaa maaddiyaawan, lo77o oosuwaa ubbaa kaalliyaawan, ha lo77o kiitaa kiitettiyaawan eretteeddawunno giddanaw bessee.
54005011	Shin yalaga am77etuwaa yokkonttu sunthaanna gatha xaafoppa. Ayissi gooppe, unttunttu barentta, asinaa gela gela giya wode, Kiristtoosa agganawantta.
54005012	Koyro ammanuwaa kadheedda diraw, unttunttu pirddettana.
54005013	Hewe baynnaan oosuwaa dhayiide itti golliyaaappe hara golliyaa yuuyyiidde, hamettiyaawaa xalalaa gidennaan, barenttoo bessennabaa haasayiidde, zigirssaanne yewuwaan coo geliyaawaa tamaariino.
54005014	Hewaa diraw, nu morkketuu nu bolla haasayiyaa iitabaa demmenna mala, yalaga am77atuu asinaa geliide, na7a yeliide, barenttu golliya ayissana mala zoray.
54005015	Ayissi gooppe, hawaappe kase amareedda am77atuu Seexaanaa kaallanaw aggiide guye simmeeddino.
54005016	Ammaniyaa mishirattiw haqankka dabbo am77atuu de7ooppe, iza unttuntta maaddanaw bessee. Ammaniyaa asatuu maaduu bessiyaa tumu am77etuwaa maaddana mala, unttunttu ammaniyaawanttoo tooko gidoppino.
54005017	Loythi heemmiyaa cimatuu, qassi ubbaappe aathiide, qaalaa odiyaawaaninne tamaarissiyaawaan daaburiyaawanttu, dakko bonchchuwaa akkanaw bessiino.
54005018	Ayissi gooppe, Xoossaa Maxaafay, “Uddumaan kathaa yedhdhiyaa booraa doonaa qachchoppa” qassi, “Oosanchchay bare dirgguwaa akkanaw bessee” yaagee.
54005019	Laa77u woy heezzu markkay baynnaan, woosa golliya cimaa mootiyaawaa sisoppa.
54005020	Haratuu yayyana mala, nagaraa oothiyaa ubbatuwaa asaa ubbaa sinthan seera.
54005021	Neeni aynne asaa deemuwaa xeellennan, ittuwa ittuwaappe dummayennan ha azazuwaa naagana mala, Xoossaaninne Yesuusi Kiristtoosan dooretteedda kiitanchchatuwa sinthan neena taani zoray.
54005022	O bollaaninne elleellaade ne kushiyaa wothoppa. Haratuwaa nagaraan geloppa. Neena geeshshatethan naaga.
54005023	Neeni ubba wode sakettiyaa dirawunne ne uluwaa diraw, guutha woyiniyaa eessaa ushappe attin, haathaa xalalaa ushoppa.
54005024	Itti itti asatuwaa nagaray be7anaw qoncce; unttunttu nagaray unttuntta pirddanaw unttunttuppe sinthaw aadhdhee. Shin haratuu nagaray guyyeppe qonccee.
54005025	Hewaadankka, lo77o oosuukka qonccee. Qonccibeennabaa gidooppenne, geemmanaw danddayenna.
54006001	Xoossaa sunthaynne nu timirttii borettenna mala, aylletethaa morgge mithaa giddon de7iyaawanttu barena mooddiyaa godatoo bonchchuu bessiyawaa erino.
54006002	Ammaniyaa asaa aylliya gideeddawanttoo unttunttu godatuu unttunttoo ishaa gidiyaa diraw, unttuntta kadhoppino. Shin barenttu kiitaan go77ettiyaawanttu unttunttu siiqiyaa ammaniyaawantta gidiyaa diraw, unttunttu kasewaappe aathiide oothanaw bessee. Neeni ha yewatuwaa tamaarissanawunne odanaw bessee.
54006003	-
54006004	Ooninne dumma timirttiyaa tamaarissiyaawaa gidooppe, qassi nu Godaa Yesuusi Kiristtoosa tumu qaalaananne nu ammanuwaa timirttiyaanna gakettenna uray daro otorettee; aynne erenna. Qassi qaalaa bollan palumettanawunne walaqqetanaw unttunttoo giigenna qofay de7ee. Hewe qanaatiyaa, palumaa, boriyaa, iita sidhiyaa kaalethee.
54006005	Qassi unttunttu huuphii oothenna. Tumatethay baynna asatuwaannakka palumaa kaalethee. Unttunttu Xoossaa malatiyaawan durettana giide qoppiino. Neeni he asatuwaappe shaaketta.
54006006	Shin taw de7iyaabay taw gidana giya uraa Xoossaa malatiyaawe dureyee.
54006007	Ayissi gooppe, nuuni ha alamiyaa aynne ahibeykko; qassi aappe aynne afokko.
54006008	Shin miyaabaynne mayyiyabay de7ooppe, hewe nuussi gidanawaa.
54006009	Shin durettanaw koyyiyaawanttu paaciyaaninne phiriyaan geliino; qasi daro asaa bashshawunne dhayoo goochchi afiyaa daro eeyanne qohiyaa amuwan kunddiino.
54006010	Ayissi gooppe, shalluwaa siiqiyaawe iitatethaa ubbaw pulttuwaa. Ittu ittuu hewaa amottiiddi, ammanuwaappe balettiide, daro metuwan barentta qoheeddino.
54006011	Shin neenoo, Xoossaa asaw, hewaappe baqata. Xillotethaa, Xoossaa malatiyaawaa, ammanuwaa, siiquwaa, danddayaanne ashikketethaa kaalla.
54006012	Ammanuwaa baaxiyaa loytha baaxeta. Daro asaa sinthan lo77o markkaa markkattaade, neena Xoossay xeeseedda medhinaa de7uwaa oyqqa.
54006013	Ubbabaw de7uwa immiya Xoossaa sinthaaninne, qassi Phenxxeenaawiyaa Philaaxoosa geetettiyaa gadiya mooddiyaawaa sinthan lo77o markkaa markkatteedda Kiristtoosi Yesuusa sinthan taani neena hawaa azazay.
54006014	Nu Godaa Yesuusi Kiristtoosi qonccana gakkanaw, qitay bayinnaaninne borii baynnaan he azazuwaa naaga.
54006015	A qonccethaa, Itti sunthay de7iyaa anjjetteedda Xoossay, kaatatuwaa Kaatii, godatuwaa Goday, bare bessiyaa wodiyaan bessana.
54006016	Hayqqennawe itti A xalalaa. Ooninne Aakko shiiqanaw danddayenna poo7uwan de7ee. Ooninne A be7ibeenna; qassi be7anawukka danddayenna. Bonchchuunne medhinaa wolqqay aw gido. Amen77i.
54006017	Ha77i ha wodiyaan dure gidiyaawanttu otorettennaadaaninne qassi nuuni nashettanaadan, ubbabaa palahissiide Nuussi immiya de7uwa Xoossaan ammanettanawaappe attin, aadhdhiyaa duretethaan unttunttu ammanettennaadan, unttuntta azaza.
54006018	Unttunttu lo77obaa oothanaadan, lo77o kiitaan durettanaadan, keekiyaawanttanne haratuwaanna shaakki akkiyawantta gidanaadan azaza.
54006019	Hewaa yaatiyaawan unttunttu sinthaw barenttoo mino baaso gidiyaa shalluwaa barenttoo shiishshino. Hewaappe guyyiyan, unttunttu tumu de7uwaa akkana.
54006020	Ximootoosaa, itti itti asay balaan eratethaa giyaa eeya palumiyaappenne mela haasayaappe baqataadde, new imetteedda hadaraa naaga.
54006021	Ayissi gooppe, ittu ittuu nuussi eratethay de7ee yaagiidde, ammanuwaa baleeddino. Xoossaa aadho keekatethay hinttenanna ubbaanna gido.
55001001	Taani Phawuloosi, Xoossay immana geedda Kiristtoosi Yesuusaanna nuussi de7iyaa de7uwaabaa odanaw, Xoossay geeddawaadan, Kiristtoosi Yesuusi kiitteeddawe,
55001002	ta siiqo na7aa Ximootoosaw ha dabidaabbiyaa xaafay. Xoossaa Aawuwaappenne nu Godaa Kiristtoosi Yesuusappe, aadho keekatethay, maarotethaynne sarotethay new gido.
55001003	Ta zaratuu ootheeddawaadan, taanikka taana zoriyaa geeshsha wozanaappe oothiyaa Xoossaa qammanne gallassi woossiyaa woosaan ubba wode neena hassayiyaa diraw, A galatay.
55001004	Taani ne afothaa hassaya hassayaade nashettana mala, neena be7anaw daro laamotay.
55001005	Neenan de7iyaa worddo baynna ammanuwaa hassayay. He ammanuu beni ne daay daay Loydininne ne daay Ewuniiqin de7iyaa ammanuwaa mala; qassi neenanikka hewe de7iyaawaa eraaddi.
55001006	Hewaa diraw, taani ta kushiyaa laa77uwaa ne bolla wotheedda wode, Xoossay new immeedda imuwaa neeni doshissenna mala, neena hassayissay.
55001007	Ayissi gooppe, Xoossay nuussi wolqqaa, siiquwaanne nu huuphiya naagiyaawaa immiya Geeshsha Ayyaanaa immeeddappe attin, yashshaa ayyaanaa immibeenna.
55001008	Simmi, nu Godaw markkattiyaawan woy A diraw qashuwan de7iyaa tawankka yeellatoppa. Shin Xoossay new immiyaa wolqqaa keenaan taananna mishiraachchuwaa qaalaw waayyetta.
55001009	Xoossay bare qofaaninne bare aadho keekatethan nuuna ashshiide, bare asaa oothanaw xeesowaappe attin, nuuni ootheedda oosuwaa diraw gidenna. I ha aadho keekatethaa Kiristtoosi Yesuusa bagganna wodii doomettanaappe kase nuussi immeedda.
55001010	Shin ha77i ha aadho keekatethay nuuna ashshiya Kiristtoosi Yesuusa yuussaan nuussi qoncceedda. Qassi hayquwaa wolqqaakka I dhayisseedda. Wonggalaa mishiraachchuwaa bagganna bayenna de7uwaa nuussi qonccisseedda.
55001011	Taani Yesuusi kiitteeddawaanne Ayihuda gidenna asaa tamaarissiyaawaa gidaade, wonggalaa mishiraachchuwaa odana mala, Xoossay taana dooreedda.
55001012	Qassi taani ha metuwaa akkiyawe hewaa diraassa. Shin taani ammaneeddawaa eriyaa diraw, yeellatikke. Qassi I taw immeedda hadaraa he gallassay gakkanaw, I naaganaw danddayiyaawaa eray.
55001013	Taani neena tamaarisseedda tumu qaalaa leemisuwaa uda oyiqqaade, Kiristtoosi Yesuusan nuussi de7iyaa ammanuwaaninne siiquwan de7a.
55001014	Nu giddon de7iyaa Geeshsha Ayyaanaa bagganna new hadaraa immeedda lo77obaa naaga.
55001015	Iisiya giya biittaan de7iyaa ubbatuu taappe baqateeddawaa eraasa; unttunttu giddon Pigeluusinne Hermogeneesi de7iino.
55001016	Henesifooru taana daro wode menthetheedda diraw, Goday A soy asaw maarotethaa immo. Qassi taani qasho gollen de7iyaawaa I yeellatibeenna.
55001017	Shin Roome giya katamaa gakkeeddasaanna taana loythi koyyiide demmeedda.
55001018	He gallassi Godaappe maarotethaa demmanaadan, Goday aw immo. Qassi Efesoona giya katamaan I taana ay keenaa maaddeeddenttonne neeni loytha eraasa.
55002001	Simmi ta na7aw, Kiristtoosi Yesuusan de7iyaa aadho keekatethan minna.
55002002	Qassi daro markkatuu de7iyaasaan taappe neeni siseedda yewatuwaa haratuwaa tamaarissanaw danddayiyaa ammanetteedda asatuwaassi hadaraa imma.
55002003	Kiristtoosa Yesuusaw ammanetteedda wottaaddaraadan, taananna waayyetta.
55002004	Olaa biya wottaaddaray bare kaappuwaa nashechchanaw, wottaaddara gidenna asay oothiyaa kiitaan walakettenna.
55002005	Qassi wothaan keesettiyaa uraykka wogaadan woxxana dhayooppe, woytaa akkenna.
55002006	Daro daaburiide ootheedda biittaa goshiyaa bitani shiiqeedda kathaappe barena gakkiyaawaa koyro akkanaw bessee.
55002007	Neeni ubbabaa akeekanaadan, Goday neena danddayissana diraw, taani giyaawaa qoppa.
55002008	Taani wonggalaa mishiraachchuwaa odiyaawaadan, hayquwaappe denddeedda Daawite zariyaa Yesuusi Kiristtoosa qoppa.
55002009	Taani wonggalaa mishiraachchuwaa odiyaa diraw, iitabaa ootheeddawaadan, haray atto qashettana gakkanaw waayyettay. Shin Xoossaa qaalay qashettenna.
55002010	Hewaa diraw, taani Xoossay dooreedda asatuukka Kiristtoosi Yesuusan de7iyaa atotethaa medhinaa bonchchuwaanna demmanaadan, unttunttu diraw, taani ubbabaan waayyettay.
55002011	Hawe, “Nuuni aananna ittippe hayqqeeddawaa gidooppe, aananna ittippe de7ana.
55002012	Nuuni genccooppe, aananna ittippe kawutana. Nuuni A kaddooppe, ikka nuuna kaddana.
55002013	Nuuni ammanettennaan aggooppekka, I ammanettiyaawaa gidiide de7anawaa. Ayissi gooppe, I barena bare huuphew erikke gaanaw danddayenna” giyaawe tumu haasaya.
55002014	Neeni ne asaa hawaa hassayissa; unttunttu qaalaan palumettenna mala, Xoossaa sinthan zora. Hewe sisiyaa asaa bayizziyaawaappe attin, aynne go77enna.
55002015	Neeni Xoossaa tumatethaa qaalaa suuretethaan odiyaawaanne qassi A oosoo yeellatenna oosanchcha gidaade, Xoossay sabbiyaa asaadan, ne huuphiya Xoossaw immanaw minna.
55002016	Shin ha sa7aw injjetiyaa maaddenna haasayaappe neena naaga. Ayissi gooppe, hewe Xoossaappe asaa haassee.
55002017	Qassi unttunttu tamaarissiyaawe bollaa cittuwaadan ubbasaa gakkanaassa. He tamaarissiyaawanttuppe laa77atuu Hemeneyoosanne Piliixoosa.
55002018	Unttunttu tumuwaa ogiyaa aggiide, “Hayquwaappe denddiyaawe kase aadhdhidiggeedda” yaagiide amareedda ammaniyaa asatuwaa ammanuwaa bayizziino.
55002019	Gidooppekka, Xoossay esseedda mino tuussay qaaxxana danddayenna. Qassi A bollan, “Goday barewantta eree”; qassi “Godaawaa gidiyaa ooninne iita oosuwaa aggo” yaagiyaa qaalatuu xaafetteeddino.
55002020	Itti wolqqaama gollen worqqaappenne biraappe medhetteedda miishshaa xalalaa gidennaan, mithaappenne urqqaappe medhetteedda miishshatuukka de7iino. Hewanttuppe baggatuu bonchcho oosuwaa unttunttun oothanaw, qassi baggatuu tooshettiyaabaa unttunttun oothanaw medhetteeddino.
55002021	Hewaa diraw, ooninne ha iitabaa ubbaappe barena geeshshooppe, I bare Godaa go77iyaa oosuwaa oothanaw barena immeedda diraw, bonchcho oosuwaa oothiyaa miishshaa gidanawa. Qassi lo77o oosuwaa ubbaa oothanaw giigetteedawaa gidanawa.
55002022	Shin neeni iita wodallatethaa amuwaappe baqata. Barentta maaddanaw geeshsha wozanaappe Godaa xeesisiyaawanttunna ittippe, xillotethaa, ammanuwaa, siiqotethaanne sarotethaa minissaade kaalla.
55002023	Shin eeyatuwaa palumiinne aynne erennawanttu palumii walassaa kaalethiyaawaa eraade aappe baqata.
55002024	Godaa qoomay ubbaw keekiyaawaa, loythi tamaarissiyaawaanne danddayanchcha giddanaw besseeppe attin, walaqqetanaw bessenna.
55002025	Qassi I barena ixxiyaawantta ashikketethan seeriyaawaa giddanaw bessee. Unttunttu barenttu nagaraappe simmiide, tumatethaa eranaadan Xoossay oothanentto, ooni eri.
55002026	Qassi unttunttu barenttu wozanaa qofaw simmiide, unttuntta bare koyyeeddabaw azazettana mala oyqqeedda xalahiyaa kaappuwaa dabbaappe kessi akkana.
55003001	Shin wurssetha gallassi waayissiyaa wodii yaanawaa akeeka.
55003002	Ayissi gooppe, asay barena siiqiyaawantta, shaluwaa siiqiyaawantta, ceeqettiyaawantta, ayyiyaawantta, boriyaawantta, barena yeleeddawanttoo azazettennawantta, galatennawantta, geeshshatethay baynnawantta,
55003003	siiquu baynnawantta, sigettennawantta, zigirssanchchatuwaa, barena naagennawantta, keekennawantta, lo77obaa dosennawantta,
55003004	ubbaa erikke giyaawantta, dirbbiyawantta, otoruwan sugettiyawantta, qassi Xoossaappe aathiide, ishaluwaa dosiyawantta gidana.
55003005	Unttunttu Xoossaw goyinniyaawaa malatiino; shin A wolqqaa kaddeeddino. Hewanttu mala asatuwaakko shiiqoppa.
55003006	-
55003007	Ayissi gooppe, unttunttuppe ittu ittuu asaa golliyaa geliide, nagaray deexeeddawantta, dumma dumma amuwan sugettiyawantta, ubba wode tamaariide, tumatethaa era akkanaw mule danddayibeenna daaburanchcha maccawantta balethiino.
55003008	Yaaneesinne Yambbareesi Muse yewuwaa phalqqowaadan, hewaadan qassi hawanttu, suure qofay baynnawantta ammanuwan kunddeeddawanttu, tumatethaabaa phalqqiino.
55003009	Shin Yaaneesa eeyatethaynne Yambbareesa eeyatethay qassi qoncceeddawaadan, unttunttu eeyatethaykka asaa ubbaw qonccana diraw, unttunttu kasewaappe aadhdhiide diccikkino.
55003010	Shin neeni ta timirttiyaa, ta hanotaanne ta qofaa, ta ammanuwaanne ta danddayaa, ta siiquwaanne ta genccuwaa,
55003011	ta yedesaanne ta waayyiyaa be7aadda. Anxxookiyaanne, Iqooniyoonenne Lisxxiraa giyaa katamatuwaan taana gakkeeddabaanne taani danddayeedda yedesaa eraasa. Goday taana he ubbaappe ashsheedda.
55003012	Tumatethaan Kiristtoosi Yesuusan Xoossaa malatiide de7anaw dosiyaa ubbay yederssettana.
55003013	Shin iita asatuunne balethiyaawanttu haratuwaa balethiiddenne barenttu huuphew baliidde, kaseppe iiti iiti biino.
55003014	Shin neeni he tumatethaa ooppe tamaareeddenttonne eraade, neeni tamaareeddawaaninne ereeddawaan minnaade de7a.
55003015	Neeni guutha naa7atethaappe doommaade Kiristtoosi Yesuusa ammanaade, atotethay beettiyaa aadhdheedda eraa immanaw danddayiyaa Geeshsha Maxaafatuwaa eraadda.
55003016	-
55003017	Xoossaa Maxaafaa ubbaan Xoossaa Ayyaanay de7ee. Qassi he maxaafatuu Xoossaw oothiyaa asay kumenthanne lo77o oosuwaa ubbaw giigeeddawaa gidana mala, tumatethaa tamaarissanaw, balaa seeranaw, bayizzuwaa suurissanawunne xillotethaa de7oo zoriyaa immanaw maaddiino.
55004001	Taani neena Xoossaa sinthaaninne, de7uwan de7iyaa asaanne hayqqeedda asaa pirddanaw de7iyaa Kiristtoosi Yesuusa sinthan, qassi A yuussaaninne A kawutethaan neena zoray.
55004002	Qaalaa oda. Wodii injjetina injjetana dhayina, minnaade oda. Daro danddayan asaa tamaarissaadde suurissa, seeranne zora.
55004003	Ayissi gooppe, asay tumu timirttiyaa sisennaan ixxiyaa wodii yaanawaa. Shin asay barenttu amuwaa kaalliide, sisanaw nashechchiyaawaa odiyaa tamaarissiyaawantta gujji gujji shiishshana.
55004004	Unttunttu tumu yewuwaa sisiyaawaa aggiide, tossaa sisanaw barenttu haythaa wora zaarana.
55004005	Shin neeni ubbabaani ne huuphiya naaganaw bessee. Waayyiyaa danddaya. Wonggalaa mishiraachchuwaa odiyaawe oothiyaa oosuwaa ootha. Xoossaa qoomaadan, ne oothiyaa oosuwaa ubbaa pola.
55004006	Taana gidooppe, ta suuthay gukkiide yarshshettiyaa wodiinne qassi ha de7uwa aggaade biya wodii gakkeedda.
55004007	Taani lo77o baaxiyaa baaxetaaddi; wothaa woxxaadde wurssaaddi; ammanuwakka naagaaddi.
55004008	Sinthappe taw xillotethaa akililii giigi utteedda. Hewaa xillo pirddaa pirddiyaa Goday he gallassi taw immana. Qassi Kiristtoosi qonccanawaa dosiyaa ubbaassappe attin, ta xalalaassa gidenna.
55004009	Taakko ellekka yaanaw minna.
55004010	Ayissi gooppe, Deemaasi ha alamiyaa dosiide, taana aggiide, Teselonqqiyaa giya katamaa beedda. Qerqqiisi Galaatiyaa giya gadiya biina, qassi Tiito Dilmaaxiyaa giya gadiya beedda.
55004011	Luqaasa xalalay taananna de7ee. Marqqoossi taana kiitaan loythi maaddanaw danddayiyaa diraw, A demmaade neenanna akkaade ya.
55004012	Shin taani Tikiqoosa Efesoona giya katamaa kiittaaddi.
55004013	Neeni yaadde, Xiro7aadaa giya katamaan Karppoosawan taani yeggaade yeedda ta gaabiyaanne qassi maxaafatuwaa taw akkaade ya. Shin dummayaade galbbaan xaafetteedda maxaafatuwaa ayaa giddoppene, akkennaan yooppa.
55004014	Birataa qoxxiyaa Iskkinddiri taana daro qoheedda; Goday aw A oosuwaadan zaarana.
55004015	I nuuni odiyaawaa loythi phalqqiyaa diraw, neeni aappe neena naaga.
55004016	Koyro taana mootiyaa wode, ubbaykka aggeeddawaappe attin, taana ooninne maaddibeenna. Xoossay hewaa unttunttoo paydoppo.
55004017	Shin taani kumentha kiitaa Ayihuda gidenna asay ubbay sisanaw odana mala, Goday ta matan eqqiide, taw wolqqaa immeedda. Qassi gaammuwaa doonaappekka taana ashsheedda.
55004018	Goday taana iitabaa ubbaappe ashshiide, bare saluwaa kawutethaa sarotethaan afana; aw medhi medhinaw bonchchuu gido. Amen77i.
55004019	Phirisqqillissi, Aqiilaassinne Henesifooru soy asaw ta sarotaa oda.
55004020	Erasxxoosi Qoronttoosa giya katamaan atteedda. Shin Xirofiimoosi saketteedda diraw, Miliixe giya katamaan A wothaaddi.
55004021	Balgguu wodhdhanaappe kase yaanaw minna. Ewubuluusi, Phudeesi, Liinoosinne Qilawude qassi hara ishatuu ubbaykka neena saro saro giino.
55004022	Goday ne ayyaanaanna gido. Aadho keekatethay hinttenanna ubbaanna gido. Amen77i.
56001001	Yesuusi Kiristtoosi kiitteedda taani Phawuloosi, Xoossaa aylli, ha dabidaabbiyaa xaafay. Xoossay dooreedda asaw ammanuu de7anaadaaninne Xoossaa tumatethaa eraakko unttuntta kaalethanaadan taani doorettaade kiitettaaddi.
56001002	Worddotenna Xoossay nuussi ha medhinaa de7uwaa daro wodiyaappe kase immana geedda.
56001003	Xoossay nuuna ashshiyaawe likke wodiyaan bare qaalaan hawaa qonccisseedda; I hadariide taana azazeeddawaadan, taani A qaalaa oday.
56001004	Ammanuwaa ittippetethaan ta tumu na7aa new Tiitoo, Xoossaa Aawuwaappenne nuuna ashshiya Yesuusi Kiristtoosappe, aadho keekatethay, maarotethaynne sarotethay gido.
56001005	Taani neena Qarxxeesan aggaade yeeddawe, neeni attowaa giigissanaassanne, taani azazeeddawaadan, katamaa ubbaan woosa golliyaa cimatuwaa dooranaassa.
56001006	Cimay borettenawaanne itti machchatti xalalay de7iyaawaanne ammaniyaa naanay de7iyaawaa giddanaw bessee; A naanay shalluwaa bayizziyaabaaninne woy azazettennaan ixxiyaaban asay amassalennawantta gidanaw bessee.
56001007	Ayissi gooppe, he cimay Xoossaa oosuwaa azaziya kaappuwaa gidiidde, pokkissennawaa, otorettennawaanne elle hanqqettennawaa giddanaw bessee; qassi mathottennawaa, sugennawaanne yorattennawaa giddanaw bessee.
56001008	Shin imatha mokkiyaawaanne lo77obaa dosiyaawaa giddanaw bessee; qassi akeekanchchaa, xilluwaa, geeshshaanne barena naagiyaawaa giddanaw bessee.
56001009	Ammanettiya de7uu beettiyaa timirttiyaanna giigiyaa qaalaa I loythi oyqqo. Yaatooppe haratuwaa tumu ammanuwaa tamaarissiyaawaani menthethanawunne qassi hewaa ixxiyaawanttakka zoranaw danddayanawa.
56001010	Ayissi gooppe, azazettennawanttu, maaddennawaa haasayiyaawanttu, haratuwaa cimmiyaawanttunne qaxxaretteedda Ayihuda ammaniyaawanttu bagga gideedda daro asatuu de7iino.
56001011	Unttunttu tamaarissanaw bessenna pokkiyaa ogiyaan miishshaa demmanaw tamaarissiyaawaan golliyaa ubbaa bayzziyaa diraw, unttunttu haasayaa te77ana bessee.
56001012	Unttunttu giddoppe ittuu, timbbitiyaa odiyaawe unttunttoo, “Qarixxeese asay ubba wode, worddatuwaa, iita du7atuwaanne yoranchchaa; qassi azalla asaa” yaageedda.
56001013	-
56001014	I markkattowe tuma; hewaa diraw, neeni unttunttussi mino ammanuu de7anaadaaninne qassi Ayihudatuwaa tossaanne tumuwaa ixxeedda asatuwaa azazuwaa unttunttu sisennaadan, unttuntta minissaade seeranaw bessee.
56001015	Barenttu huuphew geeshsha gideeddawanttussi ubbabaykka geeshsha; shin tunatuwaassinne ammanennawanttussi unttunttu wozanaa qofaynne unttuntta suure wozanay tuneedda diraw, unttunttoo ayaynne geeshsha gidenna.
56001016	Unttunttu barenttu Xoossaa eriyaawaa qoncciyaan odiino; shin unttunttu sheneyiyaawantta, azazettennawanttanne oosuwaa ubbawukka giigennawantta gidiyaa diraw, barenttu kiitaan A erokko giino.
56002001	Shin neeni de7uwaa demmanaw giigiyaa timirttiyaa tamaarissanaw bessee.
56002002	Cima attuma asay ammanuwan, siiquwaaninne danddayan mino gidanaadan, qassi mathottennawaa, bonchchettiyaawaanne barenakka naagiyaawaa gidanaadan zora.
56002003	Hewaadankka cima macca asay geeshsha de7uwa de7iyaawantta, zigirennawantta, woyiniyaa eessaassi moodettennawanttanne lo77obaa tamaarissiyaawantta gidanaw bessee.
56002004	-
56002005	Unttunttu Xoossaa qaalay borettenna mala, barenttu asinatuwaanne barenttu naanaa siiqiyaawantta, barenttakka naagiyaawantta, geeshshatuwaa, barenttu gollen oothiyaawantta, keekatuwaanne barenttu asinatuwaasikka azazettiyaawantta gidana mala, yalaga maccawantta tamaarissa.
56002006	Hewaadankka yalaga attuma asatuu barentta naagana mala zora.
56002007	Neeni ne huuphewukka lo77o oosuwaa ubbaan unttunttoo leemiso gida; neeni tamaarissiyaawankka ammanettiyaawaanne bonchchettiyaawaa gida.
56002008	Ne morkketuu nuuna zigiriyaabay unttunttussi dhayiyaa wode unttunttu yeellatana mala, neeni borettenna lo77o haasayaa haasaya.
56002009	Ayilletuu barenttu godatuwaassi azazettana malanne, unttunttunna palumettennan ubbabaani unttuntta nashechchana mala zora.
56002010	Unttunttu barenttu godatuwaappe wuu77enna mala, qassi nuuna ashshiyaa Xoossawaa tamaarissiyawaa ubbabaani galatissanaw, barenttu oothiyaa kiitaan ubba wode lo77anne ammanettiyaawantta gidiyaawaa bessana mala, unttuntta zora.
56002011	Ayissi gooppe, Xoossay asaa ubbaa ashshiya bare aadho keekatethaa qonccisseedda.
56002012	He aadho keekatethay nagaraa oosuwaanne ha alamiyaa amuwaa nuuni agganaadaaninne nu huuphiya naagiide, Xoossaa malatiide, xillotethan de7anaadan, nuuna tamaarissee.
56002013	Nuuni nu wolqqaama Xoossay, nuuna ashshiya Yesuusi Kiristtoosi beettana geedda anjjetteedda bonchcho gallassaa naageetto.
56002014	Iita oosuwaa ubbaappe I nuuna wozanawunne lo77obaa oothanaw amottiyaa bare geeshsha asaa kessanaw, nu diraw, bare huuphiya immeedda.
56002015	Neeni hawaa tamaarissa, ne kumentha maataani zoranne seera; ooninne neena kadhoppo.
56003001	-
56003002	Unttunttu mooddiyaawanttussinne maatay de7iyaawanttussi moodettanaw, azazettanawunne lo77o oosuwaa ubbaa oothanaw giigettanaadan unttuntta hassayissa; qassi unttunttu O bollaninne iita qaalaa haasayenna mala, oonannanne walaqettenna mala, asaa ubbaa ashikketethaanne sigatethaa bessiyaawantta gidanaadan zora.
56003003	Ayissi gooppe, nuuni kase nu huuphewukka eeyatuwaa, azazettennawantta, baliyaawanttanne amuwaassinne dumma dumma nashechchaassi ayilliyaadan moodettiyaawantta; qassi iitatethaaninne qanaatiyaan de7iyaawantta; asaan ixettiyaawanttanne ittu ittuwakka ixxiyaawantta.
56003004	Shin nuuna ashshiya Xoossaa keekatethaynne asaa I siiqiyaa siquu qoncceedda wode,
56003005	I bare maarotethaadankka, ooratha yelettussaan haneedda geeyyussaaninne Geeshsha Ayyaanan ooraxxeeddawan nuuna ashsheeddawaappe attin, nuuni xillo oosuwaa ootheeddawaana gidenna.
56003006	-
56003007	Xoossay bare aadho keekatethan nuuni xillanaadaaninne, I immana geedda medhinaa de7uwaa laattanaadan, nuuna ashshiya Yesuusi Kiristtoosa bagganna Geeshsha Ayyaanaa nu bolla darissiide tigeedda.
56003008	Ha haasayay ammanetteeddawaa; Xoossaa asatuu lo77o oosuwaa oothanaw giiganaadan, ha yewuwaa unttunttussi neeni minissaade odanaw koyyay; hawanttu asaw lo77anne go77iyaawantta.
56003009	Shin eeyatethaa palumaappe, zariyaa paydiyaawaappe, walassaappenne higgiyaaban walaqettiyaawaappe naagetta. Ayissi gooppe, hewanttu go77ennawanttanne maaddennawantta.
56003010	-
56003011	Shaakotethaa medhdhiyaa uray geella asa gidiyaawaanne bare huuphiyaan pirddiide nagaraa oothiyaawaa eraade, itti gede woy laa77u gede A seereeddawaappe guyyiyan, hewaa malatiyaa asaappe shaaketta.
56003012	Taani Arxxemaasa woy Tikiqoosa neekko kiittiya wode, neeni taakko Niqoophiliyoona yaanaw minna. Ayissi gooppe, taani balgguwaa yaani shaaccanaw qofaa qachchaaddi.
56003013	Higgiyaa eriya Zeenaasinne Aphiloosi ogiyaa biya wode, unttunttussi ayaynne paccenna mala, unttuntta loytha maadda.
56003014	Nu asaykka maaddenna asa gidiide attenna mala, barentta loythi koshshiyaawaa demmanaw, lo77o oosuwaa minniide oothiyaawaa tamaarino.
56003015	Taananna de7iyaa ubbatuu neena saro saro geeddino. Nuuna ammanuwan siiqiyaawantta saro saro ga. Xoossaa aadho keekatethay hinttenanna ubbaanna ittippe gido. Amen77i.
57001001	Taani Phawuloosi, Yesuusi Kiristtoosa diraw qashuwan de7iyaawenne nu ishaa Ximootoosi, nuunanna oothiyaa nuuni siiqiyaa Pilimoonaw,
57001002	ne gollen shiiqiyaa ammaniyaawanttoo, nu michchatti Afibissinne nuunanna ittippe de7iyaa Kiristtoosa wottaaddaraa Arkkipoosaw ha dabidaabbiyaa xaafeetto.
57001003	Xoossaa nu Aawuwaappenne nu Godaa Yesuusi Kiristtoosappe aadho keekatethaynne sarotethay hinttenttussi gido.
57001004	-
57001005	Neeni Xoossaa asatuwaa siiqiyaawaanne Godaa Yesuusa ammaniyaawaa taani sisiyaa diraw, Xoossaa woossaade neena hassayiya wode ubbaan, ta Xoossaa galatay.
57001006	Neeni ne ammanuwaa haratuwaanna shaakkiyaawe nuussi Kiristtoosi Yesuusa bagganna yiyaa lo77obaa ubbaa erissana mala, taani Xoossaa woossay.
57001007	Ayissi gooppe, Xoossaa asatuwaa wozanay ne kiitaan minneedda diraw, ta ishaw, taani ne siiquwan daro nashechchaanne menthethuwaa demmaaddi.
57001008	Hewaa diraw, neeni oothanaw bessiyaawaa oothana mala, taani neena azazanaw Kiristtoosa bagganna xalooppekka,
57001009	Taani Phawuloosi cimeeddawe, Kiristtoosi Yesuusaw ha77ikka qashuwan de7iyaawe, siiquwaa diraw, neena woossay.
57001010	Taani qashuwan de7aadde aw aawuwaa gideedda ta na7aa Anaasimoosa diraw, neena woossay.
57001011	I kase neena go77enna; shin ha77i neenakka taanakka tumu go77ee.
57001012	-
57001013	Taani wozanappe dosiyaa Anaasimoosa neekko yeddowe ta wozanaa yeddowaa. Taani wonggalaa diraw qashetta utta de7ishshin, neena kochchiide, taana maaddana mala, ta matan A ashshanaw koyyay.
57001014	Shin neeni ne sheniyaadan oothanaawaa koyyayppe attin, neenanna zorettennan wolqqan aynne oothanaw koyyikke.
57001015	Anaasimoosi guutha wodiyaa neeppe shaaketteeddawe, ooni eri simmiide, ubba wodekka neenanna de7anaassenttonne.
57001016	Simmi hawaappe sinthaw Anaasimoosi aylliya gidenna; shin aylliyaappe I loythi aadhdhee; I taw ay keena siiqo ishee! Qassi I new asaa baggaannakka Godaa baggaannakka ay keena aadhdheedda ishaa gidanddeeshsha!
57001017	Simmi neeni taana ne laggethaa giyaawaa gidooppe, taana mokkiyaawaadan, A mokka.
57001018	I new bayizzeeddabay woy A bolla new acuu de7ooppe, taappe cigaa akka.
57001019	He acuwaa taani ciggana gaade, taani Phawuloosi ta kushiyan xaafay. Neeni taw ne shemppuwaa acota utteeddawaa taani neena hassayissanaw koshshenna.
57001020	E, ta ishaw, Godaa bagganna neeppe maaduwaa demmanaw koyyay. Kiristtoosa bagganna taana menthetha.
57001021	Taani geeddawaappe daruwaa neeni oothanaawaa eraade, qassi ne taw azazettanawaakka ammanaade, hawaa new xaafay.
57001022	Qassi hinttenttu ellekka taw imathay shemppiyaa golliyaa giigissite. Ayissi gooppe, Xoossay hinttenttu woosan taana hinttenttussi guyye zaariide immana gaade qoppay.
57001023	Kiristtoosi Yesuusa diraw, taananna qashuwan de7iyaa Eppaafiri neena saro saro gee.
57001024	Qassi taananna ittippe oothiyaa Marqqoossi, Arisxxirokoosi, Deemaasinne Luqaasi neena saro saro giino.
57001025	Godaa Yesuusi Kiristtoosa aadho keekatethay hinttenttu ayyaanaanna gido.
58001001	Xoossay beni wode, nu aawotuu nabatuwaa bagganna dumma dumma ogiyaaninne daro wodiyaan haasayeedda.
58001002	Shin ha wurssetha wodiyaan, ubbabaa A laatissiide, yeletaa A bagganna medhdheedda bare Na7aa bagganna nuussi haasayeedda.
58001003	Na7ay Xoossaa bonchcho poo7uwaa phoolee; qassi kumentha Xoossaa eeshshaa akkiide, bare wolqqaama qaalaan ha sa7aa naagee; yaatiide asaa nagaraappe geeshshiide, Ubbaappe Bolla Xoossaappe ushechcha bagganna saluwan utteedda.
58001004	Xoossay aw immeedda sunthatethay kiitanchchatuwaappe dhoqqa gidiyaawadankka, unttunttuppe A loythi dhoqqu ootheedda.
58001005	Ayissi gooppe, Xoossay bare kiitanchchatuwappe oona, “Neeni ta Na7aa; taani hachche new aawuwaa gidaaddi” geeddee? Woy qassi oona, “Taani aw aawuwaa gidana; ikka taw na7a gidana” geeddee?
58001006	Qassi Xoossay bare bayra Na7aa ha sa7aa yeddana haniidde, “Ta kiitanchchatuwaa ubbatuukka aw goyinnino” yaageedda.
58001007	Xoossay kiitanchchatuwaabaa haasayiidde, “Taani ta kiitanchchatuwaa carkkuwaa kessay; qassi ta oosanchchatuwaakka tamaa lacuwaa kessay” yaagee.
58001008	Shin bare Na7aawaa haasayiidde, “Xoossaw, ne kawutethaa oydii medhi medhinaw de7ee. Ne kawutethaa xillotethaan ahasaa.
58001009	Neeni xillotethaa siiqaade; naaquwaa ixxaadda. Xoossay, ne Xoossay neena ne laggetuwaappe aathiide, nashechchaan ililissiyaa zaytiyaa okkeeddawe hawaassa” yaagee.
58001010	Xoossay hawaadan yaagee; “Godaw, koyro neeni sa7aa medhdhaadda; saluwaakka ne kushiyan medhdhaadda.
58001011	Hewanttu ubbay dhayana; shin neeni de7ana. Unttunttu ubbaykka afilaadan wurana.
58001012	Neeni unttuntta gaabiyaadan dakkoyana; qassi unttunttu afilaadan laamettanawantta. Shin neeni neenakka; ne laythay ubbaakka wurenna” yaagee.
58001013	Shin Xoossay bare kiitanchchatuwappe ittuwaanne, “Taani ne morkketuwaa neeni gediyan yedhdhiyaawaa oothana gakkanaw, hawaan taappe ushechcha baggan utta” gibeenna.
58001014	Kiitanchchatuu ubbay Xoossaw oothanawunne atotethaa demmana asatuwaa maaddanaw Xoossay kiitteedda ayyaanatuwa gidikkinooyee?
58002001	Hewaa diraw, nuuni siseedda tumu yewuwaappe sugetti wora beenna mala, he yewuwaa loythi oyqqanaw bessee.
58002002	Ayissi gooppe, kiitanchchatuu odeedda qaalay tuma gidiyaa diraw, naaqqiyaa woy azazettenna asay ubbay muretteeddawaa gidooppe,
58002003	Yaatina, nuuni ha wolqqaama atotethaa sheneko gooppe, waaniide attanee? Goday koyro bare huuphew ha atotethaa odeedda; qassi I odeeddawaa siseeddawanttu nuussi geeshshiide odeeddino.
58002004	He siseeddawanttu markkatteeddawe bolla Xoossaykka mallaa, oorathabaanne dumma dumma malaata kiitettiyaawan gujji markkatteedda; qassi Geeshsha Ayyaanaa imuwaakka bare koyyeeddawaadan, gishi gatheedda.
58002005	Ayissi gooppe, Xoossay nuuni haasayiyaa sinthaappe yaana alamiyaa, kiitanchchatuwa moodissibeenna.
58002006	Shin Xoossaa Maxaafay itti saan hawaadan yaagee; “Xoossaw, neeni asaawaa qoppanaw asay aye? Woy neeni aw hirgganaw I ayee?
58002007	Neeni kiitanchchatuwappe amareedda wodiyaa A guuthaadda. A huuphiyankka bonchchuwaanne sabaa akililiyaa wothaadda.
58002008	Qassi ubbabaa A gediyaappe garssanna wothaade moodissaadda” yaagee. Ayissi gooppe, Xoossay ubbabaakka A moodisseeddawaadan aani moodettibeennawe ayaynne baawa; shin ha77i ubbabay aw moodettiyaawe nuussi beettenna.
58002009	Shin nuuni Yesuusa be7eetto; Yesuusi Xoossaa aadho keekatethaa bagganna asa ubbaw hayqqana mala, amareedda wodiyaa kiitanchchatuwappe garssa gideedda. Qassi hayquwaa waayyiyaa I waayyetteedda diraw, poo7iya bonchchuwaanne sabaa akililiyaa wotheeddawaa ha77i nuuni be7eetto.
58002010	Xoossay ubbabaa medhdheeddawe, ubbabaakka naagiyawe, Yesuusi daro naanaa ahiide, barenanna bonchchissana mala, waayyiyaa bagganna Yesuusa balay baynnawaa ootheeddawaa bessee; ayissi gooppe, he naanaa atotethaw kaalethiyaawe Yesuusa.
58002011	Ayissi gooppe, asaa geeshshiyaa Yesuusawukka qassi he geeyyeedda asaa ubbawukka Aawuu ittuwa. Yesuusi unttuntta, “Ta ishatuwaa” giide yeellatennaan xeesiyaawe hawaassa.
58002012	Yesuusi, “Taani ne sunthaa ta ishatoo awaajjana. Maabaraa shiiquwankka neena galatana” yaagee.
58002013	Qassi I, “Taani ta ammanuwaa Xoossaan wothana” qassikka, “Xoossay taw immeedda naanatuwaanna taani hawaan de7ay” yaagee.
58002014	Naanaa giide I xeesiyaawanttu, ashuwaappenne suuthaappe medhetteedda asatuwaa gidiyaa diraw, Yesuusi bare huuphew unttuntta malatiide, unttunttu medhetaa akkeedda; qassi I hewaa ootheeddawe, xalahiyaa kaappuwaa hayquwaa bolla maatay de7iyaawaa bare hayquwan dhayissanaassa.
58002015	Qassi barenttu de7uwaa ubbaan hayqoo yayyiide, hayqoo aylletiide de7iyaawantta ubbatuwaa aylletethaappe kesseedda.
58002016	Ayissi gooppe, Abraahaama zariyaa I maaddiyawaappe attin, kiitanchchatuwa maaddennawe eretteedda.
58002017	Hewaa diraw, asaa nagaray atto geetettana mala, Xoossaa kiitaan ammanetteedda maariyaa qeesatuwaa ubbatuwaa kaappuwaa gidana mala, ubbabaani I bare ishatuwaa malatanaw bessee.
58002018	Ayissi gooppe, I bare huuphew paacetteedda dirawunne waayyetteedda diraw, paacettiyaawantta maaddanaw danddayee.
58003001	Hewaa diraw, Xoossay xeeseedda geeshsha ishatoo, nu markkatethaa Xoossay kiitteeddawaa qeesatuwaa ubbatuwaa kaappuwaa, Yesuusi Kiristtoosa qoppite.
58003002	Muse bare kiitaan Xoossaa golliyaa ubbaan ammanetteeddawaa gideeddawaadan, Yesuusikka barena dooriide, ha oosoo yeddeedda Xoossaw ammanetteeddawaa.
58003003	Ayissi gooppe, keexettiya golliyaappe keexxiyaa bitani bonchchettiyaawaadan, Musewaappe aadhdhiyaa bonchchuwaa I akkanaw bessiyaawe eretteeddawaa.
58003004	Ayissi gooppe, golliyaa ubbaa keexxeeddawe itti asaa; shin ubbabaa keexxeeddawe Xoossaa.
58003005	Muse Xoossaa golliyaa ubbaan ammanetteedda oosanchchaa gidiide, Xoossay sinthaappe gaanawaa markkatteedda.
58003006	Shin Kiristtoosi Xoossaa gollen na7adan ammanetteeddawaa; nuuni akkana giide nashechchaan naagiyaawaa xalatethaaninne ammanuwan naagooppe, Xoossaw golliyaa gideetto.
58003007	Hewaa diraw, Geeshsha Ayyaanay hawaadan yaagee; “Xoossaa qaalaa hinttenttu hachche sisiyaabaa gidooppe,
58003008	-
58003009	hinttenttu aawotuu taw ixxi makkaliide, oytamu laythaa ta oosuwaa be7eedda bazzuwaa paaciyaa gallassaadan, hinttentukka zoriyaa akkennaan ixxoppite.
58003010	Hewaa diraw, taani he asaa hanqqettaade, ‘Unttunttu ubba wode barenttu wozanaan baliino. Ta ogiyaakka eribeykkino’ yaagaaddi.
58003011	Hewaadankka qassi, taani hanqqetta caaqqaade, ‘Taani shemppiyaasaa unttunttu ubbakka gelikkino’ yaagaaddi” yaagee.
58003012	Taanaadan ammaniyaawanttoo, de7uwa Xoossaappe hinttentta shaakkiyaa iita ammanenna wozanay hinttenan oonaninne de7enna mala naagettite.
58003013	Shin Xoossay hinttentta ubba gallassi hachche giide xeesishin, hintteppe oonanne nagaray balethina, zoriyaa akkennaan ixxenna mala, ittu ittuwa zorite.
58003014	Ayissi gooppe, nuuni koyro nuussi de7iya ammanuwaa wurssethay gakkanaw loythi naagooppe, Kiristtoosanna ittippe shaakkana.
58003015	Xoossaa Maxaafay, “Xoossaa qaalaa hinttenttu hachche sisiyaawaa gidooppe, he wode unttunttu ixxi makkaleeddawaadan, zoriyaa akkennaan ixxoppite” yaageedda.
58003016	Xoossay giyaawaa sisiide, aw makkaleedda asatuu oonee? Muse Gibxeppe kaalethina keseedda ubbatuwaa gidikkinooyee?
58003017	Xoossay oytamu laythaa oonan hanqqetteeddee? Anhay woraan atteedda asatuwaa, nagaraa ootheeddawantta gidikkinooyee?
58003018	Qassi Xoossay barew azazettennan ixxeeddawanttu I shemppiyaa sa7aa ubbaakka gelenna mala, unttunttussi caaqqeeddawaappe attin, oossi caaqqeeddee?
58003019	Unttunttu ammanibeenna diraw, shemppiyaasaa gelanaw danddayibeennawaa nuuni be7eetto.
58004001	Simmi Xoossay nuuna bare shemppiyaasaa, “Gelissana” geeddawe bira gidooppe, hintteppe ooninne he shemppiyaasaa gelennaan attenna mala naagetto.
58004002	Ayissi gooppe, unttunttu wonggalaa mishiraachchuwaa siseeddawaadan, nuunikka siseeddo; unttunttu siseeddino, shin ammaniide akkibeenna diraw, aynne unttuntta go77ibeenna.
58004003	Gidooppekka, Xoossaa kiitay sa7ay medhettoodeppe doommina poletteeddawaa gidooppenne, Xoossay, “Taani hanqqetta caaqqaade, ‘Unttunttu taani shemppiyaasaa ubbaakka gelikkino’ yaagaaddi” geeddawaadan, nuuni ammaneeddawanttu I shemppiyaasaa gelana.
58004004	Ayissi gooppe, laappuntha gallassaabaa ittisa7an Xoossaa Maxaafay, “Xoossay laappuntha gallassan bare oosuwaa ubbaappe shemppeedda” yaageedda.
58004005	Qassi he sa7an, “Unttunttu taani shemppiyaasaa ubbakka gelikkino” yaageedda.
58004006	Wonggalaa mishiraachchuwaa koyro siseeddawanttu azazettibeenna diraw, shemppuwaa sa7aa gelibeeykkino; itti itti asatuu yaa gelanawanttu de7iino.
58004007	Xoossay daro wodiyaappe guyyiyan, Daawita bagganna laa7enthuwa itti gallassaa, “Hachche” giya qaalaan keeriide, “Xoossaa qaalaa hinttenttu hachche sisiyaawaa gidooppe, zoriyaa akkennaan ixxoppite” yaageedda.
58004008	Xoossay shemppiyaasaa asaa afiide Iyaasu shemppisseeddawaa gidintto, Xoossay hara gallassaawaa guyye keerenna.
58004009	Hewaa diraw, Xoossaa asaw Sambbataa shemppuu naagetti utteedda.
58004010	Ayissi gooppe, Xoossay shemppiyaasaa geliyaa ooninne, Xoossay bare oosuwaappe shemppeeddawaadan, ikka bare oosuwaappe shemppana.
58004011	Simmi Israa7eeliyaa asay azazettennan ixxiide, Xoossaanna ittippe shemppiyaasaa gelennaan atteeddawaadan, nuuppe ooninne hewaa mala ixuwan yaa gelennaan attenna mala minnoytte.
58004012	Ayissi gooppe, Xoossaa qaalay midhinaw de7iyaawaannee oothiyaawaa; laa77u bagganna leefetteedda mashshaappekka aadhdhiide kuusee. He qaalay shemppuunne ayyaanay, kuriinne kolzzii ittippe gakettiyaasaa shaakkana gakkanaw caddee. Qassi asaa wozanaan de7iyaa koshshaanne qofaa I shaakkee.
58004013	Nuuni oothiyaawaa wochchiyaa Xoossaa sinthan ubbabaykka beettiyaawaappenne qoncciyaan de7iyaawappe attin, A ayfiyan geemmiya medhetay ayaynne baawa.
58004014	Simmi saluwaa beedda, qeesatuwaa ubbatuwaa wolqqaama kaappuu, Xoossaa Na7ay Yesuusi, nuussi de7iyaa diraw, nu ammanuwaa loythi naageetto.
58004015	Ayissi gooppe, nu qeesatuwaa ubbatuwaa kaappuu nuuni daaburiyaa wode nuussi qarettanaw danddayee; nagaraa I oothibeennaawaappe attin, nuunaadan ubbabankka paacetteedda.
58004016	Simmi nuuna koshshiyaa wode maaddiyaa maarotethaa akkanawunne aadho keekatethaa demmanaw, aadho keekatethay de7iya sa7aa Xoossaa araataakko, yayyennaan shiiqoytte.
58005001	Qeesatuwaa ubbatuwaa kaappatuu huuphiyaan huuphiyaan bare asaa giddoppe doorettiide, he asaa gishshataw Xoossaw oothanaw, imuwaa immanawunne nagaraa yarshshuwaa yarshshanaw sunthetteeddino.
58005002	I bare huuphew daaburanchcha gidiyaa diraw, tamaaribeennawanttoonne baliyaawanttoo qarettanaw danddayee.
58005003	Hewaa diraw, he qeesatuwaa ubbatuwaa kaappuu asaa diraw yarshshuwaa yarshshiyaawaadan, bare huuphe nagaraa dirawukka yarshshanaw bessee.
58005004	Xoossay Aaroona qeesatuwaa ubbatuwaa kaappuwaa giddana mala xeeseeddawaadan, Xoossay xeesanaappe attin, ooninne qeesatuwaa ubbatuwaa kaappuwaa gidiyaa bonchchuwaa barew akkanaw danddayenna.
58005005	Hewaadankka, Kiristtoosi qeesatuwaa ubbatuwaa kaappuwaa gidiyaa bonchchuwaa barew akkibeenna; shin Xoossay A, “Neeni ta Na7aa. Taani hachche new Aawuwaa gidaaddi” yaageedda.
58005006	Hewaadankka qassi harasaan, “Malkki-Xedeqi qeesa gideeddawaadan, neenikka medhinaw qeesa gidana” yaageedda.
58005007	Yesuusi sa7an de7iyaa wode, barena hayquwaappe ashshanaw danddayiyaa Xoossaa loythi yeekkiiddenne afoxxiidde woosseeddanne oochcheedda; Xoossay A woosaa siseeddawe, I barena toochcheeddawaassanne aw yayyeeddawaassa.
58005008	Yesuusi Xoossaa Na7aa gidooppenne, bare waayyetteedda waayyiyaan azazettiyaawaa tamaareedda.
58005009	Yesuusi bare oosuwaa poleedda wode, barew azazettiya ubbaw medhinaa atotethaa demmanaw gaaso gideedda.
58005010	Qassi Xoossay Malkki-Xedeqa sunthatethaadan, qeesatuwaa ubbatuwaa kaappuwaa gidana mala, A suntheedda.
58005011	Nuuni ha yewuwaan haasayanabay darobay de7ee; shin hinttenttu akeekanaw azalla gidiyaa diraw, hinttenttussi odi gelissanaw waayisse.
58005012	Ayissi gooppe, hinttenttu ha wodiyaan tamaarissiyaawantta giddanaw bessooppekka, Xoossaa qaalaa koyro timirttiyaa hinttentta zaari tamaarissiyaa itti uraa koshshee; hinttentta ushiyaa maathaa koshsheeppe attin, coommiyaa qumaa koshshenna.
58005013	Maathaa pakettiide de7iyaa ooninne gacino na7aa gidiyaa diraw, xillotethaa timirttiyaawaa erenna.
58005014	Shin mino qumay iitanne keeka de7uwa daruwan shaakki ereedda wozanaama asaassa.
58006001	-
58006002	Hewaa diraw, Kiristtoosa timirttiyaa biro doommiyaawa aggiide, wozanaama asaa timirttew sinthaw boytte; koyro nuuni tamaaranaw koshshiyaa timirttiyaa wodhdhii eqqiide tamaaranaw nuussi bessenna; he timirttii aye gooppe, maaddenna oosuwaappe simmiyaawaa, Xoossaa ammaniyaawaa, xinqqatatuwaabaa, kushiyaa wothuwaabaa, hayquwaappe dendduwaabaanne medhinaa pirddaabaa.
58006003	Xoossay oothite gooppe, hewaa nuuni oothana.
58006004	-
58006005	Ayissi gooppe, ittoodekka poo7uu poo7eeddawanttanne saluwaa imuwaa baari be7eeddawantta, qassi Geeshsha Ayyaanaakka shaakki akkeeddawanttanne Xoossaa qaalay lo77a gideeddawaa sisi ereeddawantta, sinthaappe yaana sa7aa wolqqaakka bochchi xeelleeddawantta,
58006006	hewaappe guyye simmiide kaddeeddawaantta nagaraappe laa7enthuwa zaaranawe danddayettenna. Ayissi gooppe, hewanttu Xoossaa Na7aa masqqaliyaa bolla misimaariyan dhishiide kaqqiyaawanttanne asa sinthan kawushshiyaawanttu mala.
58006007	Ubba wode bukkiyaa iraa ushina, gosheedda uraa go77iyaa kathaa mokkiyaa biittaa Xoossay anjjee.
58006008	Shin buluwaanne buuzzuwaa mokkooppe, aynne go77enna; sheqaw shiiqi utteedda. Qassi wurssethaan guudettana.
58006009	Shin nu siiqatoo, nuuni hawaadan haasayiyaawaa gidooppenne, hinttenttu atotethaw gidiyaa lo77obay hinttenttussi de7iyaawaa ereetto.
58006010	Ayissi gooppe, hinttenttu ootheedda oosuwaanne qassi ammaniyaawantta maaddeeddawaaninne ha77ikka maaddiyaawan Xoossaa siiqeedda siiquwaa Xoossay doganaw makkala gidenna.
58006011	Hinttenttu huuphiyaan huuphiyaan demmana giide, hidootaan naagi utteedda kumentha tumatethaa wurssethay gakkanaw, kasewaadan minissiide oothana mala amotteetto.
58006012	Xoossay immana geeddawa ammanuwaaninne genccan laattiyawanttu mala hinttenttu gidanawaa nuuni koyyiyaawaappe attin, azalla gidanawaa koyyokko.
58006013	Xoossay Abraahaamoo immana giide caaqqeedda wode, bareppe aadhdhiyaa wolqqaamay baynna diraw, bare huuphiyan caaqqeedda.
58006014	Xoossay A, “Taani neena anjjana; ne zerethaakka corissana” yaagiide caaqqeedda.
58006015	Hewaadankka, Abraahaamo gencci naagiide, Xoossay immana geeddawa akeedda.
58006016	Ayissi gooppe, asay bareppe dhoqqiyaa uraan caaqqee; qassi he caaquu palumiyaa ubbaakka te77ee.
58006017	Hewaa diraw, Xoossay bare immana geeddawa laattanawanttoo bare qofaa ubbaakka laammennawaa geeshshi odanaw loythi koyyiide, hewe tuma gideeddawoo caaqqeedda.
58006018	Xoossay worddotanaw danddayenna ha laa77u laamettenna yewatuwan, I immana geedda nu sinthan de7iyaawaa oyqqanaw aakko baqateedda nuussi wolqqaama menthethu de7ee.
58006019	Ha nuuni demmana giide nashechchaan naagi utteeddawe, nu shemppoo markkabiyaa oyqqiyaa qaaxxenna birataa mala; he nuuni demmana giide, nashechchaan naagi utteeddawe eretteedda mino gidiide, gaariiduwaa giddo geeshshasaa gelee.
58006020	Qassi Yesuusi Malkki-Xedeqa sunthatethaadan, medhinaw qeesatuwaa ubbatuwaa kaappuwaa gidiide, nu gishshataw nuuppe kasetiide, he sa7aa geleedda.
58007001	Ha Malkki-Xedeqi, Saleema kaatii, Ubbaappe Bolla Xoossaa qeesay, Abraahaamo kaatetuwa wodhiide olaappe simmishshin, aananna gakettiide, A anjjeedda.
58007002	Abraahaamo bare omoddeedda ubbaappe asirataa kessiide, aw immeedda; Malkki-Xedeqa sunthaw koyro bilethay xillotetha kaatiyaa giyaawaa; qassi Saleema kaatiyaa I gidiyaa diraw, laa7etho bilethay sarotethaa kaatiyaa giyaawaa.
58007003	Malkki-Xedeqaw daaya woy aawuu, woy aw zariyaa payduu baawa; qassi A yeletaw doomethay woy A hayqoo wurssethay baawa; shin Xoossaa Na7aa malatiide, medhinaw qeesa gideedda.
58007004	Nu aawotuwa kaappuu Abraahaamo olaan omoddiide, aheeddawaappe asirataa immeedda Malkki-Xedeqi ay keena dhoqqu giyaawentto be7ite.
58007005	Qeesaa gidiyaa Leewiyaa zaratuu Isra7eeliya asaappe, hewenne barenttu gade asaappe haray atto unttunttu Abraahaamo zare gidooppenne, asirataa akkana mala, higgiyan azazetteeddino.
58007006	Malkki-Xedeqi Leewiyaa zare gidenna; shin Abraahaamoppe asirataa akkiide, Xoossay immana geeddawaa naagiyaa Abraahaama anjjeedda.
58007007	Qassi anjjiyaawe anjjettiyaawaappe dhoqqu giyaawe palunthenna.
58007008	Itti bagganna, hayqqiyaa asay asirataa kessee; shin hara bagganna qassi, hayqqenna giide markkattiyaa uray asirataa kessee.
58007009	Hawaadan haasayanaw haray atto, asirataa kessiyaa Leewiikka Abraahaamo bagganna asirataa immeedda.
58007010	Ayissi gooppe, Malkki-Xedeqi Abraahaamonna gakettiyaa wode, Leewii biro yelettibeenna; shin bare zariyaa Abraahaama gulbbatan de7ee.
58007011	Isra7eeliyaa asaw higgii Leewiyaa zerethatuwaa qeesetethaa bagganna imetteedda. He qeesetethaa kiitay balay baynnawaa gidooppe, Aaroonawaa mala gidennaan Malkki-Xedeqa mala hara qeesay sunthettanaw ayissi koshshii?
58007012	Ayissi gooppe, qeesetethay laamettiyaa wode, higgiikka qassi laamettanaw koshshee.
58007013	Ha yewuu haasayetteedda uray hara zarii; A zariyaappe ooninne yarshshiyaasaan qeesaadan oothibeenna.
58007014	Nu Goday Yihudaa zariyaappe yeeddawe eretteeddawaa gidiyaa diraw, Muse qeesatuwaabaa haasayiidde, he zariyaabaa aynne haasayibeenna.
58007015	Malkki-Xedeqa mala hara qeesay yeeddawaa gidintto, hawe aadhdhiide erettanawaa.
58007016	I asaa higgiyaaninne wogaan qeesa gidibeenna; shin wurenna de7uwa wolqqaan qeesa gideedda.
58007017	Ayissi gooppe, Xoossaa Maxaafay, “Malkki-Xedeqi qeesa gideeddawaadan, neenikka medhinaw qeesa gidanawa” yaagiide markkattee.
58007018	Beni de7iyaa higgii laafanne maaddennawaa gidiyaa diraw atteedda.
58007019	Ayissi gooppe, Muse higgii ayanne balay baynnawaa oothanaw danddayenna; qassi nuuni A bagganna Xoossaakko shiiqana giide nashechchaan naagi utteedda ubbaappe aadhdhiyaawe yeedda.
58007020	Hewaa bollan qassi Xoossaa caaquukka de7ee; haratuu qeesa gideedda wode, hewaa mala caaquu baawa.
58007021	Shin Yesuusi caaquwaan qeesa gideedda; Xoossay A, “Goday caaqqeedda; I bare qofaa laammenna. ‘Neeni medhinaw qeesa gidana’ geedda” yaageedda.
58007022	Hewaa diraw, Yesuusi ubbaappe aadhdhiyaa caaqoo waase gideedda.
58007023	Kase qeesatuwaa payduu cora; ayissi gooppe, unttunttu oothana oosuwaa hayquu diggeedda.
58007024	Shin Yesuusi medhinaw de7iyaa diraw, A qeesetethay laamettenna.
58007025	Hewaa diraw, I unttunttu gishshataw gaannatanaw medhinaw de7iyaa diraw, Xoossaakko bare bagganna yiyaawantta ubbatuwaa ashshanaw danddayee.
58007026	Nuussi giigiyaa hawaa mala, qeesatuwaa ubbatuwaa kaappuu de7anaw koshshee; I geeshsha; aani geniinne kadhethiyaabay baawa; nagaranchchatuwaanna I gakettenna; qassi dhoqqa saluwankka I bonchchetteedda.
58007027	Hara qeesatuwaa ubbatuwaa kaappatuwaadan, I koyro bare huuphe nagaraassi yarshshiide, qassi guyyeppe asaa nagaraassi hachche hachche yarshshanaw koshshenna; I barena yarshsheedda wode, laa7enthennaan itti gede yarshsheedda.
58007028	Ayissi gooppe, Muse higgii daaburanchcha asaa qeesatuwaa ubbatuwaa kaappuwaa udiide sunthee; shin Xoossay immana giide caaqqeedda higgiyaappe guyye yeedda qaalay medhinaw balay baynnawaa, Xoossaa Na7aa sunthee.
58008001	Nuuni haasayiyaa wolqqaamabay hawaa; saluwan Ubbaappe Bolla Xoossay uttiyaa kawutethaa oydiyaappe ushechcha bagganna utteedda qeesatuwaa ubbatuwaa kaappuu, hawaa malay nuussi de7ee.
58008002	Geeshsha Sa7aaninne tumu Dunkkaaniyan I oothee; he Dunkkaanii asay esseeddawaa gidennaan, Xoossay esseedawaa.
58008003	Qeesatuwaa ubbatuwaa kaappuu ubbay imuwaanne yarshshuwaa Xoossaw immanaw sunthetteedda diraw, ha qeesatuwaa ubbatuwaa kaappookka yarshshanaw ittibay de7anaw koshshee.
58008004	Simmi sa7an I de7iyaawaa gidooppe, ubbakka qeesa gidenna; ayissi gooppe, higgii azaziyaawaadan, imuwaa immiya qeesatuu de7iino.
58008005	Unttunttu qeesatuwaadan oothiyaa kiitay saluwan de7iyaa oosoo tumu leemisuwanne eeshuwaa; ayissi gooppe, Muse Dunkkaaniyaa essana hanishshin, Xoossay A, “Akeeka; ubbabaakka taani neena deriyaa huuphiyaan besseedda leemisuwaa kaallaade ootha” yaageedda.
58008006	Shin Yesuusi gaannatiyaa caaquu kasewaappe aadhdhiyaawaadankka, aw imetteedda oosuukka unttunttuwappe aadhdhee; ayissi gooppe, he caaquu Xoossay immana geedda ubbaappe aadhdhiyaa kiitaan oosetteedda.
58008007	Ayissi gooppe, koyro caaquwaan balay baynnawaa gidintto, laa7entho caaquwaa koshshenna.
58008008	Shin unttuntta boriidde, Goday hawaadan yaagee; “Taani Israa7eeliyaa asaannanne Yihudaa asaanna ooratha caaquwaa caaqettiyaa gallassatuu yaanawaa.
58008009	He caaquu taani Gibxe gadiyaappe unttunttu aawatuwaa kushiyaa oyiqqaade, goochcha kesseedda wode, unttunttunna caaqetteedda caaquwaa mala gidenna. Unttunttu ta caaquwaan ammanettibeenna diraw, taanikka unttuntta aggaaddi. Taani, Goday, hawaa oday.
58008010	Ayissi gooppe, he gallassatuwaappe guyyiyan, taani Israa7eeliyaa asaanna caaqettana caaquu hawaa: Taani ta higgiyaa unttunttu qofaan wothana; qassi unttunttu wozanankka xaafana. Taani unttunttu Xoossaa gidana; unttunttukka ta asaa gidana.
58008011	Unttunttuppe ooninne bare shooruwaa woy bare ishaa, ‘Godaa era’ yaagiide tamaarissenna. Ayissi gooppe, unttunttu naa7aappe cimaa gakkanaw ubbay taana eriino.
58008012	Taani unttunttu naaquwaa maarana; unttunttu nagaraakka laa7entho hassayikke” yaagee.
58008013	Xoossay ooratha caaquwaa giide haasayiyaawan koyrowaa eciseedda; qassi eciyaabayinne wuriyaabay ellekka dhayana.
58009001	Koyro caaqoo Xoossaw goyinniyaa wogaynne asay ootheedda Geeshsha Gollii de7ee.
58009002	Ayissi gooppe, koyro Dunkkaanii eqqeedda; A gidduwan muqaaddaa wothiyaawe, xaraphpheezaynne Godaa sinthan wothiyaa ukithay de7ee; he sa7ay Geeshshasaa giide xeeseettee.
58009003	Laa7entho gaariduwaa guyye bagganna Ubbaappe Aadhdhiyaa Geeshsha Sa7aa geetettiyaa Dunkkaanii de7ee.
58009004	A gidduwan ixaanaa cuwayanaw worqqaappe ootheedda saaxiniinne ubbasaanna worqqaan sheeshsheedda Qaalaa caaquwaa Taabootay de7ee. He Qaalaa caaquwaa Taabootan mannay de7iyaa worqqaa xaaruu, Aaroona xam77ay aaceeddawenne qassi Muse higgii xaafetteedda laa77u masetteedda shuchchatuu de7iino.
58009005	He Qaalaa caaquwaa Taabootaappe bolla bagganna atto giya sa7aa qum77iyaa barenttu qefiyan genthiyaa bonchcho kiruubetuu de7iino; shin ha ubbabaa ha77i wurssi odanaw danddayokko.
58009006	Hewe hewaadan giigi de7ishshin, qeesatuu ubba wode, barenttu oosuwaa oothanaw koyro Dunkkaaniyaa geliino.
58009007	Shin qeesatuwaa ubbatuwaa kaappuwaa xalalay laa7entho Dunkkaaniyaa laythaappe itti gede geliidde bare dirawunne erennaan asay ootheedda nagaraa diraw, Xoossaw yarshshiyaa suuthaa akkiide gelee.
58009008	Koyro Dunkkaanii eqqi de7ishshin, ubbaappe aadhdhiyaa geeshsha sa7aa afiyaa ogii biro dooyettibeennawaa Geeshsha Ayyaanay hewan erissee.
58009009	He Dunkkaanii ha wodew leemisuwaa; hewaa giyawe Xoossaw immiya imuunne yarshshuu goyinniyaawaa sure wozanaa balay baynnawaa oothanaw danddayikkino.
58009010	Hewanttu muussaabaa, ushshaabaanne dumma dumma meechchaabaa odiyaa kare bagga wogatuwaa; unttunttu ooraxxiyaa wodii gakkanaw oosettiyaa wogatuwaa.
58009011	Shin Kiristtoosi hawaan de7iyaa lo77obaw qeesatuwaa ubbatuwaa kaappuwaa gidiide yidiggeedda. I geliide oothiyaa Dunkkaanii ubbaappe aadhdhiyaawaanne balay baynnawaa; qassi he Dunkkaaniyaa asay oothibeenna; ha medhetteedda sa7aabaakka gidenna.
58009012	Kiristtoosi Ubbaappe Aadhdhiyaa Geeshsha sa7aa geliyaa wode, deeshshaa suuthaanne galo maraa suuthaa oyqqiide gelibeenna; shin bare suuthaa oyqqiide, nuussi medhinaa atotethaa immiide, laa7ethennaan itti gede gelleedda.
58009013	Tuneedda asaa bolla korumaa suuthaanne deeshshaa suuthaa caccafiide, guudetteedda ussatti bidinthaa qolina, he uraa tunatethaappe geeshshanaw danddayooppe,
58009014	Medhinaa Geeshsha Ayyaanaa bagganna balay baynna yarshshuwaadan, Xoossaw barena immeedda Kiristtoosa suuthay, nuuni de7uwaa Xoossaw oothana mala, kase nu hayqqeedda oosuwaappe nu suure wozanaa wooti geeshshanddeeshsha!
58009015	Hewaa diraw, Xoossay xeeseeddawanttu I immana geedda medhinaa anjjuwaa laattana mala, Kiristtoosi ooratha caaqoo gaannateedda; hewe hanana danddayiyaawe, asay koyro caaquwaappe garssan de7iidde ootheedda balaa aylletethaappe kessiyaa hayquu de7iyaa diraassa.
58009016	Ayissi gooppe, hayqqiyaa uray woyteeddawe de7ooppe, he uray hayqqowe erettanaw koshshee.
58009017	Ayissi gooppe, woyteedda uray hayqqeedda wode, I woyteeddawe poletteedda; he woyteeddawe paxa de7ishshin, aynne polettenna.
58009018	Haray atto, koyro caaquukka suuthay baynnaan injjetibeennawe hawaassa.
58009019	-
58009020	Ayissi gooppe, higgiyan de7iyaa azazuwa ubbaa Muse asaa ubbaw odeedda; hewaappe guyyiyan, galo maraa suuthaanne deeshshaa suuthaa, haathaanna, zo7o dorssaa isikiyaannanne hisoophiyaa giya mithaa boncciyaanna ittippe akkiide, “Hawe hinttentta Xoossay azazeedda caaquwaa suuthaa” yaagiide, higgiyaa maxaafaa bollanne asaa ubbaa bolla caccafeedda.
58009021	Hewaadankka, Dunkkaaniyaa bollanne oothiyaa miishshaa ubbaa bolla suuthaa Muse caccafeedda.
58009022	Higgii giyawaadan, tumukka amareeddawaappe attin, ubbabaykka suuthan geeyyee; suuthay gukkana dhayooppe, atotethay baawa.
58009023	Hewaa diraw, saluwan de7iyaawantta malatiyaawanttu he yarshshuwan geeyyanaw koshshee; shin saluwan de7iyaawaanttukka barenttu huuphew geeyyanaw aadhdhiyaa yarshshuwaa unttuntta koshshee.
58009024	Ayissi gooppe, Kiristtoosi tumu geeshshasan leemisettiyaa asay ootheedda geeshshasaa gelibeenna; shin I ha77i nu gishshataw Xoossaa sinthan beettanaw yaa saluwaa geleedda.
58009025	Qeesatuwaa ubbatuwaa kaappuu laythaan laythaan bare suuthaa gidennawaa oyqqiide, Geeshsha sa7aa geliyaawadan, Kiristtoosi barena ubbaade yarshshanaw gelibeenna.
58009026	Hewaa gidintto, Kiristtoosi sa7ay medhettoodeppe doommiide daro gede waayyettanaw koshshee; shin ha77i wodiyaa wurssethaan nagaraa dhayissanaw barena yarshshiide, laa7ethennaan ittigede beetteedda.
58009027	Asay ubbay itti gede hayqqanaw bessee; hewaappe guyyiyan Xoossay asaa pirddana.
58009028	Hewaadankka, qassi Kiristtoosi daro asaa nagaraa dhayissanaw itti gede yarshshetteedda; qassi I barena loythi naagiyaawantta ashshanaw beettanaappe attin, laa7entho nagaraa tookkanaw beettenna.
58010001	Ayissi gooppe, higgew yaana lo77obaa eeshuwaa xalalay de7ee; aw tumu leemisuu baawa. Ubba wode laythan laythan itti mala yarshshuu yarshshettee; hewaa diraw, higgii Xoossaakko shiiqiyaa asaa he yarshshuwan balay baynna asa oothanaw aynne danddayenna.
58010002	Xoossaw goyinniyaa asay bare nagaraappe ubbanna geeyyeeddabaa gidintto, sure wozanaan laa7ethuwaa nagaraa qoppenna; qassi yarshshiyaawaakka aggana.
58010003	Shin asay laythan laythan he yarshshuwan bare nagaraa hassayee.
58010004	Ayissi gooppe, korumaa suuthaynne deeshshaa suuthay nagaraa dhayissanaw ubbaakka danddayenna.
58010005	Hewaa diraw, Kiristtoosi ha alamiyaa yaana haniidde, hawaadan yaageedda; “Neeni yarshshuwanne imuwaa koyyabeykka; shin taw bollaa giigissaadda.
58010006	Neeni xuuggiyaa yarshshuwaaninne nagaraa yarshshuwan ubbaakka nashetakka.
58010007	Taani he wode, ‘Xaatha maxaafan tabay xaafetteeddawaadankka, Xoossaw, taani neeni koyiyaawaa oothanaw yaaddi’ yaagaaddi” yaageedda.
58010008	Yarshshuu yarshshettana mala, higgii azaziyaawaa gidooppenne, Kiristtoosi koyro, “Neeni yarshshuwaa, imotaa, xuuggiyaa yarshshuwanne nagaraa yarshshuwaa ubbaakka koyyabeykka; hewaanttun nashettakka” yaageedda.
58010009	Hewaappe guyyiyan Kiristtoosi, “Xoossaw, taani neeni koyiyaawaa oothanaw yaaddi” yaageedda. Hewaa diraw, Kiristtoosi laa7enthuwa essanaw koyrowaa dhayissee.
58010010	Yesuusi Kiristtoosi Xoossay koyyeeddawaa ootheedda diraw, bare ashuwaa laa7enthennaan itti gede yarshsheeddawan nuuni nu nagaraappe geeyyi aggeeddo.
58010011	Qeesatuwaa ubbatuu hachche hachche eqqiide, bare oosuwaa oothiino; qassi nagaraa dhayissanaw ubbaakka danddayenna itti mala yarshshuwaa zaari zaariide yarshshiino.
58010012	Shin Kiristtoosi nagaraa diraw, ubba wodew gideedda itti yarshshuwaa yarshshiide, Xoossaappe ushechcha bagganna utti aggeedda.
58010013	Xoossay sinthappe Kiristtoosa morkketuwaa Kiristtoosaw gediyan yedhdhiyaawaa oothana gakkanaw, yaani naagee.
58010014	Ayissi gooppe, I itti gede yarshsheeddawan, nagaraappe geeyyeeddawantta medhinaw balay baynnawantta ootheedda.
58010015	Qassi Geeshsha Ayyaanay nuussi markkattiidde, hawaadan yaagee;
58010016	“Taani he gallassatuwaappe guyyiyan, unttunttunna caaqettiya caaquu hawaa: Taani ta higgiyaa unttunttu qofaan wothana; qassi unttunttu wozanankka xaafana” yaagee.
58010017	Qassi hewaappe guyyenna, “Taani unttunttu nagaraanne unttunttu makkala oosuwaa laa7entho hassayikke” yaagee.
58010018	Xoossay he nagaraa atto geedda wode, nagaraa dhayissanaw hawaappe sinthaw yarshshuwaa koshshenna.
58010019	Simmi taanaadan ammaniyaawanttoo, nuuni Yesuusa suuthaa bagganna Ubbaappe Aadhdhiyaa Geeshsha sa7aa gelanaw nuussi xalatethay de7ee.
58010020	Kiristtoosi nuussi ooratha ogiyaanne de7uwa ogiyaa gaariduwaa bagganna, hewaa guussay bare bollaa bagganna dooyyeedda.
58010021	Nuussi Xoossaa gollen sunthetteedda wolqqaama qeesay de7iyaa diraw,
58010022	Nuuni suure wozanaanna, tumu ammanuwaanna, iita wozanaappe geeyyeedda wozanaannanne qassi xillo haathaan meecetteedda bollaanna Xoossaakko shiiqoytte.
58010023	Nuussi immana geedda Xoossay ammanthiya diraw, nuuni demmana giide nashechchaan naagi utteeddawaa loythi oyqqoytte.
58010024	Ittu ittuwanna waani siiqettanenttonne qassi lo77o oosuwaa wooti oothanentto, ittu ittuwassi qoppeetto.
58010025	Ittu ittuu shiiquwaa dooya udiide shiiqiyaawaadan, nuunikka ittippe shiiqiyaawaa aggokko; shin Godaa gallassay matattiyaawaa hinttenttu be7iyaa diraw, ittu ittuwaa menthetheetto.
58010026	Nuuni tumatethaa era akkidiggiide, eriidde nagaraa oothiyaawaa gidooppe, hawaappe sinthaw nagaraa dhayissiyaa yarshshuu ittibaynne baawa.
58010027	Shin yashshiyaa pirddaa naagiyaawenne Xoossaa ixxiyaa ubbaa maanaw wolqqaama tamay de7ee.
58010028	Muse higgew azazettenna uray, laa77u uray woy heezzu uray A bolla markkattooppe, qareti baynnaan hayqqee.
58010029	Xoossaa Na7aa kadheedda uray, barena nagaraappe geeshsheedda Xoossaa caaquwaa suuthaa tunabaadan qoppeedda uray, qassi aadho keekatethaa Geeshsha Ayyaanaa boriyaa uray, ay keena iita pirddaa akkanaw bessinttonne ane qoppite.
58010030	Ayissi gooppe, “Taani haluwaa kesananne kushiyaa zaarana” geeddawaa nuuni ereetto; qassikka, “Goday bare asaa pirddana” yaageedda.
58010031	De7uwa Xoossaa kushiyan kunddanawe daro yashshiyaawaa.
58010032	Hinttenttussi Xoossaa poo7uu poo7eeddawaappe guyyiyan, hinttenttu daroban waayyettiide, wolqqaama wadhetaan gencceedda beni wodiyaa hassayite.
58010033	Itti itti gede hinttentta asaa sinthan boreeddinonne paxa kaa7eeddino; qassi hara wode hewaadan ootheeddawanttunnanne ittippe de7eeddita.
58010034	Ayissi gooppe, qashuwan de7iyaa asatuwaassi hinttenttu qaretteeddita; yaatiide hinttenttussi medhinaw wurenna ubbaappe aadhdhiyaa shaluu saluwan de7iyaawaa hinttenttu huuphew ereedda diraw, hinttebaa ubbaa akkidigooppe hidootaan gencceeddita.
58010035	Hewaa diraw, wolqqaama woyitaanna de7iyaa hinttenttu xalatethaa oloppite.
58010036	Xoossay koyyiyaawaa udiide, I hinttenttussi immana geeddawa akkanaw genccana koshshee.
58010037	Ayissi gooppe, Xoossaa Maxaafay, “Amareedda wodii atteedda. Yiyaawe yaanawaa; gami77enna.
58010038	Ta xilluu ammanettiide de7anawaa. Shin ooninne guyye simmooppe, taana nashechchenna” yaagee.
58010039	Nuuni ammanettiide atteeddawanttu bagga gidiyaawaappe attin, guyye simmiide dhayeeddawanttu bagga gidokko.
58011001	Ammanuwaa giyawe, demmana giide nashechchaan naagi utteeddabay ammanthiyaawaanne be7anaw danddayennabaa erissiyaawaa.
58011002	Xoossay beni cima asaw markkattawe, unttunttu ammaneeddawaana.
58011003	Saluunne sa7aynne Xoossaa qaalaan medhetteeddawaa ammanuwan nuuni ereetto; hewaa diraw, beettiyaabay beettennabaappe medhetteedda.
58011004	Aabeel Qaa7eelawaappe aadhdhiyaa yarshshuwaa Xoossaw yarshsheeddawe ammanuwaana. Xoossay A imuwaabaa markkattiidde, I xilluwaa gideeddawaakka markkatteedda; Aabeel haray atto hayiqqeeddashshinkka, bare ammanuwan ha77i gakkanaw haasayee.
58011005	Heenooki hayqqennan saluwaa beeddawe ammanuwaana; Xoossay afeedda diraw, ooninne A be7anaw danddayibeenna. Xoossaa Maxaafay, “Heenooki saluwaa baanaappe kase Xoossaa nashechcheedda” yaagee.
58011006	Ammanuu baynnaan ooninne Xoossaa nashechchanaw danddayenna; ayissi gooppe, Xoossaakko yiyaa ooninne Xoossay de7iyaawaanne barena koyyiyaawanttoo woytaa immiyaawaa ammananaw koshshee.
58011007	Nohe be7anaw danddayenna sinthaappe hananabaw Xoossay, “Neena naaga” giina, Xoossaw yayyiide, barenanne bare soy asaa ashshanaw markkabiyaa medhdheeddawe ammanuwana; yaatiide hewaan ha sa7aa bolla pirddiide, ammanuwan beettiyaa xillotethaakka Xoossaappe akeedda.
58011008	Abraahaamo laattanaadan, Xoossay barew immana geedda gadiya baana mala, Xoossay barena xeeseedda wode, azazetteeddawe ammanuwaana; I bare gadiyaappe kesiide biya wode, haqa binttonne erennaan kesseedda.
58011009	Abraahaamo Xoossay barew immana geedda gadiyan hara biittaa asaadan de7eeddawe ammanuwaana; Xoossay he immana geeddawaa barenanna ittippe laattana Yisaaqannanne Yayiqoobanna Dunkkaaniyan de7eedda.
58011010	Ayissi gooppe, Abraahaamo Xoossay lo77o baasuwan qoppiide keexxeedda katamaa naagee.
58011011	Saara bare huuphew haray atto ecaadekka, immana geedda Xoossay ammanetteeddawaa gideeddawaa ereedda diraw, na7aa shahaaranaw wolqqaa demmeeddawe ammanuwaana.
58011012	Hewaa diraw, hayqqeedda asaa malatiyaa itti bitaniyaappe saluwan de7iyaa xoolinttiyaa keena, abbaa gaxaan de7iyaa payduu baynna shafiyaa keena zaretuu yeletteeddino.
58011013	He asatuu ubbatuu ammanuwan hayqqeeddino; barenttoo Xoossay immana geeddawaakka akkibeykkino; shin haakuwan hewaa be7iide, saroteeddino. Qassi unttunttu sa7an imathanne yederissettiide keseedda asatuwaa gideeddawaa ereeddino.
58011014	Ayissi gooppe, hewaadan giya asatuu barenttu huuphe gadiya koyiyaawaa erissiino.
58011015	Unttunttu he yeggiide kesseedda gadiyaa simmanaw qoppeeddawaa gidintto, guyye simmiyaa kaacaa demmennaan aggikkino; shin
58011016	unttunttu hewaa aggiide, lo77iyaa gadiya laamotiino; hewe saluwaa gadiya. Hewaa diraw, Xoossay unttunttu Xoossaa geetettanaw yeellatenna. Ayissi gooppe, I unttunttoo katamaa giigissi wotheedda.
58011017	-
58011018	Abraahaamo Yisaaqa yarshshanentto woy yarshshennentto, Xoossay eranaw xomooseedda wode, Abraahaamo ammanuwan A yarshsheedda. Xoossay Abraahaama, “Ne zarii Yisaaqa bagganna xeesettanawaa” geeddashshinkka, Abraahaamo bare na7aa Yisaaqa yarshshanaw giigeedda.
58011019	Abraahaamo Xoossay Yisaaqa haray atto, hayquwaappekka pathanaw danddayiyaawaa ereedda; hewaa diraw, hayquwaappe guyye A zaariide akeedda.
58011020	Yisaaqi sinthappe hananabaw Yayiqoobanne Eesaa anjjeeddawe ammanuwaana.
58011021	Yayiqoobi hayqqana haniidde, Yooseefo naanaa huuphiyaan huuphiyaan anjjeeddawenne gatiman guufetiide, Xoossaw goyinneeddawe ammanuwaana.
58011022	Yooseefo hayqqanaw matiidde, Israa7eeliyaa asay Gibxeppe kesanawaa haasayeeddawenne bare meqethaa oothanabaa unttuntta azazeeddawe ammanuwaana.
58011023	Muse yeletteeddawaappe guyyiyan, aawuunne aatta malaa lo77o na7a gideeddawaa be7iide, heezzu agenaa qoseeddawe ammanuwaana; unttunttu kaatiyaa awaajjookka yayyibeykkino.
58011024	Muse dicceeddawaappe guyyiyan, Gibxe kaatiyaa naatti na7aa geetettanawaa ixxeeddawe ammanuwaana.
58011025	Nagaraan Muse guutha wodiyaa nashettanawaappe, Xoossaa asaanna waayyettanawaa dooreedda.
58011026	Wodeppe demmana woytaa I tishshi udiide xeello diraw, Gibxe gadiyaa shaluwaa ubbaappe Kiristtoosa diraw borettiyaawe daro aadhdhiyaa duretethaa gideeddawaa qoppeedda.
58011027	Kaatiyaa hanqqoo Muse yayyennaan, Gibxe gadiyaappe keseeddawe ammanuwaana; ayissi gooppe, beettenna Xoossaa be7eeddawaadan, gencciide sinthaw beedda.
58011028	Hayquwaa kiitanchchay Israa7eeliyaa asaw bayra naanaa bochchennaadan, Muse Paasigaa bonchcheeddawenne gubaniyan suuthaa caccafisseeddawe ammanuwaana.
58011029	Israa7eeliyaa asay mela biittan hamettiyaawaadan, Zo7o Abbaa pinneeddawe ammanuwaana; shin Gibxe asatuu paacew gelishshin, haathay unttuntta mitti aggeedda.
58011030	Israa7eeliyaa asay Iyyarkko giyaa katamaa shuchchaa dirssaa laappu gallassaa yuuyyi yuuyyi aadhdhowaappe guyyiyan, he shuchchaa dirssay kunddeeddawe ammanuwaana.
58011031	Caaratta Ra7aaba yewuwaa qoriyaawantta loytha mokkeedda diraw, Xoossaw azazettennan ixxeedda asaanna hayqqennan atteeddawe ammanuwaana.
58011032	Simmi harabaa gujjaade ayaa odoo? Geedoonabaa, Baaraaqabaa, Samisoonabaa, Yoftaahebaa, Daawitebaanne Saameelabaa, qassi nabatuwaabaa odanaw taw wodii gidenna.
58011033	Unttunttu kaatiyaa ubbaanna olettiide xooneeddawenne xillobaa ootheeddawe ammanuwaana; yaatiide Xoossay immana geeddawa akkeeddino; gaammotuwaa doonaakka gorddeeddino.
58011034	Wolqqaama tamaa toyisseeddino; kuussa mashshaappe atteeddino; unttunttu daaburanchcha; shin minneeddino; qassi olaan minniide, hara gadiyaa olaa asaa yedersseeddino.
58011035	Maccawanttu barenttu hayqqeeddaawantta hayquwaappe denddina akkeeddino. Qassi haranttu qashuwaappe bilettanawaa ixxiide, keekkiyaa de7oo hayquwaappe denddanaw, ugatiide hayqqeeddino.
58011036	Haratuwaa bolla asay qilliicci kaa7eedda; lissuwan shocetteeddinonne santhalataan qashettiide, qasho golliya geleeddino.
58011037	Shuchchan cadetteeddino; magaaziyan laa77u kesiide phalqqetteedino; paacetteeddino; mashshaan hayqqeeddino; unttunttoo ubbabaykka dhayina, waayyettiide tuggattiide, dorssaa calaanne deeshshaa calaa mayyiide yuuyyeeddino.
58011038	Unttunttussi ha alamii giigennaan ixxina, woraan, deriyaan, gonggoluwaa giddoninne ollaa gidduwan yuuyyeeddino.
58011039	Xoossay unttunttu ammanuwaa markkattooppekka, hewanttu ubbatuu I, immana geeddawa akkibeykkino.
58011040	Xoossay nuussi itti lo77o qofaa qoppi wotheedda diraw, unttunttu nuuni baynnaan balay baynnawantta gidikkino.
58012001	Simmi nuussi hawaa keena daro asay, shaariyaadan nu matan yuuyyi aadhdhiide markkattiyaawe de7ishshin, nuuna dhubbiyaa ubbabaanne baqqi oyqqiyaa nagaraa diggiide nu sinthan de7iyaa nuuni woxxana wothaa gencciide woxxoytte.
58012002	Nuuni nu ammanoo ogiyaa dooyyeeddawaanne polissiyaawaa gideedda Yesuusa xeelloyte. Yesuusi yeellaa kadhiide, sinthappe aw de7iyaa nashechchaa diraw, masqqaliyaa bolla misimaariyan dhishettiide hayqqanaawaa gencciide, Xoossaa kawutethaa oydiyaappe ushechcha bagganna utteedda.
58012003	Hinttenttu hinttenttu wozanaa bayizziide daaburenna mala, nagaranchchatuu barena daro ixxinakka gencceedda Yesuusa qoppite.
58012004	Nagaraanna hinttenttu baaxetiidde, suuthaa gussana gakkanaw biro oletti diggibeykkita.
58012005	Xoossay bare naanaadan, hinttentta zoriyaawaa dogeedditee? Xoossay hinttentta, “Ta na7aw, Xoossay neena muriyaa wode, laafabaadan qoppoppa. I neena seeriyaa wodekka yayyoppa.
58012006	Ayissi gooppe, I bare siiqiyaa uraa muree; qassi bare na7adan akkiya ubbaakka lissuwan shocee” yaageedda.
58012007	Xoossay hinttentta muriyaa wode genccite. Ayissi gooppe, I hinttentta naanaadan oothee. Aawuu seerenna na7ay de7ii?
58012008	Naanaa ubbaa seeriyaawaadan, hinttentta murennaan aggooppe, karen yeletteeddaawaantta gidiitappe attin, tumu naanaa gidikkita.
58012009	Hewaa bollan qassi, nuuna yeleedda nu aawotuu nuuna mureedda wode, nuuni unttuntta bonchcheeddo. Yaatina, nuuni waaniide ayyaanaa Aabboo loythi darissi moodettiide de7okkoo?
58012010	Ayissi gooppe, nuuna yeleedda nu aawotuu barentta lo77owaadan, amareedda wodiyaa nuuna mureeddino; shin Xoossay nuuni A geeshshatethaa akkana mala, nuuna maaddanaw muree.
58012011	Nuuni murettiyaa wode, ha77iw yiloyee; nashechchenna. Shin mureeddawanttoo guyyeppe he muray xillotethaa de7uwaa sarotethaa woytaa immana.
58012012	Hewaa diraw, hinttenttu arggaaceedda kushiyaanne hinttenttu daabureedda gulbbataa menthethite.
58012013	Wobbiyaa gedi paxanaappe attin, burqqenna mala, suure ogiyaan hamettite.
58012014	Asaa ubbaanna saro de7anaw minnite; qassi geeshsha de7uwaa de7ite. Ayissi gooppe, geeshshatethay baynnaan ooninne Godaa be7anaw danddayenna.
58012015	Xoossaa aadho keekatethaa ooninne akkennaan attenna mala naagettite; qassi dolaade, bare marzziyaan asaa waayissiyaa camo mithaadan haniide, ooninne daro asaa tunissenna mala naagettite.
58012016	Woshummanaw kajjeeliyaa asay ooninne de7enna mala, woy qassi itti gede miyaabaw bare bayratethaa zali77eedda, ayyaanaabaa kawushissiyaa Eesaa mala asaykka de7enna mala naagettite.
58012017	Hewaappe guyyiyan, Eesay bare aabbu anjjuwaa akkanaw koyyeeddawaa eriita; shin A aabbu A anjjennan ixxeedda; ayissi gooppe, nagaraappe simmiyaa ogiyaa I haray atto, afoxxi koyyiidekka demmanaw danddayibeenna.
58012018	Hinttenttu bochchanaw danddayiyaa deriyaakkonne eexxiyaa tamaakko, dhumaakko, shaariyaakkonne gotuwaakko,
58012019	qassi malakataa waasuwakkonne qaalaa kooshshaakko yibeykkita. Asay he kooshshaa siseedda wode, haraa gujji sisenna mala woosseedda.
58012020	Ayissi gooppe, Xoossay unttuntta, “Haray atto, do7aykka he deriyaa bochchooppe, shuchchan cadettiide hayqqo” yaageedda azazuwaa unttunttu genccanaw danddayibeyikkino.
58012021	Ayfiyan beettiyaawe daro daganthiyaawaa gidiyaa diraw Muse, “Taani yashshaan kokkoray” yaageedda.
58012022	Shin hinttenttu Xiyoone Deriyaa, de7o Xoossay de7iyaa katamaa, ittippe shiiqiide nashettiyaa daro sha77a kiitanchchatuwaakko saluwaa Yeerusalaame yeeddita.
58012023	Xoossaa bayra naanatuwaakko, ittippe shiiqeeddawanttukko, unttunttu sunthay saluwan xaafetteeddawanttukko yeeddita; qassi asaa ubbaa pirddiyaa Xoossaakkonne, balay baynnawantta ootheedda xillo asatuwaa ayyaanatuwaakko yeeddita.
58012024	Ooratha caaqoo gaannatiyaa Yesuusanne Aabeela suuthaappe aadhdhiyaawaa odiyaa gukkeedda suuthaakko yeeddita.
58012025	Hinttenttussi odiyaa uraa yewuwaa sisiyaawaa hinttenttu ixxenna mala, hinttentta naagite. Xoossaa kiitaa sa7an barenttoo odiyaawe odiyaawaa sisenna ixxeeddawanttu attana dhayooppe, saluwan, “Hinttena naagite” giya Xoossaappe nuuni waaniide attanee?
58012026	He wode A kooshshay sa7aa qaatheedda; shin I ha77i, “Taani sa7aa xalalaa gidennaan, itti gede gujjaade saluwaakka qaathana” yaageedda.
58012027	“Itti gede gujjaade” giyaa qaalay qaaxxennabay minniide de7ana mala, medhetteeddabay qaaxxanawaanne kichchanawaa geeshshiide bessee.
58012028	Nuuni qaaxxanaw danddayenna kawutethaa akkiya diraw, ane Xoossaa galatoyttenne A nashechchoytte; aw bessiyaawaadan bonchchuwaaninne yashshatethaan aw goyinnoytte.
58012029	Ayissi gooppe, nu Xoossay tumu bayizziyaa tamaa.
58013001	Hinttenttu ishatuwaa siiqiyaawaa aggoppite.
58013002	Imathaa mokkiyaawaakka dogoppite. Ayissi gooppe, yaatiyaawan itti itti asay erennaan kiitanchchatuwa mokkeedda.
58013003	Qasho gollen de7iyaawanttubaa hinttentukka unttunttunna ittippe qasho gollen de7iyaawaadan qoppite; qassi hinttenttu hinttenttu huuphew waayyettiyaawaadan, waayyettiyaawanttubaa qoppite.
58013004	Akkiyawaanne geliyaawaa asay ubbay bonchchanaw bessee; qassi asinaynne machchatta ittu ittuwassi ammanettanaw bessee; ayissi gooppe, Xoossay woshummanaw kajjeeliyaawanttanne woshummiyaawantta pirddana.
58013005	Miishshaa siiquwaappe hinttentta naagite; hinttenttussi de7iyaawe hinttenttussi gido. Ayissi gooppe, Xoossay bare huuphew, “Taani neena ubbaakka yeggikke woy aggikke” yaageedda.
58013006	Hewaa diraw, nuuni xaliide, “Goday taana maaddiyaawaa; taani yayyikke. Asay taana ay oothii?” yaageetto.
58013007	Xoossaa qaalaa hinttenttussi odeedda hinttentta kaaletheeddaawantta hassayite; unttunttu waani de7eeddinonttonne hassayite; qassi unttunttuwaadan ammanite.
58013008	Yesuusi Kiristtoosi zinokka hachchekka medhinawukka laamettenna.
58013009	Dumma dumma ooratha timirttiyaan wora booppite. Nu wozanay Xoossaa aadho keekatethan minnooppe lo77o gidiyaawappe attin, qumaa wogatoo azazettiyaawaa gidenna; hewoo azazetteeddawanttukka maadettibeykkino.
58013010	Nuussi yarshshiyaasay de7ee; Dunkkaaniyaa giddon oothiyaawanttu he yarshshiyaasaappe maanaw unttunttoo maatay baawa.
58013011	Qeesatuwaa ubbatuwaa kaappuu nagaraa diraw, mehiyaa suuthaa yarshshanaw Ubbaappe Aadhdhiyaa Geeshsha sa7aa afee; shin he mehiyaa ashuwaa qassi dirssaappe karenna guuddee.
58013012	Hewaa diraw, Yesuusikka qassi nagaraappe asaa bare suuthan geeshshanaw, katamaa penggiyaappe karenna waayyetteedda.
58013013	Simmi nuuni I boretteedda boriyaa akkiide, dirssaappe kare aakko kesoytte.
58013014	Ayissi gooppe, nuussi hawaan medhinaw de7iyaa katamay baawa; shin nuuni yaana katamaa naageetto.
58013015	Simmi Xoossaw Yesuusa bagganna ubba wode galataa yarshshuwaa immoytte; hewaa giyawe mettershshay A sunthaw immiya galataa giyaawaa.
58013016	Lo77obaa oothiyaawaanne ittu ittuwa maaddiyaawaa dogoppite. Ayissi gooppe, Xoossaa nashechchiyaawe hewaa mala yarshshuwaa.
58013017	Hinttena kaalethiyaawanttoo azazettite; qassi unttunttu azaziyaawaakka oothite. Unttunttu barenttu ootheeddawaa Xoossaw odana diraw, hinttenttu shemppuwaa loythi naagiino; hinttenttu unttunttoo azazettooppe, barenttu oosuwaa nashettiidde oothana; hewe dhayooppe, unttunttu yilotiidde oothana; hewe hinttentta aynne maaddenna.
58013018	Nuussi Xoossaa woossite. Nuuni ubba wode lo77obaa oothanaw koyyiyaa diraw, nuuna zoriyaa lo77o wozanay nuussi de7ee.
58013019	Xoossay taana hinttentukko ellekka zaarana mala, Xoossaa hinttenttu loythi woossanaadan, taani hinttentta loytha woossay.
58013020	Sarotethaa Xoossay, nu Godaa Yesuusa, dorssatuwaa henthanchchaa wolqqaamaa, medhinaa caaquwaa suuthan hayquwaappe dentheedda.
58013021	Xoossay Yesuusi Kiristtoosa bagganna bare sinthan barena nashechchiyaawaa hinttentta oosissiidde, hinttentukka I koyyeeddawaa oothana mala, lo77o oosuwaa ubbaan hinttentta I giigisso; Xoossay medhi medhinaw bonchchetto. Amen77i.
58013022	Taanaadan ammaniyaawanttoo, taani ha dabidaabbiyaa hinttenttussi qanthaan xaafeedda diraw, hinttenttu ha zoriyaa salettennaan sisana mala, taani hinttentta woossay.
58013023	Nu ishay, Ximootoosi qashuwaappe biletteeddawaa erite. Elleli I haa yooppe, taani aananna baade hinttentta be7ana.
58013024	Hinttena kaalethiyaa ubbatuwaanne Xoossaa asatuwaa ubbaa saro saro giite. Xaaliyappe yeedda ammaniyaawanttu hinttentta saro saro giino.
58013025	Aadho keekatethay hinttenanna ubbaanna ittippe gido. Amen77i.
59001001	Taani Yayiqoobi Xoossaa aylliinne Godaa Yesuusi Kiristtoosa ayllii, biittaa ubbaan laaletteedda tammanne laa77u zerethatoo sarotaa kiittay.
59001002	-
59001003	Taanaadan Xoossaa kaalliyaawantto, hintte ammanuu paacettiyaawe hinttenttoo danddayaa immanaawaa eriide, dumma dumma paacii hinttena gakkiya wode, hewaa kumentha nashechchaadan paydite.
59001004	Hintte danddayay aynne bali baynnaan hinttena minneeddawanttanne paci bayinnawantta oothiide, bare oosuwaa polo.
59001005	Shin hintteppe ooninne barew aadhdheedda eratethay dhayooppe, kadhennaani ubbaw keekatethan immiya Xoossaa woosso. I aw immana.
59001006	Shin I ayaaninne sidhennaan ammanuwan Xoossaa woosso. Ayissi gooppe, sidhiyaa uray carkkuu sugina qaaxxiyaa abbaa beetaa mala.
59001007	-
59001008	Ayissi gooppe, laa77u qofay de7iya uray, bare ogiyaa ubbaan bare qofaa qachchennawe, he uray Godaappe ayinne demmanaw qoppoppo.
59001009	Shin hiyyeesaa ishay Xoossay A dhoqqu ootheedda wode nashetto.
59001010	Qassi dure ishaykka Xoossay A kawushisseedda wode nashetto. Ayissi gooppe, dure bitani maataa giddon dicciyaa ciishshaadan dhayana.
59001011	Ayissi gooppe, away bare seelaanna kesiide, maataa melissina, ciishshay dhayee; qassi A malaa lo77otethaykka dhayee; hewaadankka qassi dure bitani barewaa oothiidde dhayana.
59001012	Waayyiyan gencciyaa uray anjjetteeddawaa; ayissi gooppe, he waayyiyaa xooneeddawaappe guyyiyan, Xoossay barena siiqiyaawanttoo immana geedda de7uwaa akililiyaa I akkana.
59001013	Ooninne paacetteedda wode, “Taana Xoossay paaccee” gooppo. Ayissi gooppe, Xoossay iitan paacettanaw danddayenna; qassi I bare huuphew oonanne paaccenna.
59001014	Shin asay huuphiyan huuphiyan bare huuphe iita amuwan gooshettiya wodenne cimettiyaa wode paacettee.
59001015	Hewaappe guyyiyan, amuu shahaariide, nagaraa yelee; qassi nagaray dicciide, hayquwaa yelee.
59001016	Taanaadan Xoossaa kaalliyaawanttoo, cimettoppite.
59001017	Lo77o imuwaa ubbayinne kumentha woytaa ubbay saluwaappe yee. Saluwaa poo7uwaa medhdheedda Aawuwaappe yee; Xoossay bare huuphew dummatennanne woy bare kuwaa laammenna.
59001018	Nuuni I medhdheedda medhetatuwaa giddon dhoqqasaa akkanaadan, nuuna bare sheniyaan tumu qaalaan yeleedda.
59001019	Taanaadan Xoossaa kaalliyaawanttoo, hawaa hassayite; asay ubbay sisanaw elleello; shin haasayanawunne hanqqettanaw elleelloppo.
59001020	Ayissi gooppe, asaa hanqquu Xoossay koyyiyaa xillotethaa ahenna.
59001021	Hewaa diraw, tuna hanotaa ubbaanne iitatethaa ubbaa hintteppe dhayissiidde, Xoossay hintte wozanaan tookkeedda hintte shemppuwaa ashshanaw danddayiyaa qaalaa ashikketethan akkite.
59001022	Shin Xoossaa qaalaa oosuwan peeshshiteppe attin, sissa xalalaan hintte huuphiyaa cimmoppite.
59001023	Ayissi gooppe, qaalaa sisiide oothenna uray de7ooppe, I bare malaa masttootiyaa xeelliyaa uraa mala.
59001024	I barena xeelliide bee; ellekka I ay malenttonne dogi aggee.
